ayah_ar: وَيَقُولُونَ ءَامَنَّا بِٱللَّهِ وَبِٱلرَّسُولِ وَأَطَعْنَا ثُمَّ يَتَوَلَّىٰ فَرِيقٌۭ مِّنْهُم مِّنۢ بَعْدِ ذَٰلِكَ ۚ وَمَآ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ بِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayah_en: They say, "We believe in God and in the Messenger, and we obey." But then, even after that a group of them will turn away. Those are surely not believers

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا دُعُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ لِيَحْكُمَ بَيْنَهُمْ إِذَا فَرِيقٌۭ مِّنْهُم مُّعْرِضُونَ
ayah_en: and when they are called to God and His Messenger so that he may judge between them, some of them turn away.

ayah_ar: وَإِن يَكُن لَّهُمُ ٱلْحَقُّ يَأْتُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ مُذْعِنِينَ
ayah_en: But if the truth happens to be to their liking, they are quite willing to accept it!

ayah_ar: أَفِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ أَمِ ٱرْتَابُوٓا۟ أَمْ يَخَافُونَ أَن يَحِيفَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِمْ وَرَسُولُهُۥ ۚ بَلْ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ
ayah_en: Is there a sickness in their hearts, or are they full of doubt? Or do they fear that God and His Messenger will be unjust to them? The truth is that they themselves are wrongdoers.

ayah_ar: إِنَّمَا كَانَ قَوْلَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ إِذَا دُعُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ لِيَحْكُمَ بَيْنَهُمْ أَن يَقُولُوا۟ سَمِعْنَا وَأَطَعْنَا ۚ وَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
ayah_en: The response of the believers, when they are called to God and His Messenger in order that he may judge between them, is only, "We hear and we obey." It is they who will prosper:

ayah_ar: وَمَن يُطِعِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَيَخْشَ ٱللَّهَ وَيَتَّقْهِ فَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْفَآئِزُونَ
ayah_en: those who obey God and His Messenger, and fear God, and are mindful of their duty to Him, are the ones who will triumph.

ayah_ar: ۞ وَأَقْسَمُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ جَهْدَ أَيْمَٰنِهِمْ لَئِنْ أَمَرْتَهُمْ لَيَخْرُجُنَّ ۖ قُل لَّا تُقْسِمُوا۟ ۖ طَاعَةٌۭ مَّعْرُوفَةٌ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ خَبِيرٌۢ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
ayah_en: They swear firm oaths by God that if you command them to march forth, they will obey you. Say, "Do not swear: your obedience, not your oaths, will count. God is well aware of all your actions."

ayah_ar: قُلْ أَطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱلرَّسُولَ ۖ فَإِن تَوَلَّوْا۟ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَيْهِ مَا حُمِّلَ وَعَلَيْكُم مَّا حُمِّلْتُمْ ۖ وَإِن تُطِيعُوهُ تَهْتَدُوا۟ ۚ وَمَا عَلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ إِلَّا ٱلْبَلَٰغُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
ayah_en: Obey God and obey the Messenger. If you turn away, then he is responsible for what he is charged with and you are responsible for what you are charged with. If you obey him, you will be rightly guided. The Messenger is responsible only for delivering the message clearly.

ayah_ar: وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنكُمْ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَيَسْتَخْلِفَنَّهُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ كَمَا ٱسْتَخْلَفَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ وَلَيُمَكِّنَنَّ لَهُمْ دِينَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى ٱرْتَضَىٰ لَهُمْ وَلَيُبَدِّلَنَّهُم مِّنۢ بَعْدِ خَوْفِهِمْ أَمْنًۭا ۚ يَعْبُدُونَنِى لَا يُشْرِكُونَ بِى شَيْـًۭٔا ۚ وَمَن كَفَرَ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْفَٰسِقُونَ
ayah_en: God has promised to those among you who believe and do good works that He will surely grant them power in the land as He granted to those who were before them; and that He will surely establish for them their religion which He has chosen for them. He will cause their state of fear to be replaced by a sense of security. Let them worship Me and associate no other with Me. Whoever still chooses to deny the truth is truly rebellious.

ayah_ar: وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱلرَّسُولَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
ayah_en: Attend to your prayers and pay the zakat and obey the Messenger, so that you may be shown mercy.

ayah_ar: لَا تَحْسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مُعْجِزِينَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَمَأْوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ ۖ وَلَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
ayah_en: Do not think that those who deny the truth can frustrate Our plan on earth; their abode shall be Hell; and it is indeed an evil resort.

ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لِيَسْتَـْٔذِنكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَٰنُكُمْ وَٱلَّذِينَ لَمْ يَبْلُغُوا۟ ٱلْحُلُمَ مِنكُمْ ثَلَٰثَ مَرَّٰتٍۢ ۚ مِّن قَبْلِ صَلَوٰةِ ٱلْفَجْرِ وَحِينَ تَضَعُونَ ثِيَابَكُم مِّنَ ٱلظَّهِيرَةِ وَمِنۢ بَعْدِ صَلَوٰةِ ٱلْعِشَآءِ ۚ ثَلَٰثُ عَوْرَٰتٍۢ لَّكُمْ ۚ لَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ وَلَا عَلَيْهِمْ جُنَاحٌۢ بَعْدَهُنَّ ۚ طَوَّٰفُونَ عَلَيْكُم بَعْضُكُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍۢ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمُ ٱلْءَايَٰتِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌۭ
ayah_en: Believers, let \[even\] those whom you rightfully possess, and those who are under age ask your leave on three occasions when they come in to see you: before the morning prayer, when you have taken off your garments in the heat of noon, and after the evening prayer. These are the three occasions for your privacy. At other times, there is nothing blameworthy if you or they go around visiting one another. Thus God makes clear to you His revelations: God is all knowing and wise.

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا بَلَغَ ٱلْأَطْفَٰلُ مِنكُمُ ٱلْحُلُمَ فَلْيَسْتَـْٔذِنُوا۟ كَمَا ٱسْتَـْٔذَنَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمْ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌۭ
ayah_en: When your children have reached the age of puberty, let them still ask permission as their elders do. Thus God expounds to you His revelations: God is all knowing and wise.

ayah_ar: وَٱلْقَوَٰعِدُ مِنَ ٱلنِّسَآءِ ٱلَّٰتِى لَا يَرْجُونَ نِكَاحًۭا فَلَيْسَ عَلَيْهِنَّ جُنَاحٌ أَن يَضَعْنَ ثِيَابَهُنَّ غَيْرَ مُتَبَرِّجَٰتٍۭ بِزِينَةٍۢ ۖ وَأَن يَسْتَعْفِفْنَ خَيْرٌۭ لَّهُنَّ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌۭ
ayah_en: There is no blame on elderly women who are past the age of marriage, if they take off their outer clothing, without revealing their adornments. But it would be better for them to guard themselves. God is all hearing, all knowing.

ayah_ar: لَّيْسَ عَلَى ٱلْأَعْمَىٰ حَرَجٌۭ وَلَا عَلَى ٱلْأَعْرَجِ حَرَجٌۭ وَلَا عَلَى ٱلْمَرِيضِ حَرَجٌۭ وَلَا عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِكُمْ أَن تَأْكُلُوا۟ مِنۢ بُيُوتِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ ءَابَآئِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ أُمَّهَٰتِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ إِخْوَٰنِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ أَخَوَٰتِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ أَعْمَٰمِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ عَمَّٰتِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ أَخْوَٰلِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ خَٰلَٰتِكُمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكْتُم مَّفَاتِحَهُۥٓ أَوْ صَدِيقِكُمْ ۚ لَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ جُنَاحٌ أَن تَأْكُلُوا۟ جَمِيعًا أَوْ أَشْتَاتًۭا ۚ فَإِذَا دَخَلْتُم بُيُوتًۭا فَسَلِّمُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِكُمْ تَحِيَّةًۭ مِّنْ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ مُبَٰرَكَةًۭ طَيِّبَةًۭ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمُ ٱلْءَايَٰتِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ
ayah_en: There is no harm if the blind, the lame, the sick or you yourselves eat in your own houses, or in the houses of your fathers, or mothers, or brothers, or sisters, or paternal uncles, or paternal aunts, or maternal uncles, or maternal aunts, or in those that you are in charge of or in the house of a friend. There is no objection to your eating together or separately. But when you enter houses, salute one another with a greeting of peace, a greeting from your Lord full of blessings and purity. Thus does God expound to you His commandments, so that you may understand.

ayah_ar: إِنَّمَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَإِذَا كَانُوا۟ مَعَهُۥ عَلَىٰٓ أَمْرٍۢ جَامِعٍۢ لَّمْ يَذْهَبُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ يَسْتَـْٔذِنُوهُ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَسْتَـْٔذِنُونَكَ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ ۚ فَإِذَا ٱسْتَـْٔذَنُوكَ لِبَعْضِ شَأْنِهِمْ فَأْذَن لِّمَن شِئْتَ مِنْهُمْ وَٱسْتَغْفِرْ لَهُمُ ٱللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
ayah_en: They only are true believers who believe in God and His Messenger. When they are with him on some matter of common concern, they should not depart until they have asked him for permission to do so. Those who ask you for such permission are the ones who truly believe in God and His Messenger. When they ask you for permission to attend to some affair of their own, then grant it to whoever you please and seek forgiveness from God for them. God is forgiving and merciful.

ayah_ar: لَّا تَجْعَلُوا۟ دُعَآءَ ٱلرَّسُولِ بَيْنَكُمْ كَدُعَآءِ بَعْضِكُم بَعْضًۭا ۚ قَدْ يَعْلَمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَسَلَّلُونَ مِنكُمْ لِوَاذًۭا ۚ فَلْيَحْذَرِ ٱلَّذِينَ يُخَالِفُونَ عَنْ أَمْرِهِۦٓ أَن تُصِيبَهُمْ فِتْنَةٌ أَوْ يُصِيبَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
ayah_en: Do not treat being called by the Messenger like being called by one another. God knows those of you who slip away on some pretext. Let those who go against his order beware lest some affliction befall them or they receive a painful punishment.

ayah_ar: أَلَآ إِنَّ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ قَدْ يَعْلَمُ مَآ أَنتُمْ عَلَيْهِ وَيَوْمَ يُرْجَعُونَ إِلَيْهِ فَيُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا عَمِلُوا۟ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌۢ
ayah_en: Surely, whatever is in the heavens and on the earth belongs to God. God knows well what condition you are in. On the Day when they return to Him, He will declare to them all that they have done. God has full knowledge of all things.

ayah_ar: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِى نَزَّلَ ٱلْفُرْقَانَ عَلَىٰ عَبْدِهِۦ لِيَكُونَ لِلْعَٰلَمِينَ نَذِيرًا
ayah_en: Blessed be He who has revealed the criterion \[the Quran\] to His servant that he may warn the nations.

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَمْ يَتَّخِذْ وَلَدًۭا وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُۥ شَرِيكٌۭ فِى ٱلْمُلْكِ وَخَلَقَ كُلَّ شَىْءٍۢ فَقَدَّرَهُۥ تَقْدِيرًۭا
ayah_en: Sovereign of the heavens and the earth, who has begotten no children and who has no partner in His sovereignty, it is He who has created all things and measured them out precisely.

ayah_ar: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةًۭ لَّا يَخْلُقُونَ شَيْـًۭٔا وَهُمْ يُخْلَقُونَ وَلَا يَمْلِكُونَ لِأَنفُسِهِمْ ضَرًّۭا وَلَا نَفْعًۭا وَلَا يَمْلِكُونَ مَوْتًۭا وَلَا حَيَوٰةًۭ وَلَا نُشُورًۭا
ayah_en: Yet they have taken, besides Him, deities who create nothing and are themselves created, and who have no power to harm, or benefit themselves and who control neither death, nor life, nor resurrection.

ayah_ar: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَٰذَآ إِلَّآ إِفْكٌ ٱفْتَرَىٰهُ وَأَعَانَهُۥ عَلَيْهِ قَوْمٌ ءَاخَرُونَ ۖ فَقَدْ جَآءُو ظُلْمًۭا وَزُورًۭا
ayah_en: Those who deny the truth say, "This is only a forgery of his own invention in which others have helped him." What they say is unjust and false.

ayah_ar: وَقَالُوٓا۟ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ ٱكْتَتَبَهَا فَهِىَ تُمْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ بُكْرَةًۭ وَأَصِيلًۭا
ayah_en: They say, "It is just fables of the ancients, which he has had written down. They are dictated to him morning and evening."

ayah_ar: قُلْ أَنزَلَهُ ٱلَّذِى يَعْلَمُ ٱلسِّرَّ فِى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفُورًۭا رَّحِيمًۭا
ayah_en: Say to them, "It has been revealed by Him who knows every secret that is in the heavens and on the earth. Truly, He is most forgiving and most merciful."

ayah_ar: وَقَالُوا۟ مَالِ هَٰذَا ٱلرَّسُولِ يَأْكُلُ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَيَمْشِى فِى ٱلْأَسْوَاقِ ۙ لَوْلَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْهِ مَلَكٌۭ فَيَكُونَ مَعَهُۥ نَذِيرًا
ayah_en: They say, "What kind of a messenger is this who eats food and walks about in the market-places? Why has no angel been sent down with him to warn us?"

ayah_ar: أَوْ يُلْقَىٰٓ إِلَيْهِ كَنزٌ أَوْ تَكُونُ لَهُۥ جَنَّةٌۭ يَأْكُلُ مِنْهَا ۚ وَقَالَ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ إِن تَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا رَجُلًۭا مَّسْحُورًا
ayah_en: Or a treasure should have been sent down to him, or he should have had a garden from which to eat." The wrongdoers say, "You are surely following a man who is bewitched."

ayah_ar: ٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ ضَرَبُوا۟ لَكَ ٱلْأَمْثَٰلَ فَضَلُّوا۟ فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ سَبِيلًۭا
ayah_en: Observe what kind of things they attribute to you. They have surely gone astray and cannot find the right way again.

ayah_ar: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِىٓ إِن شَآءَ جَعَلَ لَكَ خَيْرًۭا مِّن ذَٰلِكَ جَنَّٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَٰرُ وَيَجْعَل لَّكَ قُصُورًۢا
ayah_en: Blessed is He who, if He please, can give you better things than that; gardens watered by flowing streams, and palaces too.

ayah_ar: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِٱلسَّاعَةِ ۖ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لِمَن كَذَّبَ بِٱلسَّاعَةِ سَعِيرًا
ayah_en: They deny the Hour. For those who deny that Hour, We have prepared a blazing fire.

ayah_ar: إِذَا رَأَتْهُم مِّن مَّكَانٍۭ بَعِيدٍۢ سَمِعُوا۟ لَهَا تَغَيُّظًۭا وَزَفِيرًۭا
ayah_en: When it sees them from afar, they will hear its raging and roaring.

ayah_ar: وَإِذَآ أُلْقُوا۟ مِنْهَا مَكَانًۭا ضَيِّقًۭا مُّقَرَّنِينَ دَعَوْا۟ هُنَالِكَ ثُبُورًۭا
ayah_en: When they are thrown into a narrow space, chained together, they will plead for death.

ayah_ar: لَّا تَدْعُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ ثُبُورًۭا وَٰحِدًۭا وَٱدْعُوا۟ ثُبُورًۭا كَثِيرًۭا
ayah_en: But they will be told, "Do not call today for one death, call for many deaths!"

ayah_ar: قُلْ أَذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ أَمْ جَنَّةُ ٱلْخُلْدِ ٱلَّتِى وُعِدَ ٱلْمُتَّقُونَ ۚ كَانَتْ لَهُمْ جَزَآءًۭ وَمَصِيرًۭا
ayah_en: Say, "Which is better, this or the Paradise of immortality which the righteous have been promised? It is their recompense and their destination."

ayah_ar: لَّهُمْ فِيهَا مَا يَشَآءُونَ خَٰلِدِينَ ۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ وَعْدًۭا مَّسْـُٔولًۭا
ayah_en: Abiding there forever, they shall find in it all that they desire. This is a binding promise which your Lord has made.

ayah_ar: وَيَوْمَ يَحْشُرُهُمْ وَمَا يَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ فَيَقُولُ ءَأَنتُمْ أَضْلَلْتُمْ عِبَادِى هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ أَمْ هُمْ ضَلُّوا۟ ٱلسَّبِيلَ
ayah_en: On the Day He gathers them all together with those they worship besides Him, He will say, "Was it you who misled My servants, or did they stray away by themselves?"

ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ سُبْحَٰنَكَ مَا كَانَ يَنۢبَغِى لَنَآ أَن نَّتَّخِذَ مِن دُونِكَ مِنْ أَوْلِيَآءَ وَلَٰكِن مَّتَّعْتَهُمْ وَءَابَآءَهُمْ حَتَّىٰ نَسُوا۟ ٱلذِّكْرَ وَكَانُوا۟ قَوْمًۢا بُورًۭا
ayah_en: They will answer, "Hallowed be You! It was not proper for us to choose any guardian other than You. But You gave them and their fathers the comforts of this life, so that they forgot Your reminder and thus brought destruction upon themselves."

ayah_ar: فَقَدْ كَذَّبُوكُم بِمَا تَقُولُونَ فَمَا تَسْتَطِيعُونَ صَرْفًۭا وَلَا نَصْرًۭا ۚ وَمَن يَظْلِم مِّنكُمْ نُذِقْهُ عَذَابًۭا كَبِيرًۭا
ayah_en: \[God will say\], "Now, they have given the lie to all your assertions, and you can neither ward off \[your punishment\] nor obtain any help." For, whoever of you has committed evil, shall be caused by Us to taste great suffering!"

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَا قَبْلَكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ إِلَّآ إِنَّهُمْ لَيَأْكُلُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَيَمْشُونَ فِى ٱلْأَسْوَاقِ ۗ وَجَعَلْنَا بَعْضَكُمْ لِبَعْضٍۢ فِتْنَةً أَتَصْبِرُونَ ۗ وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ بَصِيرًۭا
ayah_en: We never sent any messengers before you who did not eat food and walk in the market-place. We make some of you a means of trial for others, to see whether you are steadfast. Your Lord is all seeing.

ayah_ar: ۞ وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَرْجُونَ لِقَآءَنَا لَوْلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيْنَا ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ أَوْ نَرَىٰ رَبَّنَا ۗ لَقَدِ ٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ فِىٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَعَتَوْ عُتُوًّۭا كَبِيرًۭا
ayah_en: Those who do not expect a meeting with Us say, "Why are angels not sent down to us?" Or "Why do we not see our Lord?" Surely, they are too proud of themselves and have greatly exceeded all bounds.

ayah_ar: يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَ ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ لَا بُشْرَىٰ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُجْرِمِينَ وَيَقُولُونَ حِجْرًۭا مَّحْجُورًۭا
ayah_en: There will be no good tidings for the guilty on the day they see the angels; and they will cry out, "Keep away, keep away!"

ayah_ar: وَقَدِمْنَآ إِلَىٰ مَا عَمِلُوا۟ مِنْ عَمَلٍۢ فَجَعَلْنَٰهُ هَبَآءًۭ مَّنثُورًا
ayah_en: and We shall take all that they did and turn it into scattered dust.

ayah_ar: أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْجَنَّةِ يَوْمَئِذٍ خَيْرٌۭ مُّسْتَقَرًّۭا وَأَحْسَنُ مَقِيلًۭا
ayah_en: The inhabitants of the Garden will have the best residence and the finest lodging on that Day.

ayah_ar: وَيَوْمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِٱلْغَمَٰمِ وَنُزِّلَ ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ تَنزِيلًا
ayah_en: On a Day when the sky will split open with its clouds and the angels are sent down rank upon rank,

ayah_ar: ٱلْمُلْكُ يَوْمَئِذٍ ٱلْحَقُّ لِلرَّحْمَٰنِ ۚ وَكَانَ يَوْمًا عَلَى ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ عَسِيرًۭا
ayah_en: true sovereignty on that Day will belong to the Gracious One, and it will be a hard Day for those who deny the truth.

ayah_ar: وَيَوْمَ يَعَضُّ ٱلظَّالِمُ عَلَىٰ يَدَيْهِ يَقُولُ يَٰلَيْتَنِى ٱتَّخَذْتُ مَعَ ٱلرَّسُولِ سَبِيلًۭا
ayah_en: On that Day, the wrongdoer will bite his hands and say, "Would that I had walked in the Messenger's path!

ayah_ar: يَٰوَيْلَتَىٰ لَيْتَنِى لَمْ أَتَّخِذْ فُلَانًا خَلِيلًۭا
ayah_en: Oh, would that I had never chosen such a one for my companion --

ayah_ar: لَّقَدْ أَضَلَّنِى عَنِ ٱلذِّكْرِ بَعْدَ إِذْ جَآءَنِى ۗ وَكَانَ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنُ لِلْإِنسَٰنِ خَذُولًۭا
ayah_en: he made me forgetful of the warning after it had reached me. Satan is man's great betrayer."

ayah_ar: وَقَالَ ٱلرَّسُولُ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ قَوْمِى ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ هَٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ مَهْجُورًۭا
ayah_en: The Messenger will say, "Lord, my people did indeed discard the Quran,"

ayah_ar: وَكَذَٰلِكَ جَعَلْنَا لِكُلِّ نَبِىٍّ عَدُوًّۭا مِّنَ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ ۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ هَادِيًۭا وَنَصِيرًۭا
ayah_en: thus did We assign to every prophet an enemy from among the sinners; your Lord is sufficient as a guide and a helper.

ayah_ar: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَوْلَا نُزِّلَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلْقُرْءَانُ جُمْلَةًۭ وَٰحِدَةًۭ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ لِنُثَبِّتَ بِهِۦ فُؤَادَكَ ۖ وَرَتَّلْنَٰهُ تَرْتِيلًۭا
ayah_en: Those who deny the truth say, "Why was the Quran not sent down to him in a single revelation?" We sent it in this manner, so that We might strengthen your heart. We gave it to you in gradual revelation.

ayah_ar: وَلَا يَأْتُونَكَ بِمَثَلٍ إِلَّا جِئْنَٰكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَأَحْسَنَ تَفْسِيرًا
ayah_en: Every time they raise an objection, We will bring you the truth and the best of explanations.

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ يُحْشَرُونَ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ شَرٌّۭ مَّكَانًۭا وَأَضَلُّ سَبِيلًۭا
ayah_en: Those who will be dragged headlong into Hell shall have an evil place to dwell in, for they have strayed far from the right path.

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْكِتَٰبَ وَجَعَلْنَا مَعَهُۥٓ أَخَاهُ هَٰرُونَ وَزِيرًۭا
ayah_en: We gave Moses the Book, and appointed his brother Aaron as his supporter.

ayah_ar: فَقُلْنَا ٱذْهَبَآ إِلَى ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَدَمَّرْنَٰهُمْ تَدْمِيرًۭا
ayah_en: Then We said, "Go together to the people who have denied Our signs." We utterly destroyed them!

ayah_ar: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍۢ لَّمَّا كَذَّبُوا۟ ٱلرُّسُلَ أَغْرَقْنَٰهُمْ وَجَعَلْنَٰهُمْ لِلنَّاسِ ءَايَةًۭ ۖ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لِلظَّٰلِمِينَ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۭا
ayah_en: We drowned the people of Noah also when they rejected their messengers and We made them an example to all mankind. We have prepared a painful punishment for the wrongdoers,

ayah_ar: وَعَادًۭا وَثَمُودَا۟ وَأَصْحَٰبَ ٱلرَّسِّ وَقُرُونًۢا بَيْنَ ذَٰلِكَ كَثِيرًۭا
ayah_en: to 'Ad, and Thamud, and the people of al-Rass, and as We did for the many a generation between them.

ayah_ar: وَكُلًّۭا ضَرَبْنَا لَهُ ٱلْأَمْثَٰلَ ۖ وَكُلًّۭا تَبَّرْنَا تَتْبِيرًۭا
ayah_en: To each of them We gave warnings and each of them We destroyed completely.

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ أَتَوْا۟ عَلَى ٱلْقَرْيَةِ ٱلَّتِىٓ أُمْطِرَتْ مَطَرَ ٱلسَّوْءِ ۚ أَفَلَمْ يَكُونُوا۟ يَرَوْنَهَا ۚ بَلْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يَرْجُونَ نُشُورًۭا
ayah_en: Indeed they must have come upon the town on which an evil rain had poured down. Did they not see it? Yet they have no faith in the Resurrection.

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا رَأَوْكَ إِن يَتَّخِذُونَكَ إِلَّا هُزُوًا أَهَٰذَا ٱلَّذِى بَعَثَ ٱللَّهُ رَسُولًا
ayah_en: Whenever they see you they only make a mockery of you -- "Is this the one God has sent as His Messenger?

ayah_ar: إِن كَادَ لَيُضِلُّنَا عَنْ ءَالِهَتِنَا لَوْلَآ أَن صَبَرْنَا عَلَيْهَا ۚ وَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ حِينَ يَرَوْنَ ٱلْعَذَابَ مَنْ أَضَلُّ سَبِيلًا
ayah_en: Indeed, he would well-nigh have led us astray from our deities, had we not been \[so\] steadfastly attached to them!" When they behold the punishment, they shall realize who strayed furthest from the right path.

ayah_ar: أَرَءَيْتَ مَنِ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَٰهَهُۥ هَوَىٰهُ أَفَأَنتَ تَكُونُ عَلَيْهِ وَكِيلًا
ayah_en: Have you seen him who has taken his own desire to be his god? Can you be a guardian over him?

ayah_ar: أَمْ تَحْسَبُ أَنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ يَسْمَعُونَ أَوْ يَعْقِلُونَ ۚ إِنْ هُمْ إِلَّا كَٱلْأَنْعَٰمِ ۖ بَلْ هُمْ أَضَلُّ سَبِيلًا
ayah_en: Do you think most of them can hear or understand? They are like cattle. Indeed, they are even more astray.

ayah_ar: أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَيْفَ مَدَّ ٱلظِّلَّ وَلَوْ شَآءَ لَجَعَلَهُۥ سَاكِنًۭا ثُمَّ جَعَلْنَا ٱلشَّمْسَ عَلَيْهِ دَلِيلًۭا
ayah_en: Have you not seen how your Lord lengthens the shadows? Had He pleased, He could have made them constant; then We placed the sun as an indicator for them,

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ قَبَضْنَٰهُ إِلَيْنَا قَبْضًۭا يَسِيرًۭا
ayah_en: then We withdrew it to Us, a gradual withdrawal.

ayah_ar: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيْلَ لِبَاسًۭا وَٱلنَّوْمَ سُبَاتًۭا وَجَعَلَ ٱلنَّهَارَ نُشُورًۭا
ayah_en: It is He who made the night a mantle for you, and sleep for repose; and made the day a time for rising.

ayah_ar: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَرْسَلَ ٱلرِّيَٰحَ بُشْرًۢا بَيْنَ يَدَىْ رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۭ طَهُورًۭا
ayah_en: It is He who sends the winds as heralds of His mercy and We send down pure water from the sky,

ayah_ar: لِّنُحْۦِىَ بِهِۦ بَلْدَةًۭ مَّيْتًۭا وَنُسْقِيَهُۥ مِمَّا خَلَقْنَآ أَنْعَٰمًۭا وَأَنَاسِىَّ كَثِيرًۭا
ayah_en: so that We may bring life to a dead land; and slake the thirst of Our creation; cattle and men, in great numbers.

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ صَرَّفْنَٰهُ بَيْنَهُمْ لِيَذَّكَّرُوا۟ فَأَبَىٰٓ أَكْثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ إِلَّا كُفُورًۭا
ayah_en: We have explained it to them in diverse ways, so that they may take heed, but most persist in their ingratitude.

ayah_ar: وَلَوْ شِئْنَا لَبَعَثْنَا فِى كُلِّ قَرْيَةٍۢ نَّذِيرًۭا
ayah_en: If We had so wished, We might have sent a warner into every town,

ayah_ar: فَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ وَجَٰهِدْهُم بِهِۦ جِهَادًۭا كَبِيرًۭا
ayah_en: so do not yield to those who deny the truth, but strive with the utmost strenuousness by means of this \[Quran, to convey its message to them\].

ayah_ar: ۞ وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى مَرَجَ ٱلْبَحْرَيْنِ هَٰذَا عَذْبٌۭ فُرَاتٌۭ وَهَٰذَا مِلْحٌ أُجَاجٌۭ وَجَعَلَ بَيْنَهُمَا بَرْزَخًۭا وَحِجْرًۭا مَّحْجُورًۭا
ayah_en: It is He who released the two bodies of flowing water, one sweet and fresh and the other salty and bitter, and set up an insurmountable barrier between them.

ayah_ar: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ مِنَ ٱلْمَآءِ بَشَرًۭا فَجَعَلَهُۥ نَسَبًۭا وَصِهْرًۭا ۗ وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ قَدِيرًۭا
ayah_en: It is He who has created human beings from water and He has granted them the ties of blood as well as marriage. Your Lord is all powerful.

ayah_ar: وَيَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُهُمْ وَلَا يَضُرُّهُمْ ۗ وَكَانَ ٱلْكَافِرُ عَلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ ظَهِيرًۭا
ayah_en: Yet they worship besides God that which can neither benefit them nor harm them. One who denies the truth is a helper \[of evil\] against his Lord.

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَٰكَ إِلَّا مُبَشِّرًۭا وَنَذِيرًۭا
ayah_en: We have sent you only as a bearer of glad tidings and as a warner.

ayah_ar: قُلْ مَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ أَن يَتَّخِذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًۭا
ayah_en: Say, "I do not ask you for any recompense for this except that anyone who so wishes should take the right path to his Lord."

ayah_ar: وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱلْحَىِّ ٱلَّذِى لَا يَمُوتُ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِهِۦ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِهِۦ بِذُنُوبِ عِبَادِهِۦ خَبِيرًا
ayah_en: Put your trust in the One who is the Ever-Living \[God\], who never dies, and glorify Him with His praise. He is fully aware of the sins of His servants;

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍۢ ثُمَّ ٱسْتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْعَرْشِ ۚ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنُ فَسْـَٔلْ بِهِۦ خَبِيرًۭا
ayah_en: it is He who created the heavens and the earth and all that is between them in six Days \[periods\], then settled Himself on the throne -- the Gracious One. Ask any informed person about Him.

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱسْجُدُوا۟ لِلرَّحْمَٰنِ قَالُوا۟ وَمَا ٱلرَّحْمَٰنُ أَنَسْجُدُ لِمَا تَأْمُرُنَا وَزَادَهُمْ نُفُورًۭا ۩
ayah_en: When they are told, "Prostrate yourselves before the Gracious One," they ask, "Who is this Gracious One? Shall we prostrate ourselves before whatever you will?" This increases their aversion.

ayah_ar: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ بُرُوجًۭا وَجَعَلَ فِيهَا سِرَٰجًۭا وَقَمَرًۭا مُّنِيرًۭا
ayah_en: Exalted is He who put constellations in the heavens, a radiant lamp and an illuminating moon --

ayah_ar: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ خِلْفَةًۭ لِّمَنْ أَرَادَ أَن يَذَّكَّرَ أَوْ أَرَادَ شُكُورًۭا
ayah_en: it is He who has made night and day succeed each other, a sign for those who would take heed and would be grateful.

ayah_ar: وَعِبَادُ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَمْشُونَ عَلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ هَوْنًۭا وَإِذَا خَاطَبَهُمُ ٱلْجَٰهِلُونَ قَالُوا۟ سَلَٰمًۭا
ayah_en: The true servants of the Gracious One are those who walk upon the earth with humility and when they are addressed by the ignorant ones, their response is, "Peace";

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَبِيتُونَ لِرَبِّهِمْ سُجَّدًۭا وَقِيَٰمًۭا
ayah_en: and those who spend the night prostrating themselves, and standing before their Lord,

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا ٱصْرِفْ عَنَّا عَذَابَ جَهَنَّمَ ۖ إِنَّ عَذَابَهَا كَانَ غَرَامًا
ayah_en: who say, "Our Lord, ward off from us the punishment of Hell, for its punishment is a dreadful torment to suffer.

ayah_ar: إِنَّهَا سَآءَتْ مُسْتَقَرًّۭا وَمُقَامًۭا
ayah_en: Indeed, it is an evil abode and evil dwelling-place."

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَنفَقُوا۟ لَمْ يُسْرِفُوا۟ وَلَمْ يَقْتُرُوا۟ وَكَانَ بَيْنَ ذَٰلِكَ قَوَامًۭا
ayah_en: They are those who are neither extravagant nor niggardly, but keep a balance between the two;

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَدْعُونَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ وَلَا يَقْتُلُونَ ٱلنَّفْسَ ٱلَّتِى حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا يَزْنُونَ ۚ وَمَن يَفْعَلْ ذَٰلِكَ يَلْقَ أَثَامًۭا
ayah_en: those who never invoke any other deity besides God, nor take a life which God has made sacred, except with the right to do so, nor commit adultery. Anyone who does that shall face punishment:

ayah_ar: يُضَٰعَفْ لَهُ ٱلْعَذَابُ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ وَيَخْلُدْ فِيهِۦ مُهَانًا
ayah_en: he shall have his suffering doubled on the Day of Resurrection and he will abide forever in disgrace,

ayah_ar: إِلَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ عَمَلًۭا صَٰلِحًۭا فَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ يُبَدِّلُ ٱللَّهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمْ حَسَنَٰتٍۢ ۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورًۭا رَّحِيمًۭا
ayah_en: except for those who repent and believe and do good deeds. God will change the evil deeds of such people into good ones: He is most forgiving and most merciful.

ayah_ar: وَمَن تَابَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحًۭا فَإِنَّهُۥ يَتُوبُ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَتَابًۭا
ayah_en: He who repents and does good deeds has truly turned to God.

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَشْهَدُونَ ٱلزُّورَ وَإِذَا مَرُّوا۟ بِٱللَّغْوِ مَرُّوا۟ كِرَامًۭا
ayah_en: And those who do not bear false witness, and when they pass by frivolity, they pass by with dignity;

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِّرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ لَمْ يَخِرُّوا۟ عَلَيْهَا صُمًّۭا وَعُمْيَانًۭا
ayah_en: who do not turn a blind eye and a deaf ear to the signs of their Lord when they are reminded of them;

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا هَبْ لَنَا مِنْ أَزْوَٰجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّٰتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعْيُنٍۢ وَٱجْعَلْنَا لِلْمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا
ayah_en: who say, "Lord, grant us joy in our wives and children and make us a model for the righteous."

ayah_ar: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ يُجْزَوْنَ ٱلْغُرْفَةَ بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ وَيُلَقَّوْنَ فِيهَا تَحِيَّةًۭ وَسَلَٰمًا
ayah_en: These are the ones who will be rewarded with lofty mansions in Paradise, for their steadfastness. They will be received therein with greetings of welcome and salutations of peace.

ayah_ar: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ حَسُنَتْ مُسْتَقَرًّۭا وَمُقَامًۭا
ayah_en: There they shall abide forever: a blessed dwelling and a blessed resting place.

ayah_ar: قُلْ مَا يَعْبَؤُا۟ بِكُمْ رَبِّى لَوْلَا دُعَآؤُكُمْ ۖ فَقَدْ كَذَّبْتُمْ فَسَوْفَ يَكُونُ لِزَامًۢا
ayah_en: Say, "What would my Lord care for you, if you do not call on Him. Because you have indeed rejected the truth and His punishment is bound to overtake you.

ayah_ar: طسٓمٓ
ayah_en: Ta Sin Mim.

ayah_ar: تِلْكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ ٱلْمُبِينِ
ayah_en: These are the verses of the Book that makes things clear.

ayah_ar: لَعَلَّكَ بَٰخِعٌۭ نَّفْسَكَ أَلَّا يَكُونُوا۟ مُؤْمِنِينَ
ayah_en: It may be that you will destroy yourself with grief because they will not believe.

ayah_ar: إِن نَّشَأْ نُنَزِّلْ عَلَيْهِم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ ءَايَةًۭ فَظَلَّتْ أَعْنَٰقُهُمْ لَهَا خَٰضِعِينَ
ayah_en: But if We had so willed, We could have sent down to them a sign from the heavens so that their heads would be bowed down before it in utter humility.

ayah_ar: وَمَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن ذِكْرٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ مُحْدَثٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ عَنْهُ مُعْرِضِينَ
ayah_en: Whenever there comes to them any fresh warning from the Merciful, they always turn their backs on it:

ayah_ar: فَقَدْ كَذَّبُوا۟ فَسَيَأْتِيهِمْ أَنۢبَٰٓؤُا۟ مَا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
ayah_en: they have indeed rejected the message. But the truth of what they laughed to scorn will dawn upon them before long.

ayah_ar: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ إِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ كَمْ أَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍۢ كَرِيمٍ
ayah_en: Do they not see the earth, and what beneficial kinds of things We have caused to grow in it?

ayah_ar: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةًۭ ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
ayah_en: Surely in this there is a sign, yet most of them would not believe:

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayah_en: truly, your Lord is the Mighty One, the Merciful.

ayah_ar: وَإِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبُّكَ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱئْتِ ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
ayah_en: When your Lord called out to Moses, saying, "Go to the wrongdoing people,

ayah_ar: قَوْمَ فِرْعَوْنَ ۚ أَلَا يَتَّقُونَ
ayah_en: the people of Pharaoh, will they not fear God?

ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ أَن يُكَذِّبُونِ
ayah_en: Moses replied, "My Lord, I fear they will reject me,

ayah_ar: وَيَضِيقُ صَدْرِى وَلَا يَنطَلِقُ لِسَانِى فَأَرْسِلْ إِلَىٰ هَٰرُونَ
ayah_en: and "my breast is straitened and my tongue is not fluent; so send Aaron as well;

ayah_ar: وَلَهُمْ عَلَىَّ ذَنۢبٌۭ فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقْتُلُونِ
ayah_en: besides, they accuse me of a crime, and I fear that they may put me to death."

ayah_ar: قَالَ كَلَّا ۖ فَٱذْهَبَا بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ ۖ إِنَّا مَعَكُم مُّسْتَمِعُونَ
ayah_en: God said, "Indeed not; go both of you with Our signs, We shall be with you, listening \[to your call\].

ayah_ar: فَأْتِيَا فِرْعَوْنَ فَقُولَآ إِنَّا رَسُولُ رَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_en: Go to Pharaoh, both of you, and say, 'We are messengers from the Lord of the Worlds:

ayah_ar: أَنْ أَرْسِلْ مَعَنَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
ayah_en: let the Children of Israel go with us!'"

ayah_ar: قَالَ أَلَمْ نُرَبِّكَ فِينَا وَلِيدًۭا وَلَبِثْتَ فِينَا مِنْ عُمُرِكَ سِنِينَ
ayah_en: Pharaoh said to Moses, "Did we not bring you up among us as a child? And you spent several years of your life with us.

ayah_ar: وَفَعَلْتَ فَعْلَتَكَ ٱلَّتِى فَعَلْتَ وَأَنتَ مِنَ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ
ayah_en: Yet you committed the deed you did, surely you are one of the ingrates."

ayah_ar: قَالَ فَعَلْتُهَآ إِذًۭا وَأَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
ayah_en: Moses replied, "I did that when I was one of the misguided,

ayah_ar: فَفَرَرْتُ مِنكُمْ لَمَّا خِفْتُكُمْ فَوَهَبَ لِى رَبِّى حُكْمًۭا وَجَعَلَنِى مِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
ayah_en: and I fled from you because I feared you. Then my Lord granted me wisdom and made me one of the messengers.

ayah_ar: وَتِلْكَ نِعْمَةٌۭ تَمُنُّهَا عَلَىَّ أَنْ عَبَّدتَّ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
ayah_en: And this is the favour with which you taunt me -- that you have enslaved the Children of Israel?"

ayah_ar: قَالَ فِرْعَوْنُ وَمَا رَبُّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_en: Pharaoh said, "What is this: Lord of the Universe?"

ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ
ayah_en: Moses said, "Lord of the heavens and the earth and all that is between them, if only you would be convinced."

ayah_ar: قَالَ لِمَنْ حَوْلَهُۥٓ أَلَا تَسْتَمِعُونَ
ayah_en: Pharaoh said to those around him, "Did you hear?"

ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبُّكُمْ وَرَبُّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
ayah_en: Moses went on, "He is your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers."

ayah_ar: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِىٓ أُرْسِلَ إِلَيْكُمْ لَمَجْنُونٌۭ
ayah_en: Pharaoh said, "This messenger who has been sent to you is surely possessed!"

ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلْمَشْرِقِ وَٱلْمَغْرِبِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ
ayah_en: Moses said, "He is the Lord of the East and the West, and all that lies between them, if only you could understand."

ayah_ar: قَالَ لَئِنِ ٱتَّخَذْتَ إِلَٰهًا غَيْرِى لَأَجْعَلَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْمَسْجُونِينَ
ayah_en: Pharaoh said, "If you take any deity other than myself, I will throw you into prison,"

ayah_ar: قَالَ أَوَلَوْ جِئْتُكَ بِشَىْءٍۢ مُّبِينٍۢ
ayah_en: and Moses asked, "Even if I show you a clear sign?"

ayah_ar: قَالَ فَأْتِ بِهِۦٓ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ
ayah_en: Pharaoh said, "Show it then, if you are telling the truth!"

ayah_ar: فَأَلْقَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِىَ ثُعْبَانٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
ayah_en: So Moses threw down his staff and suddenly it appeared as a serpent, plainly visible.

ayah_ar: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهُۥ فَإِذَا هِىَ بَيْضَآءُ لِلنَّٰظِرِينَ
ayah_en: And he drew out his hand, and it appeared \[shining\] white to the beholders.

ayah_ar: قَالَ لِلْمَلَإِ حَوْلَهُۥٓ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسَٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٌۭ
ayah_en: Pharaoh said to the chiefs around him, "Surely this man is a skilful sorcerer.

ayah_ar: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخْرِجَكُم مِّنْ أَرْضِكُم بِسِحْرِهِۦ فَمَاذَا تَأْمُرُونَ
ayah_en: Who wants to drive you out of your land by his sorcery. Now what do you advise?"

ayah_ar: قَالُوٓا۟ أَرْجِهْ وَأَخَاهُ وَٱبْعَثْ فِى ٱلْمَدَآئِنِ حَٰشِرِينَ
ayah_en: They said, "Let him and his brother wait a while, and send heralds into the cities,

ayah_ar: يَأْتُوكَ بِكُلِّ سَحَّارٍ عَلِيمٍۢ
ayah_en: who shall bring to you every skilful sorcerer."

ayah_ar: فَجُمِعَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ لِمِيقَٰتِ يَوْمٍۢ مَّعْلُومٍۢ
ayah_en: So the sorcerers were gathered on the appointed day

ayah_ar: وَقِيلَ لِلنَّاسِ هَلْ أَنتُم مُّجْتَمِعُونَ
ayah_en: and the people were told, "Will you also gather together,

ayah_ar: لَعَلَّنَا نَتَّبِعُ ٱلسَّحَرَةَ إِن كَانُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْغَٰلِبِينَ
ayah_en: so that we may follow the magicians, if they be the winners."

ayah_ar: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ قَالُوا۟ لِفِرْعَوْنَ أَئِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجْرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحْنُ ٱلْغَٰلِبِينَ
ayah_en: When the magicians came, they asked Pharaoh, "Shall we have a reward, if we are the winners?"

ayah_ar: قَالَ نَعَمْ وَإِنَّكُمْ إِذًۭا لَّمِنَ ٱلْمُقَرَّبِينَ
ayah_en: He replied, "Certainly, in that case you will join my inner circle."

ayah_ar: قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰٓ أَلْقُوا۟ مَآ أَنتُم مُّلْقُونَ
ayah_en: Moses said to the magicians, "Throw down whatever you are going to throw."

ayah_ar: فَأَلْقَوْا۟ حِبَالَهُمْ وَعِصِيَّهُمْ وَقَالُوا۟ بِعِزَّةِ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّا لَنَحْنُ ٱلْغَٰلِبُونَ
ayah_en: So they cast down their ropes and staffs, and said, "By Pharaoh's honour, we shall surely win."

ayah_ar: فَأَلْقَىٰ مُوسَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَلْقَفُ مَا يَأْفِكُونَ
ayah_en: Then Moses threw down his staff, and it swallowed up all that they had conjured into being.

ayah_ar: فَأُلْقِىَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ سَٰجِدِينَ
ayah_en: The magicians fell down prostrate,

ayah_ar: قَالُوٓا۟ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_en: saying, "We believe in the Lord of the Worlds,

ayah_ar: رَبِّ مُوسَىٰ وَهَٰرُونَ
ayah_en: the Lord of Moses and Aaron."

ayah_ar: قَالَ ءَامَنتُمْ لَهُۥ قَبْلَ أَنْ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكَبِيرُكُمُ ٱلَّذِى عَلَّمَكُمُ ٱلسِّحْرَ فَلَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ ۚ لَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيْدِيَكُمْ وَأَرْجُلَكُم مِّنْ خِلَٰفٍۢ وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
ayah_en: Pharaoh said, "Have you come to believe in him, before I have given you permission? He is surely your master who has taught you magic. But you shall see. I will cut off your hands and feet on alternate sides and crucify you all."

ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ لَا ضَيْرَ ۖ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا مُنقَلِبُونَ
ayah_en: They said, "There is no harm. To our Lord we shall return.

ayah_ar: إِنَّا نَطْمَعُ أَن يَغْفِرَ لَنَا رَبُّنَا خَطَٰيَٰنَآ أَن كُنَّآ أَوَّلَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayah_en: We hope our Lord will forgive us, as we are the first of the believers."

ayah_ar: ۞ وَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنْ أَسْرِ بِعِبَادِىٓ إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ
ayah_en: Then We revealed Our will to Moses, saying, "Set forth with My servants, in the night, for you will surely be pursued."

ayah_ar: فَأَرْسَلَ فِرْعَوْنُ فِى ٱلْمَدَآئِنِ حَٰشِرِينَ
ayah_en: And Pharaoh sent forth heralds to all the cities.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَشِرْذِمَةٌۭ قَلِيلُونَ
ayah_en: "These," they said, "are only a small band,

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّهُمْ لَنَا لَغَآئِظُونَ
ayah_en: and they have enraged us,

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّا لَجَمِيعٌ حَٰذِرُونَ
ayah_en: we are a large and watchful force."

ayah_ar: فَأَخْرَجْنَٰهُم مِّن جَنَّٰتٍۢ وَعُيُونٍۢ
ayah_en: So We made them leave their gardens and springs,

ayah_ar: وَكُنُوزٍۢ وَمَقَامٍۢ كَرِيمٍۢ
ayah_en: their treasures and their noble dwellings --

ayah_ar: كَذَٰلِكَ وَأَوْرَثْنَٰهَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
ayah_en: and We made the Children of Israel inheritors of these bounties.

ayah_ar: فَأَتْبَعُوهُم مُّشْرِقِينَ
ayah_en: Pharaoh and his people pursued them at sunrise,

ayah_ar: فَلَمَّا تَرَٰٓءَا ٱلْجَمْعَانِ قَالَ أَصْحَٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّا لَمُدْرَكُونَ
ayah_en: and when the two groups saw each other, Moses' companions said, "We are sure to be overtaken."

ayah_ar: قَالَ كَلَّآ ۖ إِنَّ مَعِىَ رَبِّى سَيَهْدِينِ
ayah_en: Moses replied, "No, My Lord is with me, and He will guide me."

ayah_ar: فَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱضْرِب بِّعَصَاكَ ٱلْبَحْرَ ۖ فَٱنفَلَقَ فَكَانَ كُلُّ فِرْقٍۢ كَٱلطَّوْدِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
ayah_en: Then We bade Moses strike the sea with his staff. And it parted, and each part was like a huge mountain.

ayah_ar: وَأَزْلَفْنَا ثَمَّ ٱلْءَاخَرِينَ
ayah_en: In the meantime We made the others approach that place.

ayah_ar: وَأَنجَيْنَا مُوسَىٰ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥٓ أَجْمَعِينَ
ayah_en: We delivered Moses and all those who were with him,

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ أَغْرَقْنَا ٱلْءَاخَرِينَ
ayah_en: then We drowned the others.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةًۭ ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
ayah_en: Surely in that there is a sign; yet most of them do not believe:

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayah_en: truly, your Lord is the Mighty One, the Merciful.

ayah_ar: وَٱتْلُ عَلَيْهِمْ نَبَأَ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ
ayah_en: Tell them the story of Abraham,

ayah_ar: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ
ayah_en: when he asked his father and his people, "What is that which you worship?"

ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ نَعْبُدُ أَصْنَامًۭا فَنَظَلُّ لَهَا عَٰكِفِينَ
ayah_en: They said, "We worship idols and will continue to cling to them."

ayah_ar: قَالَ هَلْ يَسْمَعُونَكُمْ إِذْ تَدْعُونَ
ayah_en: He asked, "Do they hear you when you call to them?

ayah_ar: أَوْ يَنفَعُونَكُمْ أَوْ يَضُرُّونَ
ayah_en: Do they help or harm you?"

ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ وَجَدْنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفْعَلُونَ
ayah_en: They replied, "But we found our fathers doing the same."

ayah_ar: قَالَ أَفَرَءَيْتُم مَّا كُنتُمْ تَعْبُدُونَ
ayah_en: Abraham said, "Have you really thought about what you have been worshipping,

ayah_ar: أَنتُمْ وَءَابَآؤُكُمُ ٱلْأَقْدَمُونَ
ayah_en: you and your forefathers --

ayah_ar: فَإِنَّهُمْ عَدُوٌّۭ لِّىٓ إِلَّا رَبَّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_en: they are all my enemies, not so the Lord of the Universe,

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَنِى فَهُوَ يَهْدِينِ
ayah_en: who created me. It is He who guides me;

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِى هُوَ يُطْعِمُنِى وَيَسْقِينِ
ayah_en: He who gives me food and drink;

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا مَرِضْتُ فَهُوَ يَشْفِينِ
ayah_en: He who cures me when I am ill;

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِى يُمِيتُنِى ثُمَّ يُحْيِينِ
ayah_en: He who will cause me to die and bring me back to life;

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِىٓ أَطْمَعُ أَن يَغْفِرَ لِى خَطِيٓـَٔتِى يَوْمَ ٱلدِّينِ
ayah_en: and He who will, I hope, forgive me my faults on the Day of the Judgement.

ayah_ar: رَبِّ هَبْ لِى حُكْمًۭا وَأَلْحِقْنِى بِٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
ayah_en: My Lord, bestow wisdom upon me; unite me with the righteous;

ayah_ar: وَٱجْعَل لِّى لِسَانَ صِدْقٍۢ فِى ٱلْءَاخِرِينَ
ayah_en: give me a good name among later generations;

ayah_ar: وَٱجْعَلْنِى مِن وَرَثَةِ جَنَّةِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
ayah_en: and make me one of the inheritors of the Garden of Bliss;

ayah_ar: وَٱغْفِرْ لِأَبِىٓ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
ayah_en: and forgive my father; for he is one of the misguided;

ayah_ar: وَلَا تُخْزِنِى يَوْمَ يُبْعَثُونَ
ayah_en: and do not disgrace me on the Day when all people are resurrected,

ayah_ar: يَوْمَ لَا يَنفَعُ مَالٌۭ وَلَا بَنُونَ
ayah_en: the Day when wealth and sons will be of no avail,

ayah_ar: إِلَّا مَنْ أَتَى ٱللَّهَ بِقَلْبٍۢ سَلِيمٍۢ
ayah_en: and when he alone will be saved who comes to God with a sound heart."

ayah_ar: وَأُزْلِفَتِ ٱلْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ
ayah_en: When Paradise shall be brought near to the God-fearing

ayah_ar: وَبُرِّزَتِ ٱلْجَحِيمُ لِلْغَاوِينَ
ayah_en: and Hell shall be revealed to the misguided,

ayah_ar: وَقِيلَ لَهُمْ أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْبُدُونَ
ayah_en: they will be asked, "Where are those whom you worshipped

ayah_ar: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ هَلْ يَنصُرُونَكُمْ أَوْ يَنتَصِرُونَ
ayah_en: besides God? Can they help you or even help themselves?"

ayah_ar: فَكُبْكِبُوا۟ فِيهَا هُمْ وَٱلْغَاوُۥنَ
ayah_en: Then they will be thrown headlong into Hell, both they and the misguided ones,

ayah_ar: وَجُنُودُ إِبْلِيسَ أَجْمَعُونَ
ayah_en: and Satan's legions, all together.

ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ وَهُمْ فِيهَا يَخْتَصِمُونَ
ayah_en: They will dispute between themselves therein, and will say,

ayah_ar: تَٱللَّهِ إِن كُنَّا لَفِى ضَلَٰلٍۢ مُّبِينٍ
ayah_en: "We were clearly misguided

ayah_ar: إِذْ نُسَوِّيكُم بِرَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_en: when we made you equal with the Lord of the Universe.

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَضَلَّنَآ إِلَّا ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ
ayah_en: It was the evildoers who led us astray,

ayah_ar: فَمَا لَنَا مِن شَٰفِعِينَ
ayah_en: and we have no intercessors now,

ayah_ar: وَلَا صَدِيقٍ حَمِيمٍۢ
ayah_en: and no sincere friend.

ayah_ar: فَلَوْ أَنَّ لَنَا كَرَّةًۭ فَنَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayah_en: If we could only return to the world and be among the believers."

ayah_ar: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةًۭ ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
ayah_en: There is certainly a sign in that, but most of them would not believe:

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayah_en: surely, your Lord is the Mighty One, the Merciful.

ayah_ar: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
ayah_en: The people of Noah also rejected the messengers.

ayah_ar: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ نُوحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
ayah_en: When their brother Noah said to them, "Will you have no fear of God?

ayah_ar: إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌۭ
ayah_en: I am a trustworthy messenger for you:

ayah_ar: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
ayah_en: fear God, and obey me.

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_en: I ask of you no recompense for it, for my only reward is with the Lord of the Universe,

ayah_ar: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
ayah_en: so fear God and obey me."

ayah_ar: ۞ قَالُوٓا۟ أَنُؤْمِنُ لَكَ وَٱتَّبَعَكَ ٱلْأَرْذَلُونَ
ayah_en: They replied, "Are we to believe in you when your followers are but the lowest of the low?"

ayah_ar: قَالَ وَمَا عِلْمِى بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
ayah_en: He said, "What knowledge do I have of their doings?

ayah_ar: إِنْ حِسَابُهُمْ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّى ۖ لَوْ تَشْعُرُونَ
ayah_en: My Lord alone can bring them to account, if only you could understand,

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِطَارِدِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayah_en: I am not going to drive away any believers.

ayah_ar: إِنْ أَنَا۠ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
ayah_en: I am only a plain warner."

ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهِ يَٰنُوحُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْمَرْجُومِينَ
ayah_en: They said, "Noah, if you do not desist, you will be stoned."

ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنَّ قَوْمِى كَذَّبُونِ
ayah_en: Noah said, "My Lord, my people have rejected me,

ayah_ar: فَٱفْتَحْ بَيْنِى وَبَيْنَهُمْ فَتْحًۭا وَنَجِّنِى وَمَن مَّعِىَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayah_en: therefore, judge decisively between me and them; and save me and the believers who are with me."

ayah_ar: فَأَنجَيْنَٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ فِى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ
ayah_en: So We saved him, and those who were with him in the laden ark,

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ أَغْرَقْنَا بَعْدُ ٱلْبَاقِينَ
ayah_en: and drowned the rest.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةًۭ ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
ayah_en: There is certainly a sign in that; but most of them do not believe:

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayah_en: surely your Lord is the Mighty One, the Merciful.

ayah_ar: كَذَّبَتْ عَادٌ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
ayah_en: The people of 'Ad, too, rejected the messengers.

ayah_ar: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ هُودٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
ayah_en: Their brother Hud said to them, "Will you not fear God?

ayah_ar: إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌۭ
ayah_en: I am a trustworthy messenger for you:

ayah_ar: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
ayah_en: fear God, then, and obey me.

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_en: I ask no recompense of you; my reward is only with the Lord of the Universe.

ayah_ar: أَتَبْنُونَ بِكُلِّ رِيعٍ ءَايَةًۭ تَعْبَثُونَ
ayah_en: Do you build monuments on every high place in vanity,

ayah_ar: وَتَتَّخِذُونَ مَصَانِعَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَخْلُدُونَ
ayah_en: and erect castles hoping that you will live forever.

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا بَطَشْتُم بَطَشْتُمْ جَبَّارِينَ
ayah_en: When you lay hands upon anyone, you do so as tyrants.

ayah_ar: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
ayah_en: So fear God, and obey me;

ayah_ar: وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَمَدَّكُم بِمَا تَعْلَمُونَ
ayah_en: fear Him who has aided you with all that you know --

ayah_ar: أَمَدَّكُم بِأَنْعَٰمٍۢ وَبَنِينَ
ayah_en: He has bestowed on you cattle, and sons,

ayah_ar: وَجَنَّٰتٍۢ وَعُيُونٍ
ayah_en: and gardens, and springs --

ayah_ar: إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍۢ
ayah_en: indeed, I fear for you the torment of an awful day."

ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْنَآ أَوَعَظْتَ أَمْ لَمْ تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلْوَٰعِظِينَ
ayah_en: They replied, "It makes no difference to us whether you preach or do not preach,

ayah_ar: إِنْ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا خُلُقُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
ayah_en: this is nothing but a habit of the ancients:

ayah_ar: وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
ayah_en: and we shall not be punished."

ayah_ar: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَهْلَكْنَٰهُمْ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةًۭ ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
ayah_en: So they rejected him; and We destroyed them. There is certainly a sign in that; but most of them would not believe.

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayah_en: Surely your Lord is the Mighty One, the Merciful.

ayah_ar: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
ayah_en: The tribe of Thamud also rejected the messengers.

ayah_ar: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ صَٰلِحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
ayah_en: When their brother Salih said to them, "Will you not fear God?

ayah_ar: إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌۭ
ayah_en: Truly, I am a trustworthy messenger for you,

ayah_ar: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
ayah_en: so fear God and obey me.

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_en: For this I demand no recompense from you; my reward is only with the Lord of the Universe.

ayah_ar: أَتُتْرَكُونَ فِى مَا هَٰهُنَآ ءَامِنِينَ
ayah_en: Do you think that you will be left secure \[forever\] --

ayah_ar: فِى جَنَّٰتٍۢ وَعُيُونٍۢ
ayah_en: in the midst of gardens and fountains,

ayah_ar: وَزُرُوعٍۢ وَنَخْلٍۢ طَلْعُهَا هَضِيمٌۭ
ayah_en: and cornfields, and palm-trees laden with fruit --

ayah_ar: وَتَنْحِتُونَ مِنَ ٱلْجِبَالِ بُيُوتًۭا فَٰرِهِينَ
ayah_en: hewing out houses in the mountains and taking pride in your skill?

ayah_ar: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
ayah_en: So fear God and obey me:

ayah_ar: وَلَا تُطِيعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَ ٱلْمُسْرِفِينَ
ayah_en: do not obey the bidding of those who are given to excesses,

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ يُفْسِدُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا يُصْلِحُونَ
ayah_en: those who spread corruption in the land instead of putting things right."

ayah_ar: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مِنَ ٱلْمُسَحَّرِينَ
ayah_en: They replied, "Surely you are bewitched.

ayah_ar: مَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٌۭ مِّثْلُنَا فَأْتِ بِـَٔايَةٍ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ
ayah_en: You are only a human being like ourselves. Show us a sign, if you are telling the truth."

ayah_ar: قَالَ هَٰذِهِۦ نَاقَةٌۭ لَّهَا شِرْبٌۭ وَلَكُمْ شِرْبُ يَوْمٍۢ مَّعْلُومٍۢ
ayah_en: He said, "Here is a she-camel. She shall have her turn of drinking, as you have yours, each on an appointed day,

ayah_ar: وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوٓءٍۢ فَيَأْخُذَكُمْ عَذَابُ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍۢ
ayah_en: so do her no harm, or the punishment of an awful day will befall you."

ayah_ar: فَعَقَرُوهَا فَأَصْبَحُوا۟ نَٰدِمِينَ
ayah_en: Yet they hamstrung her, and then they became regretful:

ayah_ar: فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةًۭ ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
ayah_en: so the punishment came down upon them. Surely in that there is a sign, but most of them would not believe.

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayah_en: Your Lord is the Mighty One, the Merciful.

ayah_ar: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ لُوطٍ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
ayah_en: Then the people of Lot rejected the messengers.

ayah_ar: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ لُوطٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
ayah_en: When their brother Lot said to them, "Will you not fear God?

ayah_ar: إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌۭ
ayah_en: I am a trustworthy messenger to you:

ayah_ar: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
ayah_en: so fear God and obey me.

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_en: I ask of you no recompense for this; my reward is only with the Lord of the Universe.

ayah_ar: أَتَأْتُونَ ٱلذُّكْرَانَ مِنَ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_en: Do you, of all people, approach males,

ayah_ar: وَتَذَرُونَ مَا خَلَقَ لَكُمْ رَبُّكُم مِّنْ أَزْوَٰجِكُم ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ عَادُونَ
ayah_en: and leave your wives whom your Lord has created for you? You are a people who transgress all bounds."

ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهِ يَٰلُوطُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْمُخْرَجِينَ
ayah_en: They said, "If you do not desist, Lot, you will surely be banished."

ayah_ar: قَالَ إِنِّى لِعَمَلِكُم مِّنَ ٱلْقَالِينَ
ayah_en: He said, "I am one of those who abhors your ways.

ayah_ar: رَبِّ نَجِّنِى وَأَهْلِى مِمَّا يَعْمَلُونَ
ayah_en: My Lord, save me and my family from their evil doings."

ayah_ar: فَنَجَّيْنَٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥٓ أَجْمَعِينَ
ayah_en: We saved him and all of his family,

ayah_ar: إِلَّا عَجُوزًۭا فِى ٱلْغَٰبِرِينَ
ayah_en: except for an old woman who stayed behind,

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ دَمَّرْنَا ٱلْءَاخَرِينَ
ayah_en: then We totally destroyed the rest,

ayah_ar: وَأَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهِم مَّطَرًۭا ۖ فَسَآءَ مَطَرُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ
ayah_en: and We poured a rain \[of destruction\] down upon them -- and how evil was the rain which fell on those who were forewarned.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةًۭ ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
ayah_en: Surely in this there is a sign: but most of them would not believe:

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayah_en: your Lord is the Mighty One, the Merciful.

ayah_ar: كَذَّبَ أَصْحَٰبُ لْـَٔيْكَةِ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
ayah_en: The dwellers of the forest also rejected the messengers.

ayah_ar: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ شُعَيْبٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
ayah_en: Shu'ayb said to them, "Will you not fear God?

ayah_ar: إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌۭ
ayah_en: I am a trustworthy messenger to you:

ayah_ar: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
ayah_en: so fear God, and obey me.

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_en: I ask of you no recompense for this; my reward is only with the Lord of the Universe.

ayah_ar: ۞ أَوْفُوا۟ ٱلْكَيْلَ وَلَا تَكُونُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْمُخْسِرِينَ
ayah_en: Give full measure, and cause no loss to others.

ayah_ar: وَزِنُوا۟ بِٱلْقِسْطَاسِ ٱلْمُسْتَقِيمِ
ayah_en: Weigh with correct scales:

ayah_ar: وَلَا تَبْخَسُوا۟ ٱلنَّاسَ أَشْيَآءَهُمْ وَلَا تَعْثَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مُفْسِدِينَ
ayah_en: do not defraud people of what is rightfully theirs; and do not spread corruption in the land.

ayah_ar: وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكُمْ وَٱلْجِبِلَّةَ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
ayah_en: Fear Him who created you and those who have gone before you."

ayah_ar: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مِنَ ٱلْمُسَحَّرِينَ
ayah_en: They replied, "You are bewitched.

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٌۭ مِّثْلُنَا وَإِن نَّظُنُّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلْكَٰذِبِينَ
ayah_en: You are only a human being like ourselves. Indeed we think you are a liar.

ayah_ar: فَأَسْقِطْ عَلَيْنَا كِسَفًۭا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ
ayah_en: So cause a fragment of the sky to fall on us, if you are truthful."

ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبِّىٓ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
ayah_en: He said, "My Lord has full knowledge of all your actions."

ayah_ar: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَهُمْ عَذَابُ يَوْمِ ٱلظُّلَّةِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
ayah_en: They rejected him, and then had to suffer the punishment of a day of overshadowing gloom. That was indeed the punishment of an awful day.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةًۭ ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
ayah_en: Surely, in this is indeed a sign; but most of them would not believe:

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayah_en: your Lord is the Mighty One, the Merciful.

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَتَنزِيلُ رَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_en: This surely is a revelation from the Lord of the Universe:

ayah_ar: نَزَلَ بِهِ ٱلرُّوحُ ٱلْأَمِينُ
ayah_en: the Faithful Spirit has brought it down

ayah_ar: عَلَىٰ قَلْبِكَ لِتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُنذِرِينَ
ayah_en: into your heart, so that you may be a warner,

ayah_ar: بِلِسَانٍ عَرَبِىٍّۢ مُّبِينٍۢ
ayah_en: in clear Arabic speech.

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَفِى زُبُرِ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
ayah_en: Surely, it is foretold in the ancient scriptures.

ayah_ar: أَوَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُمْ ءَايَةً أَن يَعْلَمَهُۥ عُلَمَٰٓؤُا۟ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
ayah_en: Is it not evidence enough for them that the learned among the Children of Israel have recognized this \[as true\]?

ayah_ar: وَلَوْ نَزَّلْنَٰهُ عَلَىٰ بَعْضِ ٱلْأَعْجَمِينَ
ayah_en: Had We revealed it to any one of the non-Arabs,

ayah_ar: فَقَرَأَهُۥ عَلَيْهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ مُؤْمِنِينَ
ayah_en: and he had recited it to them, they would not have believed in it.

ayah_ar: كَذَٰلِكَ سَلَكْنَٰهُ فِى قُلُوبِ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
ayah_en: We have thus caused denial of truth to enter into the hearts of the sinners:

ayah_ar: لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُا۟ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَلِيمَ
ayah_en: they will not believe in it until they see the grievous punishment.

ayah_ar: فَيَأْتِيَهُم بَغْتَةًۭ وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
ayah_en: It will come upon them suddenly when they are not expecting it.

ayah_ar: فَيَقُولُوا۟ هَلْ نَحْنُ مُنظَرُونَ
ayah_en: Then they will exclaim, "Could we have some respite?"

ayah_ar: أَفَبِعَذَابِنَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
ayah_en: Do they want to hasten Our punishment?

ayah_ar: أَفَرَءَيْتَ إِن مَّتَّعْنَٰهُمْ سِنِينَ
ayah_en: Think! If We let them enjoy life for some years,

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ جَآءَهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يُوعَدُونَ
ayah_en: and then the promised punishment fell upon them,

ayah_ar: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يُمَتَّعُونَ
ayah_en: of what avail would their past enjoyment be to them?

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَرْيَةٍ إِلَّا لَهَا مُنذِرُونَ
ayah_en: Never have We destroyed a town without sending down messengers to warn it,

ayah_ar: ذِكْرَىٰ وَمَا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ
ayah_en: as a reminder from Us: We are never unjust.

ayah_ar: وَمَا تَنَزَّلَتْ بِهِ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينُ
ayah_en: It was not the devils who brought down the Quran:

ayah_ar: وَمَا يَنۢبَغِى لَهُمْ وَمَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ
ayah_en: neither are they worthy of it, nor are they capable of it,

ayah_ar: إِنَّهُمْ عَنِ ٱلسَّمْعِ لَمَعْزُولُونَ
ayah_en: indeed they are debarred from overhearing it.

ayah_ar: فَلَا تَدْعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُعَذَّبِينَ
ayah_en: So do not call on any deity besides God, lest you incur His punishment.

ayah_ar: وَأَنذِرْ عَشِيرَتَكَ ٱلْأَقْرَبِينَ
ayah_en: Warn your nearest kinsmen,

ayah_ar: وَٱخْفِضْ جَنَاحَكَ لِمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayah_en: and extend kindness and affection to those of the believers who follow you.

ayah_ar: فَإِنْ عَصَوْكَ فَقُلْ إِنِّى بَرِىٓءٌۭ مِّمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ
ayah_en: If they disobey you, say, "I bear no responsibility for what you do."

ayah_ar: وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
ayah_en: Put your trust in the Mighty One, the Merciful,

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِى يَرَىٰكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
ayah_en: who sees you when you stand up \[for prayer\],

ayah_ar: وَتَقَلُّبَكَ فِى ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ
ayah_en: and sees your movements among those who prostrate themselves:

ayah_ar: إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
ayah_en: He is the All Hearing, the All Knowing.

ayah_ar: هَلْ أُنَبِّئُكُمْ عَلَىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينُ
ayah_en: Shall I tell you upon whom the devils descend?

ayah_ar: تَنَزَّلُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ أَفَّاكٍ أَثِيمٍۢ
ayah_en: They descend on every lying sinner,

ayah_ar: يُلْقُونَ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَأَكْثَرُهُمْ كَٰذِبُونَ
ayah_en: who lends an ear to them, and most of them are liars.

ayah_ar: وَٱلشُّعَرَآءُ يَتَّبِعُهُمُ ٱلْغَاوُۥنَ
ayah_en: And as for the poets -- it is the misled who follow them.

ayah_ar: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّهُمْ فِى كُلِّ وَادٍۢ يَهِيمُونَ
ayah_en: Do you not see how they wander aimlessly in every valley,

ayah_ar: وَأَنَّهُمْ يَقُولُونَ مَا لَا يَفْعَلُونَ
ayah_en: preaching what they do not practice.

ayah_ar: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَذَكَرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرًۭا وَٱنتَصَرُوا۟ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا ظُلِمُوا۟ ۗ وَسَيَعْلَمُ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓا۟ أَىَّ مُنقَلَبٍۢ يَنقَلِبُونَ
ayah_en: Not so the true believers who do good works and remember God with fervour and defend themselves only after they are wronged. The wrongdoers will soon know how evil a turn their affairs will take.

ayah_ar: طسٓ ۚ تِلْكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلْقُرْءَانِ وَكِتَابٍۢ مُّبِينٍ
ayah_en: Ta Sin. These are verses from the Quran, a book that makes things clear;

ayah_ar: هُدًۭى وَبُشْرَىٰ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayah_en: it is guidance and good news for the believers

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤْتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَهُم بِٱلْءَاخِرَةِ هُمْ يُوقِنُونَ
ayah_en: who pray regularly and pay obligatory alms and have firm faith in the Hereafter.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْءَاخِرَةِ زَيَّنَّا لَهُمْ أَعْمَٰلَهُمْ فَهُمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
ayah_en: We have made those who do not believe in the Hereafter feel their actions appear good to them, so they wander blindly:

ayah_ar: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَهُمْ سُوٓءُ ٱلْعَذَابِ وَهُمْ فِى ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلْأَخْسَرُونَ
ayah_en: they are the ones who will have the worst of punishment, and in the Hereafter they will be the greatest losers.

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّكَ لَتُلَقَّى ٱلْقُرْءَانَ مِن لَّدُنْ حَكِيمٍ عَلِيمٍ
ayah_en: You have received this Quran from One who is all-wise, all-knowing.

ayah_ar: إِذْ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِأَهْلِهِۦٓ إِنِّىٓ ءَانَسْتُ نَارًۭا سَـَٔاتِيكُم مِّنْهَا بِخَبَرٍ أَوْ ءَاتِيكُم بِشِهَابٍۢ قَبَسٍۢ لَّعَلَّكُمْ تَصْطَلُونَ
ayah_en: Tell of Moses who said to his family, "I have seen a fire. I will bring you news from there, or a burning brand for you to warm yourselves."

ayah_ar: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهَا نُودِىَ أَنۢ بُورِكَ مَن فِى ٱلنَّارِ وَمَنْ حَوْلَهَا وَسُبْحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_en: When he came up to it, a voice called out, "Blessed be whoever is near this fire, and whoever is around it! Glory be to God, Lord of the Universe!

ayah_ar: يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
ayah_en: O Moses, I am God, the Powerful, the Wise.

ayah_ar: وَأَلْقِ عَصَاكَ ۚ فَلَمَّا رَءَاهَا تَهْتَزُّ كَأَنَّهَا جَآنٌّۭ وَلَّىٰ مُدْبِرًۭا وَلَمْ يُعَقِّبْ ۚ يَٰمُوسَىٰ لَا تَخَفْ إِنِّى لَا يَخَافُ لَدَىَّ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
ayah_en: Throw down your staff." But when he saw it moving like a snake, he turned and fled. "Moses, do not be afraid! The messengers need have no fear in My presence;

ayah_ar: إِلَّا مَن ظَلَمَ ثُمَّ بَدَّلَ حُسْنًۢا بَعْدَ سُوٓءٍۢ فَإِنِّى غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
ayah_en: as for those who do wrong and then do good after evil, I am most forgiving, most merciful.

ayah_ar: وَأَدْخِلْ يَدَكَ فِى جَيْبِكَ تَخْرُجْ بَيْضَآءَ مِنْ غَيْرِ سُوٓءٍۢ ۖ فِى تِسْعِ ءَايَٰتٍ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَقَوْمِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمًۭا فَٰسِقِينَ
ayah_en: Now put your hand inside your cloak next to your bosom and it will come out \[shining\] white, without any blemish. This will be one of the nine signs for Pharaoh and his people: for truly they are a rebellious people."

ayah_ar: فَلَمَّا جَآءَتْهُمْ ءَايَٰتُنَا مُبْصِرَةًۭ قَالُوا۟ هَٰذَا سِحْرٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
ayah_en: But when Our signs came to them in all their clarity they said, "This is clearly sorcery!"

ayah_ar: وَجَحَدُوا۟ بِهَا وَٱسْتَيْقَنَتْهَآ أَنفُسُهُمْ ظُلْمًۭا وَعُلُوًّۭا ۚ فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ
ayah_en: And they persisted in rejecting them wrongfully and arrogantly, while in their hearts they were convinced of their truth. Observe, then, how evil was the fate of the evil-doers.

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا دَاوُۥدَ وَسُلَيْمَٰنَ عِلْمًۭا ۖ وَقَالَا ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى فَضَّلَنَا عَلَىٰ كَثِيرٍۢ مِّنْ عِبَادِهِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayah_en: We bestowed knowledge on David and Solomon and they both said, "Praise be to God who has exalted us above many of His believing servants."

ayah_ar: وَوَرِثَ سُلَيْمَٰنُ دَاوُۥدَ ۖ وَقَالَ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ عُلِّمْنَا مَنطِقَ ٱلطَّيْرِ وَأُوتِينَا مِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ ۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلْفَضْلُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
ayah_en: Solomon succeeded David. He said, "Know, my people, that we have been taught the speech of birds and endowed with all good things. Surely this is God's manifest grace."

ayah_ar: وَحُشِرَ لِسُلَيْمَٰنَ جُنُودُهُۥ مِنَ ٱلْجِنِّ وَٱلْإِنسِ وَٱلطَّيْرِ فَهُمْ يُوزَعُونَ
ayah_en: Solomon's hosts of jinn and men and birds, were all gathered together in his presence and were ranged in battle order,

ayah_ar: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَتَوْا۟ عَلَىٰ وَادِ ٱلنَّمْلِ قَالَتْ نَمْلَةٌۭ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّمْلُ ٱدْخُلُوا۟ مَسَٰكِنَكُمْ لَا يَحْطِمَنَّكُمْ سُلَيْمَٰنُ وَجُنُودُهُۥ وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
ayah_en: and when they came to the Valley of the Ants, one ant said, "Ants! Go into your dwellings, in case Solomon and his hosts inadvertently crush you."

ayah_ar: فَتَبَسَّمَ ضَاحِكًۭا مِّن قَوْلِهَا وَقَالَ رَبِّ أَوْزِعْنِىٓ أَنْ أَشْكُرَ نِعْمَتَكَ ٱلَّتِىٓ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَىَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَٰلِدَىَّ وَأَنْ أَعْمَلَ صَٰلِحًۭا تَرْضَىٰهُ وَأَدْخِلْنِى بِرَحْمَتِكَ فِى عِبَادِكَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
ayah_en: Solomon smiled broadly at its words and said, "Lord, inspire me to be thankful for the blessings You have granted me and my parents, and to do good deeds that please You; and include me, by Your grace, among Your righteous servants!"

ayah_ar: وَتَفَقَّدَ ٱلطَّيْرَ فَقَالَ مَا لِىَ لَآ أَرَى ٱلْهُدْهُدَ أَمْ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْغَآئِبِينَ
ayah_en: Then Solomon inspected the birds, and said, "How is it that I do not see the hoopoe? Is he absent then?

ayah_ar: لَأُعَذِّبَنَّهُۥ عَذَابًۭا شَدِيدًا أَوْ لَأَا۟ذْبَحَنَّهُۥٓ أَوْ لَيَأْتِيَنِّى بِسُلْطَٰنٍۢ مُّبِينٍۢ
ayah_en: I shall surely punish him severely or order him to be executed, unless he gives me a good reason for his absence."

ayah_ar: فَمَكَثَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍۢ فَقَالَ أَحَطتُ بِمَا لَمْ تُحِطْ بِهِۦ وَجِئْتُكَ مِن سَبَإٍۭ بِنَبَإٍۢ يَقِينٍ
ayah_en: But he was not long in coming, and said, "I have learnt something you did not know. I have come to you from Sheba with reliable news.

ayah_ar: إِنِّى وَجَدتُّ ٱمْرَأَةًۭ تَمْلِكُهُمْ وَأُوتِيَتْ مِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ وَلَهَا عَرْشٌ عَظِيمٌۭ
ayah_en: I found a woman ruling over them, who has been given everything and she has a mighty throne.

ayah_ar: وَجَدتُّهَا وَقَوْمَهَا يَسْجُدُونَ لِلشَّمْسِ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَزَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنُ أَعْمَٰلَهُمْ فَصَدَّهُمْ عَنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ فَهُمْ لَا يَهْتَدُونَ
ayah_en: I found her and her people worshipping the sun, instead of God. Satan has made their conduct appear good to them, and has thus diverted them from the right path, so that they might not be guided.

ayah_ar: أَلَّا يَسْجُدُوا۟ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى يُخْرِجُ ٱلْخَبْءَ فِى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا تُخْفُونَ وَمَا تُعْلِنُونَ
ayah_en: Should they not worship God who brings forth what is hidden in the heavens and earth and knows both what you conceal and what you make known?

ayah_ar: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ ۩
ayah_en: He is God: there is no deity but He, the Lord of the mighty throne."

ayah_ar: ۞ قَالَ سَنَنظُرُ أَصَدَقْتَ أَمْ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْكَٰذِبِينَ
ayah_en: Solomon said, "We shall soon see whether you have spoken the truth, or whether you are a liar.

ayah_ar: ٱذْهَب بِّكِتَٰبِى هَٰذَا فَأَلْقِهْ إِلَيْهِمْ ثُمَّ تَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ فَٱنظُرْ مَاذَا يَرْجِعُونَ
ayah_en: Go with this letter of mine and lay it before them, then withdraw from them and see how they respond."

ayah_ar: قَالَتْ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ إِنِّىٓ أُلْقِىَ إِلَىَّ كِتَٰبٌۭ كَرِيمٌ
ayah_en: The Queen of Sheba said, "O Counsellors, an honourable letter has been delivered to me.

ayah_ar: إِنَّهُۥ مِن سُلَيْمَٰنَ وَإِنَّهُۥ بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
ayah_en: It is from Solomon. It reads, "In the name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful,

ayah_ar: أَلَّا تَعْلُوا۟ عَلَىَّ وَأْتُونِى مُسْلِمِينَ
ayah_en: do not exalt yourselves above me, but come to me in all submission."

ayah_ar: قَالَتْ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ أَفْتُونِى فِىٓ أَمْرِى مَا كُنتُ قَاطِعَةً أَمْرًا حَتَّىٰ تَشْهَدُونِ
ayah_en: Now advise me in this, Counsellors. I never decide any affair till I have conferred with you."

ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ نَحْنُ أُو۟لُوا۟ قُوَّةٍۢ وَأُو۟لُوا۟ بَأْسٍۢ شَدِيدٍۢ وَٱلْأَمْرُ إِلَيْكِ فَٱنظُرِى مَاذَا تَأْمُرِينَ
ayah_en: They said, "We are strong and our prowess in battle is great, but the decision is in your hands, so consider what you will command."

ayah_ar: قَالَتْ إِنَّ ٱلْمُلُوكَ إِذَا دَخَلُوا۟ قَرْيَةً أَفْسَدُوهَا وَجَعَلُوٓا۟ أَعِزَّةَ أَهْلِهَآ أَذِلَّةًۭ ۖ وَكَذَٰلِكَ يَفْعَلُونَ
ayah_en: She said, "Surely, when mighty kings invade a country, they despoil it and humiliate its noblest inhabitants, these men will do the same,

ayah_ar: وَإِنِّى مُرْسِلَةٌ إِلَيْهِم بِهَدِيَّةٍۢ فَنَاظِرَةٌۢ بِمَ يَرْجِعُ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
ayah_en: but I shall send them a present and see with what reply my envoys will return."

ayah_ar: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ سُلَيْمَٰنَ قَالَ أَتُمِدُّونَنِ بِمَالٍۢ فَمَآ ءَاتَىٰنِۦَ ٱللَّهُ خَيْرٌۭ مِّمَّآ ءَاتَىٰكُم بَلْ أَنتُم بِهَدِيَّتِكُمْ تَفْرَحُونَ
ayah_en: So when \[the envoy\] came to Solomon he said, "What! Are you offering me wealth? But that which God has given me is better than that which He has given you. Yet you rejoice in your gift.

ayah_ar: ٱرْجِعْ إِلَيْهِمْ فَلَنَأْتِيَنَّهُم بِجُنُودٍۢ لَّا قِبَلَ لَهُم بِهَا وَلَنُخْرِجَنَّهُم مِّنْهَآ أَذِلَّةًۭ وَهُمْ صَٰغِرُونَ
ayah_en: Go back to them: we shall most certainly come upon them with forces which they will never be able to withstand, and shall most certainly cause them to be driven from their lands, disgraced and humbled!"

ayah_ar: قَالَ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ أَيُّكُمْ يَأْتِينِى بِعَرْشِهَا قَبْلَ أَن يَأْتُونِى مُسْلِمِينَ
ayah_en: Solomon then said, "O Counsellors, which of you can bring me her throne before they come to me in submission?

ayah_ar: قَالَ عِفْرِيتٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ أَنَا۠ ءَاتِيكَ بِهِۦ قَبْلَ أَن تَقُومَ مِن مَّقَامِكَ ۖ وَإِنِّى عَلَيْهِ لَقَوِىٌّ أَمِينٌۭ
ayah_en: A demon from among the jinn said, "I will bring it to you before you get up from your seat. I am strong and trustworthy enough to do it."

ayah_ar: قَالَ ٱلَّذِى عِندَهُۥ عِلْمٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ أَنَا۠ ءَاتِيكَ بِهِۦ قَبْلَ أَن يَرْتَدَّ إِلَيْكَ طَرْفُكَ ۚ فَلَمَّا رَءَاهُ مُسْتَقِرًّا عِندَهُۥ قَالَ هَٰذَا مِن فَضْلِ رَبِّى لِيَبْلُوَنِىٓ ءَأَشْكُرُ أَمْ أَكْفُرُ ۖ وَمَن شَكَرَ فَإِنَّمَا يَشْكُرُ لِنَفْسِهِۦ ۖ وَمَن كَفَرَ فَإِنَّ رَبِّى غَنِىٌّۭ كَرِيمٌۭ
ayah_en: But one of them who had some knowledge of the Book said, "I will bring it to you in the twinkling of an eye." When Solomon saw it placed before him, he exclaimed, "This is by the grace of my Lord, to test whether I am grateful or ungrateful. Whosoever is grateful, it is for the good of his own self; and whosoever is ungrateful, then surely my Lord is self-sufficient and generous."

ayah_ar: قَالَ نَكِّرُوا۟ لَهَا عَرْشَهَا نَنظُرْ أَتَهْتَدِىٓ أَمْ تَكُونُ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَهْتَدُونَ
ayah_en: He said, "Disguise her throne. We shall see whether or not she will recognize it."

ayah_ar: فَلَمَّا جَآءَتْ قِيلَ أَهَٰكَذَا عَرْشُكِ ۖ قَالَتْ كَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ ۚ وَأُوتِينَا ٱلْعِلْمَ مِن قَبْلِهَا وَكُنَّا مُسْلِمِينَ
ayah_en: When she came to Solomon, she was asked, "Is your throne like this?" She replied, "It looks as though it were the same, and we had been given knowledge \[of your power\] before this, and we have already submitted."

ayah_ar: وَصَدَّهَا مَا كَانَت تَّعْبُدُ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنَّهَا كَانَتْ مِن قَوْمٍۢ كَٰفِرِينَ
ayah_en: And that which she used to worship beside God had stopped her \[from believing\]; for she came of a disbelieving people.

ayah_ar: قِيلَ لَهَا ٱدْخُلِى ٱلصَّرْحَ ۖ فَلَمَّا رَأَتْهُ حَسِبَتْهُ لُجَّةًۭ وَكَشَفَتْ عَن سَاقَيْهَا ۚ قَالَ إِنَّهُۥ صَرْحٌۭ مُّمَرَّدٌۭ مِّن قَوَارِيرَ ۗ قَالَتْ رَبِّ إِنِّى ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِى وَأَسْلَمْتُ مَعَ سُلَيْمَٰنَ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_en: Then she was bidden to enter the palace; but when she saw it, she thought it was a deep pool of water, and bared her legs. But Solomon explained, "It is just a palace paved with glass," and she said, "My Lord, I have wronged myself: now I submit myself along with Solomon, to God, the Lord of the Universe."

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَىٰ ثَمُودَ أَخَاهُمْ صَٰلِحًا أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ فَإِذَا هُمْ فَرِيقَانِ يَخْتَصِمُونَ
ayah_en: To Thamud We sent their brother Salih. He said, "Serve none but God." But they divided themselves into two factions contending with one another.

ayah_ar: قَالَ يَٰقَوْمِ لِمَ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ قَبْلَ ٱلْحَسَنَةِ ۖ لَوْلَا تَسْتَغْفِرُونَ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
ayah_en: He urged them, "O my people, why do you wish to hasten on the evil rather than the good? Why do you not ask forgiveness of God, so that you may be shown mercy?"

ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ ٱطَّيَّرْنَا بِكَ وَبِمَن مَّعَكَ ۚ قَالَ طَٰٓئِرُكُمْ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌۭ تُفْتَنُونَ
ayah_en: They said, "We see you and your followers as an evil omen." He replied, "No, your evil omen is with God; the truth is that you are a people being put to the test."

ayah_ar: وَكَانَ فِى ٱلْمَدِينَةِ تِسْعَةُ رَهْطٍۢ يُفْسِدُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا يُصْلِحُونَ
ayah_en: There were in the city nine men who spread corruption in the land, and would not reform.

ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ تَقَاسَمُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ لَنُبَيِّتَنَّهُۥ وَأَهْلَهُۥ ثُمَّ لَنَقُولَنَّ لِوَلِيِّهِۦ مَا شَهِدْنَا مَهْلِكَ أَهْلِهِۦ وَإِنَّا لَصَٰدِقُونَ
ayah_en: They said, "Let us bind ourselves by an oath sworn in the name of God that we shall attack Salih and his family by night, and to his protector \[who demands retribution\], we shall say, "We were not present when they were slain. We are telling the truth."

ayah_ar: وَمَكَرُوا۟ مَكْرًۭا وَمَكَرْنَا مَكْرًۭا وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
ayah_en: Thus they devised a plan, and We also devised a plan, but they were not aware of it.

ayah_ar: فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ مَكْرِهِمْ أَنَّا دَمَّرْنَٰهُمْ وَقَوْمَهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
ayah_en: See, then, what the consequences of their plan were. We destroyed them and their people utterly, all together.

ayah_ar: فَتِلْكَ بُيُوتُهُمْ خَاوِيَةًۢ بِمَا ظَلَمُوٓا۟ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةًۭ لِّقَوْمٍۢ يَعْلَمُونَ
ayah_en: Because of their wrongdoing, their houses are in ruins, in that surely there is a sign for people who have knowledge,

ayah_ar: وَأَنجَيْنَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَكَانُوا۟ يَتَّقُونَ
ayah_en: and We saved those who believed in and feared God.

ayah_ar: وَلُوطًا إِذْ قَالَ لِقَوْمِهِۦٓ أَتَأْتُونَ ٱلْفَٰحِشَةَ وَأَنتُمْ تُبْصِرُونَ
ayah_en: And tell of Lot. He said to his people, "Will you commit evil knowingly?

ayah_ar: أَئِنَّكُمْ لَتَأْتُونَ ٱلرِّجَالَ شَهْوَةًۭ مِّن دُونِ ٱلنِّسَآءِ ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌۭ تَجْهَلُونَ
ayah_en: Must you go lustfully to men instead of women? Indeed, you are a people who are deeply ignorant."

ayah_ar: ۞ فَمَا كَانَ جَوَابَ قَوْمِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوٓا۟ أَخْرِجُوٓا۟ ءَالَ لُوطٍۢ مِّن قَرْيَتِكُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ أُنَاسٌۭ يَتَطَهَّرُونَ
ayah_en: The only answer of his people was, "Drive out Lot and his family from the city. They are a people who make themselves out to be pure."

ayah_ar: فَأَنجَيْنَٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱمْرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرْنَٰهَا مِنَ ٱلْغَٰبِرِينَ
ayah_en: So We delivered him and his family, except his wife: We ordained her to be one of those who stayed behind,

ayah_ar: وَأَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهِم مَّطَرًۭا ۖ فَسَآءَ مَطَرُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ
ayah_en: and We pelted them with torrential rain. How dreadful that rain was for those who had been warned!

ayah_ar: قُلِ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ وَسَلَٰمٌ عَلَىٰ عِبَادِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱصْطَفَىٰٓ ۗ ءَآللَّهُ خَيْرٌ أَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
ayah_en: Say, "All praise be to God, and peace be upon those servants of His whom He has chosen. Is God better, or what they associate with Him?

ayah_ar: أَمَّنْ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَأَنزَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۭ فَأَنۢبَتْنَا بِهِۦ حَدَآئِقَ ذَاتَ بَهْجَةٍۢ مَّا كَانَ لَكُمْ أَن تُنۢبِتُوا۟ شَجَرَهَآ ۗ أَءِلَٰهٌۭ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ قَوْمٌۭ يَعْدِلُونَ
ayah_en: Who created the heavens and the earth and sends down water for you from the sky, by which We make luxuriant gardens grow, you could never make such trees grow in them, is it another deity besides God? No indeed, but they are a people who equate others with Him.

ayah_ar: أَمَّن جَعَلَ ٱلْأَرْضَ قَرَارًۭا وَجَعَلَ خِلَٰلَهَآ أَنْهَٰرًۭا وَجَعَلَ لَهَا رَوَٰسِىَ وَجَعَلَ بَيْنَ ٱلْبَحْرَيْنِ حَاجِزًا ۗ أَءِلَٰهٌۭ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ بَلْ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
ayah_en: Who is it that made the earth a stable place to live in? Who made rivers flow through it? Who set mountains upon it and placed a barrier between the two seas? Is there another deity besides God? Indeed, most of them have no knowledge.

ayah_ar: أَمَّن يُجِيبُ ٱلْمُضْطَرَّ إِذَا دَعَاهُ وَيَكْشِفُ ٱلسُّوٓءَ وَيَجْعَلُكُمْ خُلَفَآءَ ٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ أَءِلَٰهٌۭ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ قَلِيلًۭا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ
ayah_en: Who responds to the oppressed when he calls out to Him, and relieves his suffering and who will make you inheritors of the earth? Then, is there a god besides God? How little you pay heed!

ayah_ar: أَمَّن يَهْدِيكُمْ فِى ظُلُمَٰتِ ٱلْبَرِّ وَٱلْبَحْرِ وَمَن يُرْسِلُ ٱلرِّيَٰحَ بُشْرًۢا بَيْنَ يَدَىْ رَحْمَتِهِۦٓ ۗ أَءِلَٰهٌۭ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ تَعَٰلَى ٱللَّهُ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
ayah_en: Who guides you in the darkness of the land and sea? Who sends the breezes as heralds of His mercy? Then, is there a deity besides God? Exalted is God above what they associate with Him.

ayah_ar: أَمَّن يَبْدَؤُا۟ ٱلْخَلْقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥ وَمَن يَرْزُقُكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ أَءِلَٰهٌۭ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ قُلْ هَاتُوا۟ بُرْهَٰنَكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَٰدِقِينَ
ayah_en: Who originates creation, then regenerates it, and who gives you sustenance from heaven and earth? Then, is there a deity besides God?" Say, "Bring forward your proofs, if you are telling the truth."

ayah_ar: قُل لَّا يَعْلَمُ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ٱلْغَيْبَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ ۚ وَمَا يَشْعُرُونَ أَيَّانَ يُبْعَثُونَ
ayah_en: Say, "No one in the heavens and the earth has knowledge of the unseen except God." They do not know when they will be raised up again.

ayah_ar: بَلِ ٱدَّٰرَكَ عِلْمُهُمْ فِى ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى شَكٍّۢ مِّنْهَا ۖ بَلْ هُم مِّنْهَا عَمُونَ
ayah_en: Indeed, their knowledge of the life to come stops short of the truth: they are \[often\] in doubt as to its reality: in fact, they are blind to it.

ayah_ar: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَءِذَا كُنَّا تُرَٰبًۭا وَءَابَآؤُنَآ أَئِنَّا لَمُخْرَجُونَ
ayah_en: Those who deny the truth say, "When we have turned to dust like our fathers, shall we be brought back to life again?

ayah_ar: لَقَدْ وُعِدْنَا هَٰذَا نَحْنُ وَءَابَآؤُنَا مِن قَبْلُ إِنْ هَٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
ayah_en: We and our fathers were promised this before; these are but old stories."

ayah_ar: قُلْ سِيرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱنظُرُوا۟ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
ayah_en: Say, "Roam across the earth and observe what was the end of the sinful ones."

ayah_ar: وَلَا تَحْزَنْ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا تَكُن فِى ضَيْقٍۢ مِّمَّا يَمْكُرُونَ
ayah_en: Do not grieve over them, nor feel distressed at their schemes.

ayah_ar: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَٰدِقِينَ
ayah_en: They ask, "When will this promise be fulfilled, if what you say be true?"

ayah_ar: قُلْ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ رَدِفَ لَكُم بَعْضُ ٱلَّذِى تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
ayah_en: Say, "It may be that a part of what you would hasten on is close behind you."

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَذُو فَضْلٍ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَشْكُرُونَ
ayah_en: Truly, your Lord is bountiful to mankind, but most of them are not grateful.

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَيَعْلَمُ مَا تُكِنُّ صُدُورُهُمْ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ
ayah_en: The Lord knows full well what they conceal in their hearts and what they disclose:

ayah_ar: وَمَا مِنْ غَآئِبَةٍۢ فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّا فِى كِتَٰبٍۢ مُّبِينٍ
ayah_en: there is nothing hidden in heaven and on earth, but is recorded in a clear Book.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ هَٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ يَقُصُّ عَلَىٰ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ أَكْثَرَ ٱلَّذِى هُمْ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ
ayah_en: This Quran explains to the children of Israel much of what they differ over,

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَهُدًۭى وَرَحْمَةٌۭ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayah_en: certainly it is guidance and a blessing for the believers.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَقْضِى بَيْنَهُم بِحُكْمِهِۦ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
ayah_en: Certainly your Lord will decide between them in His wisdom, He is the Almighty, the All Knowing,

ayah_ar: فَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَى ٱلْحَقِّ ٱلْمُبِينِ
ayah_en: so put your trust in God. Surely you are on the path of manifest truth.

ayah_ar: إِنَّكَ لَا تُسْمِعُ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ وَلَا تُسْمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ ٱلدُّعَآءَ إِذَا وَلَّوْا۟ مُدْبِرِينَ
ayah_en: You cannot make the dead hear, nor can you make the deaf hear your call, when they turn their backs on it,

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَنتَ بِهَٰدِى ٱلْعُمْىِ عَن ضَلَٰلَتِهِمْ ۖ إِن تُسْمِعُ إِلَّا مَن يُؤْمِنُ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَهُم مُّسْلِمُونَ
ayah_en: nor can you guide the blind out of their error. You can make only those hear you who believe in Our revelations and surrender themselves to Us.

ayah_ar: ۞ وَإِذَا وَقَعَ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَيْهِمْ أَخْرَجْنَا لَهُمْ دَآبَّةًۭ مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ تُكَلِّمُهُمْ أَنَّ ٱلنَّاسَ كَانُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا لَا يُوقِنُونَ
ayah_en: When God's word is justly carried out against them, We will produce a dabbah from the earth which will tell them that mankind had no real faith in Our signs.

ayah_ar: وَيَوْمَ نَحْشُرُ مِن كُلِّ أُمَّةٍۢ فَوْجًۭا مِّمَّن يُكَذِّبُ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَهُمْ يُوزَعُونَ
ayah_en: On that Day We shall assemble together a host from every community of those who cried lies to Our revelations and they will be grouped
