ayah_en: They must be waiting for but one single blast, which will overtake them while they are still disputing.

ayah_ar: فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ تَوْصِيَةًۭ وَلَآ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
ayah_en: They will have no time to make a will, nor shall they return to their own people.

ayah_ar: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَنسِلُونَ
ayah_en: The trumpet will be blown and, at once, they will rise up from their graves, and hasten to their Lord.

ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ يَٰوَيْلَنَا مَنۢ بَعَثَنَا مِن مَّرْقَدِنَا ۜ ۗ هَٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنُ وَصَدَقَ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
ayah_en: "Woe betide us!" they will say, "Who has roused us from our sleep?" This is what the Lord of Mercy promised: the messengers spoke the truth!

ayah_ar: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةًۭ وَٰحِدَةًۭ فَإِذَا هُمْ جَمِيعٌۭ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
ayah_en: It will be but one blast, and they will all be brought before Us together.

ayah_ar: فَٱلْيَوْمَ لَا تُظْلَمُ نَفْسٌۭ شَيْـًۭٔا وَلَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
ayah_en: On that Day no soul shall suffer the least injustice. You shall be rewarded only according to your deeds.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ أَصْحَٰبَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ٱلْيَوْمَ فِى شُغُلٍۢ فَٰكِهُونَ
ayah_en: The people of Paradise shall be happily occupied on that Day,

ayah_ar: هُمْ وَأَزْوَٰجُهُمْ فِى ظِلَٰلٍ عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ مُتَّكِـُٔونَ
ayah_en: they and their wives, shall recline on couches in the shade.

ayah_ar: لَهُمْ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٌۭ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ
ayah_en: They shall have fruits therein, and all that they ask for.

ayah_ar: سَلَٰمٌۭ قَوْلًۭا مِّن رَّبٍّۢ رَّحِيمٍۢ
ayah_en: "Peace!" shall be the greeting from the Merciful Lord.

ayah_ar: وَٱمْتَٰزُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ
ayah_en: \[And God will say\], "Separate yourselves from the righteous this Day, you criminals.

ayah_ar: ۞ أَلَمْ أَعْهَدْ إِلَيْكُمْ يَٰبَنِىٓ ءَادَمَ أَن لَّا تَعْبُدُوا۟ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنَ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
ayah_en: Did I not enjoin you, sons of Adam, not to worship Satan -- for he is your sworn enemy,

ayah_ar: وَأَنِ ٱعْبُدُونِى ۚ هَٰذَا صِرَٰطٌۭ مُّسْتَقِيمٌۭ
ayah_en: but to worship Me? Surely, that is a straight path.

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمْ جِبِلًّۭا كَثِيرًا ۖ أَفَلَمْ تَكُونُوا۟ تَعْقِلُونَ
ayah_en: Yet he led astray a great multitude of you. Why did you not then understand?

ayah_ar: هَٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُمْ تُوعَدُونَ
ayah_en: This is the Hell you were promised.

ayah_ar: ٱصْلَوْهَا ٱلْيَوْمَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْفُرُونَ
ayah_en: Enter it this Day on account of your denial of the truth."

ayah_ar: ٱلْيَوْمَ نَخْتِمُ عَلَىٰٓ أَفْوَٰهِهِمْ وَتُكَلِّمُنَآ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَتَشْهَدُ أَرْجُلُهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
ayah_en: Today We shall seal up their mouths and their hands will speak to Us, and their feet will bear witness to their misdeeds.

ayah_ar: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَطَمَسْنَا عَلَىٰٓ أَعْيُنِهِمْ فَٱسْتَبَقُوا۟ ٱلصِّرَٰطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبْصِرُونَ
ayah_en: If it had been Our will, We could have put out their eyes. They would have struggled to find the way, but how could they have seen it?

ayah_ar: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَمَسَخْنَٰهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمْ فَمَا ٱسْتَطَٰعُوا۟ مُضِيًّۭا وَلَا يَرْجِعُونَ
ayah_en: If it had been Our will, We could have paralysed them where they stood, so that they would not be able to go forward or turn back.

ayah_ar: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرْهُ نُنَكِّسْهُ فِى ٱلْخَلْقِ ۖ أَفَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ
ayah_en: If We extend anyone's life, We reverse his development. Can they not use their reason?

ayah_ar: وَمَا عَلَّمْنَٰهُ ٱلشِّعْرَ وَمَا يَنۢبَغِى لَهُۥٓ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌۭ وَقُرْءَانٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
ayah_en: We have not taught him any poetry nor would it be fitting for him. This is merely a Reminder and a clear Quran

ayah_ar: لِّيُنذِرَ مَن كَانَ حَيًّۭا وَيَحِقَّ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَى ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ
ayah_en: to warn all who are truly alive, and to justify the word \[God's verdict\] against the deniers.

ayah_ar: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّمَّا عَمِلَتْ أَيْدِينَآ أَنْعَٰمًۭا فَهُمْ لَهَا مَٰلِكُونَ
ayah_en: Do they not see that, among the things which Our hands have fashioned, We have created for them cattle of which they are the masters,

ayah_ar: وَذَلَّلْنَٰهَا لَهُمْ فَمِنْهَا رَكُوبُهُمْ وَمِنْهَا يَأْكُلُونَ
ayah_en: We have subjected these to them, so that some may be used for riding and some for food,

ayah_ar: وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
ayah_en: some for milk to drink and some from which other benefits may be received? Will they not be grateful?

ayah_ar: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةًۭ لَّعَلَّهُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
ayah_en: They have set up other gods besides God, hoping to be helped by them,

ayah_ar: لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَهُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُمْ جُندٌۭ مُّحْضَرُونَ
ayah_en: but they are not able to help them: rather they will be brought before God as their allied host.

ayah_ar: فَلَا يَحْزُنكَ قَوْلُهُمْ ۘ إِنَّا نَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ
ayah_en: Let not their words grieve you. We have knowledge of all that they conceal and all that they reveal.

ayah_ar: أَوَلَمْ يَرَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَٰهُ مِن نُّطْفَةٍۢ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
ayah_en: Does not man see that We created him from a drop. Yet there he is, flagrantly contentious,

ayah_ar: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلًۭا وَنَسِىَ خَلْقَهُۥ ۖ قَالَ مَن يُحْىِ ٱلْعِظَٰمَ وَهِىَ رَمِيمٌۭ
ayah_en: producing arguments against Us, and forgetting his own creation. He asks, "Who can give life back to bones after they have rotted away?"

ayah_ar: قُلْ يُحْيِيهَا ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَهَآ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍۢ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلْقٍ عَلِيمٌ
ayah_en: Say, "He who brought them into being in the first instance will give them life again: He has knowledge of every type of creation:

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّجَرِ ٱلْأَخْضَرِ نَارًۭا فَإِذَآ أَنتُم مِّنْهُ تُوقِدُونَ
ayah_en: He who produces fire for you from green trees and from this you kindle fire."

ayah_ar: أَوَلَيْسَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يَخْلُقَ مِثْلَهُم ۚ بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ ٱلْخَلَّٰقُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
ayah_en: Is He who created the heavens and earth not able to create others like these people? Of course He is! He is indeed the Supreme Creator, the All Knowing:

ayah_ar: إِنَّمَآ أَمْرُهُۥٓ إِذَآ أَرَادَ شَيْـًٔا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ
ayah_en: when He decrees a thing, He need only say, "Be!" and it is.

ayah_ar: فَسُبْحَٰنَ ٱلَّذِى بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
ayah_en: So glory be to Him who has control over all things. It is to Him that you will all be brought back.

ayah_ar: وَٱلصَّٰٓفَّٰتِ صَفًّۭا
ayah_en: By those \[angels\] who range themselves in close ranks

ayah_ar: فَٱلزَّٰجِرَٰتِ زَجْرًۭا
ayah_en: and those who drive away \[the wicked\] with reproof

ayah_ar: فَٱلتَّٰلِيَٰتِ ذِكْرًا
ayah_en: and by the reciters of the Reminder:

ayah_ar: إِنَّ إِلَٰهَكُمْ لَوَٰحِدٌۭ
ayah_en: your God is One,

ayah_ar: رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَرَبُّ ٱلْمَشَٰرِقِ
ayah_en: Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything between them; Lord of the Easts.

ayah_ar: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنْيَا بِزِينَةٍ ٱلْكَوَاكِبِ
ayah_en: We have adorned the lowest heaven with the beauty of the planets;

ayah_ar: وَحِفْظًۭا مِّن كُلِّ شَيْطَٰنٍۢ مَّارِدٍۢ
ayah_en: and guarded it against all rebellious devils:

ayah_ar: لَّا يَسَّمَّعُونَ إِلَى ٱلْمَلَإِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ وَيُقْذَفُونَ مِن كُلِّ جَانِبٍۢ
ayah_en: they cannot overhear the Higher Assembly for they are pelted from every side,

ayah_ar: دُحُورًۭا ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌۭ وَاصِبٌ
ayah_en: driven away, and will suffer eternal punishment.

ayah_ar: إِلَّا مَنْ خَطِفَ ٱلْخَطْفَةَ فَأَتْبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٌۭ ثَاقِبٌۭ
ayah_en: But if anyone does succeed in snatching a glimpse \[of such knowledge\], he shall be pursued by a piercing flame.

ayah_ar: فَٱسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَهُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَم مَّنْ خَلَقْنَآ ۚ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَٰهُم مِّن طِينٍۢ لَّازِبٍۭ
ayah_en: So, ask those who deny the truth if it was harder to create them than all the other things We have created? We created them from sticky clay.

ayah_ar: بَلْ عَجِبْتَ وَيَسْخَرُونَ
ayah_en: No wonder you are surprised as they laugh with scorn.

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ذُكِّرُوا۟ لَا يَذْكُرُونَ
ayah_en: When they are reminded, they do not pay heed,

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا رَأَوْا۟ ءَايَةًۭ يَسْتَسْخِرُونَ
ayah_en: and whenever they see some sign, they ridicule it,

ayah_ar: وَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌۭ مُّبِينٌ
ayah_en: saying, "This is plain sorcery!"

ayah_ar: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًۭا وَعِظَٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
ayah_en: "What! When we have died and become dust and bones, will we be brought back to life again,

ayah_ar: أَوَءَابَآؤُنَا ٱلْأَوَّلُونَ
ayah_en: along with our forefathers?"

ayah_ar: قُلْ نَعَمْ وَأَنتُمْ دَٰخِرُونَ
ayah_en: Say, "Yes indeed, and you will be brought low."

ayah_ar: فَإِنَّمَا هِىَ زَجْرَةٌۭ وَٰحِدَةٌۭ فَإِذَا هُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
ayah_en: There will be but a single blast and then their eyes will open.

ayah_ar: وَقَالُوا۟ يَٰوَيْلَنَا هَٰذَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
ayah_en: They will say, "Woe to us! This is the Day of Reckoning."

ayah_ar: هَٰذَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
ayah_en: \[It will be said\], "This is the Day of Judgement which you have been denying."

ayah_ar: ۞ ٱحْشُرُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ وَأَزْوَٰجَهُمْ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْبُدُونَ
ayah_en: But We shall say, "Assemble those who did wrong together with their associates and what they worshipped

ayah_ar: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ فَٱهْدُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
ayah_en: besides God, and lead them to the path of the Fire;

ayah_ar: وَقِفُوهُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُم مَّسْـُٔولُونَ
ayah_en: and stop them there for questioning:

ayah_ar: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَنَاصَرُونَ
ayah_en: 'But what is the matter with you that you cannot help one another?,'"

ayah_ar: بَلْ هُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ مُسْتَسْلِمُونَ
ayah_en: indeed, on that Day they will surrender themselves.

ayah_ar: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍۢ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
ayah_en: They will turn upon one another, and question one another.

ayah_ar: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَأْتُونَنَا عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ
ayah_en: They will say, "You used to come at us from the right."

ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ بَل لَّمْ تَكُونُوا۟ مُؤْمِنِينَ
ayah_en: They will say, "No! It was you who would not believe --

ayah_ar: وَمَا كَانَ لَنَا عَلَيْكُم مِّن سُلْطَٰنٍۭ ۖ بَلْ كُنتُمْ قَوْمًۭا طَٰغِينَ
ayah_en: we had no power over you; but you yourselves were a rebellious people.

ayah_ar: فَحَقَّ عَلَيْنَا قَوْلُ رَبِّنَآ ۖ إِنَّا لَذَآئِقُونَ
ayah_en: But now our Lord's word has come true against us: truly, we are bound to taste \[the punishment\].

ayah_ar: فَأَغْوَيْنَٰكُمْ إِنَّا كُنَّا غَٰوِينَ
ayah_en: We led you astray as we were ourselves astray."

ayah_ar: فَإِنَّهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ مُشْتَرِكُونَ
ayah_en: On that Day they will all share the punishment:

ayah_ar: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
ayah_en: that is how We deal with evil-doers.

ayah_ar: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوٓا۟ إِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ
ayah_en: When they were told, "There is no deity but God," they turned away with disdain,

ayah_ar: وَيَقُولُونَ أَئِنَّا لَتَارِكُوٓا۟ ءَالِهَتِنَا لِشَاعِرٍۢ مَّجْنُونٍۭ
ayah_en: and replied, "Shall we then give up our deities at the bidding of a mad poet?"

ayah_ar: بَلْ جَآءَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَصَدَّقَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
ayah_en: "Surely, he has brought the truth, confirming those who were sent before;

ayah_ar: إِنَّكُمْ لَذَآئِقُوا۟ ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلْأَلِيمِ
ayah_en: you shall surely taste the painful punishment,

ayah_ar: وَمَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
ayah_en: and be rewarded only according to your deeds."

ayah_ar: إِلَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
ayah_en: But the chosen servants of God;

ayah_ar: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمْ رِزْقٌۭ مَّعْلُومٌۭ
ayah_en: shall have a known provision --

ayah_ar: فَوَٰكِهُ ۖ وَهُم مُّكْرَمُونَ
ayah_en: fruits of various kinds; and they shall be honoured,

ayah_ar: فِى جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
ayah_en: in the Gardens of Bliss,

ayah_ar: عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍۢ مُّتَقَٰبِلِينَ
ayah_en: seated on couches, facing one another.

ayah_ar: يُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِكَأْسٍۢ مِّن مَّعِينٍۭ
ayah_en: A drink will be passed round among them from a flowing spring:

ayah_ar: بَيْضَآءَ لَذَّةٍۢ لِّلشَّٰرِبِينَ
ayah_en: white and delicious to those who drink it,

ayah_ar: لَا فِيهَا غَوْلٌۭ وَلَا هُمْ عَنْهَا يُنزَفُونَ
ayah_en: causing no headiness or intoxication.

ayah_ar: وَعِندَهُمْ قَٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرْفِ عِينٌۭ
ayah_en: With them will be spouses, modest of gaze and beautiful of eye,

ayah_ar: كَأَنَّهُنَّ بَيْضٌۭ مَّكْنُونٌۭ
ayah_en: like closely guarded pearls.

ayah_ar: فَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍۢ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
ayah_en: They will turn to one another with questions:

ayah_ar: قَالَ قَآئِلٌۭ مِّنْهُمْ إِنِّى كَانَ لِى قَرِينٌۭ
ayah_en: one of them will say, "I had a friend,

ayah_ar: يَقُولُ أَءِنَّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُصَدِّقِينَ
ayah_en: who used to ask, 'Do you really believe that

ayah_ar: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًۭا وَعِظَٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَدِينُونَ
ayah_en: after we die and become dust and bones, we shall be brought to judgement?'"

ayah_ar: قَالَ هَلْ أَنتُم مُّطَّلِعُونَ
ayah_en: Then he will say, "Shall we look for him?"

ayah_ar: فَٱطَّلَعَ فَرَءَاهُ فِى سَوَآءِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
ayah_en: Then he will look and see him in the midst of the Fire.

ayah_ar: قَالَ تَٱللَّهِ إِن كِدتَّ لَتُرْدِينِ
ayah_en: He will say, "By God! You almost brought me to ruin!

ayah_ar: وَلَوْلَا نِعْمَةُ رَبِّى لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلْمُحْضَرِينَ
ayah_en: If it had not been for the blessing of my Lord, I would also have been taken to Hell."

ayah_ar: أَفَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَيِّتِينَ
ayah_en: Then he will say \[to his blessed companions\], "Are we not going to die,

ayah_ar: إِلَّا مَوْتَتَنَا ٱلْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
ayah_en: except for our first death? Are we not going to be punished?

ayah_ar: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
ayah_en: Truly, this is a great victory!"

ayah_ar: لِمِثْلِ هَٰذَا فَلْيَعْمَلِ ٱلْعَٰمِلُونَ
ayah_en: It is for the like of this that all should strive.

ayah_ar: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌۭ نُّزُلًا أَمْ شَجَرَةُ ٱلزَّقُّومِ
ayah_en: Is that better by way of hospitality or the Zaqqum tree,

ayah_ar: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَٰهَا فِتْنَةًۭ لِّلظَّٰلِمِينَ
ayah_en: which We have made as a test for the wrongdoers.

ayah_ar: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٌۭ تَخْرُجُ فِىٓ أَصْلِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
ayah_en: For it is a tree that springs out of the bottom of Hellfire:

ayah_ar: طَلْعُهَا كَأَنَّهُۥ رُءُوسُ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِ
ayah_en: and its fruits are like devils' heads.

ayah_ar: فَإِنَّهُمْ لَءَاكِلُونَ مِنْهَا فَمَالِـُٔونَ مِنْهَا ٱلْبُطُونَ
ayah_en: They will eat from it and fill their bellies with it;

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّ لَهُمْ عَلَيْهَا لَشَوْبًۭا مِّنْ حَمِيمٍۢ
ayah_en: then in addition to it they shall have a draught of boiling water to drink;

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّ مَرْجِعَهُمْ لَإِلَى ٱلْجَحِيمِ
ayah_en: then surely they shall return to Hell.

ayah_ar: إِنَّهُمْ أَلْفَوْا۟ ءَابَآءَهُمْ ضَآلِّينَ
ayah_en: They found their fathers had gone astray;

ayah_ar: فَهُمْ عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَٰرِهِمْ يُهْرَعُونَ
ayah_en: so they are rushing to follow in their footsteps.

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ ضَلَّ قَبْلَهُمْ أَكْثَرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
ayah_en: And assuredly many of the ancients went astray before them,

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا فِيهِم مُّنذِرِينَ
ayah_en: though We had sent warners among them.

ayah_ar: فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ
ayah_en: See how those who were warned met their end!

ayah_ar: إِلَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
ayah_en: Not so the chosen servants of God.

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ نَادَىٰنَا نُوحٌۭ فَلَنِعْمَ ٱلْمُجِيبُونَ
ayah_en: Noah cried to Us, and how excellent was Our response!

ayah_ar: وَنَجَّيْنَٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلْكَرْبِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
ayah_en: We saved him and his people from great distress,

ayah_ar: وَجَعَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُۥ هُمُ ٱلْبَاقِينَ
ayah_en: and We made his offspring the only survivors.

ayah_ar: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِى ٱلْءَاخِرِينَ
ayah_en: We left mention of him among later generations.

ayah_ar: سَلَٰمٌ عَلَىٰ نُوحٍۢ فِى ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_en: Peace be upon Noah among all the peoples!

ayah_ar: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
ayah_en: That is how We recompense the righteous:

ayah_ar: إِنَّهُۥ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayah_en: he was truly one of Our faithful servants.

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ أَغْرَقْنَا ٱلْءَاخَرِينَ
ayah_en: We drowned the rest.

ayah_ar: ۞ وَإِنَّ مِن شِيعَتِهِۦ لَإِبْرَٰهِيمَ
ayah_en: Abraham was of the same faith:

ayah_ar: إِذْ جَآءَ رَبَّهُۥ بِقَلْبٍۢ سَلِيمٍ
ayah_en: he came to his Lord with a sound heart.

ayah_ar: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦ مَاذَا تَعْبُدُونَ
ayah_en: "Behold!" he said to his father and to his people, "What are these that you worship?

ayah_ar: أَئِفْكًا ءَالِهَةًۭ دُونَ ٱللَّهِ تُرِيدُونَ
ayah_en: Would you serve false deities instead of God?

ayah_ar: فَمَا ظَنُّكُم بِرَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_en: What do you think of the Lord of the Worlds?"

ayah_ar: فَنَظَرَ نَظْرَةًۭ فِى ٱلنُّجُومِ
ayah_en: He looked up at the stars.

ayah_ar: فَقَالَ إِنِّى سَقِيمٌۭ
ayah_en: And said, "I am sick,"

ayah_ar: فَتَوَلَّوْا۟ عَنْهُ مُدْبِرِينَ
ayah_en: so they turned their backs on him and went off.

ayah_ar: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِهِمْ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
ayah_en: He turned to their gods and said, "Do you not eat?

ayah_ar: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَنطِقُونَ
ayah_en: What is the matter with you that you do not speak?"

ayah_ar: فَرَاغَ عَلَيْهِمْ ضَرْبًۢا بِٱلْيَمِينِ
ayah_en: then he turned on them, striking them down with his right hand.

ayah_ar: فَأَقْبَلُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ يَزِفُّونَ
ayah_en: His people came rushing towards him,

ayah_ar: قَالَ أَتَعْبُدُونَ مَا تَنْحِتُونَ
ayah_en: but he said, "How can you worship things you carve with your own hands,

ayah_ar: وَٱللَّهُ خَلَقَكُمْ وَمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
ayah_en: when it is God who has created you and all your handiwork?"

ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ ٱبْنُوا۟ لَهُۥ بُنْيَٰنًۭا فَأَلْقُوهُ فِى ٱلْجَحِيمِ
ayah_en: They said, "Build a pyre for him and throw him into the blaze!"

ayah_ar: فَأَرَادُوا۟ بِهِۦ كَيْدًۭا فَجَعَلْنَٰهُمُ ٱلْأَسْفَلِينَ
ayah_en: They wanted to harm him, but We humiliated them all.

ayah_ar: وَقَالَ إِنِّى ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّى سَيَهْدِينِ
ayah_en: He said, "I will go to my Lord: He is sure to guide me.

ayah_ar: رَبِّ هَبْ لِى مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
ayah_en: Lord, grant me a righteous son."

ayah_ar: فَبَشَّرْنَٰهُ بِغُلَٰمٍ حَلِيمٍۢ
ayah_en: We gave him the good news that he would have a patient, forbearing son.

ayah_ar: فَلَمَّا بَلَغَ مَعَهُ ٱلسَّعْىَ قَالَ يَٰبُنَىَّ إِنِّىٓ أَرَىٰ فِى ٱلْمَنَامِ أَنِّىٓ أَذْبَحُكَ فَٱنظُرْ مَاذَا تَرَىٰ ۚ قَالَ يَٰٓأَبَتِ ٱفْعَلْ مَا تُؤْمَرُ ۖ سَتَجِدُنِىٓ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ
ayah_en: And when he reached the age when he could work with him, he said, "O my son, I have seen in a dream that I am sacrificing you. So tell me what you think of it!" He replied, "O my father, do as you are commanded; and God willing, you will find me steadfast."

ayah_ar: فَلَمَّآ أَسْلَمَا وَتَلَّهُۥ لِلْجَبِينِ
ayah_en: When they had both submitted to God, and he had laid his son down on his face,

ayah_ar: وَنَٰدَيْنَٰهُ أَن يَٰٓإِبْرَٰهِيمُ
ayah_en: We called out to him, "Abraham,

ayah_ar: قَدْ صَدَّقْتَ ٱلرُّءْيَآ ۚ إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
ayah_en: you have fulfilled the dream." It is thus indeed that We reward those who do good,

ayah_ar: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلْبَلَٰٓؤُا۟ ٱلْمُبِينُ
ayah_en: that surely was a manifest trial,

ayah_ar: وَفَدَيْنَٰهُ بِذِبْحٍ عَظِيمٍۢ
ayah_en: We ransomed him with a great sacrifice,

ayah_ar: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِى ٱلْءَاخِرِينَ
ayah_en: and left him thus to be succeeded by a group \[of followers\] among later generations:

ayah_ar: سَلَٰمٌ عَلَىٰٓ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ
ayah_en: "Peace and salutation to Abraham!"

ayah_ar: كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
ayah_en: That is how We recompense the righteous:

ayah_ar: إِنَّهُۥ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayah_en: truly, he was one of Our faithful servants.

ayah_ar: وَبَشَّرْنَٰهُ بِإِسْحَٰقَ نَبِيًّۭا مِّنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
ayah_en: We gave Abraham the good news of Isaac, a prophet and a righteous man,

ayah_ar: وَبَٰرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَىٰٓ إِسْحَٰقَ ۚ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا مُحْسِنٌۭ وَظَالِمٌۭ لِّنَفْسِهِۦ مُبِينٌۭ
ayah_en: and blessed him and Isaac too: some of their offspring were good, but some clearly sinned against their souls.

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ مَنَنَّا عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَٰرُونَ
ayah_en: We also bestowed Our favour on Moses and Aaron:

ayah_ar: وَنَجَّيْنَٰهُمَا وَقَوْمَهُمَا مِنَ ٱلْكَرْبِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
ayah_en: We saved them and their people from great distress;

ayah_ar: وَنَصَرْنَٰهُمْ فَكَانُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْغَٰلِبِينَ
ayah_en: and We helped them, so that they were victorious;

ayah_ar: وَءَاتَيْنَٰهُمَا ٱلْكِتَٰبَ ٱلْمُسْتَبِينَ
ayah_en: and We gave them the Book which helps to make things clear;

ayah_ar: وَهَدَيْنَٰهُمَا ٱلصِّرَٰطَ ٱلْمُسْتَقِيمَ
ayah_en: and guided them to the straight path;

ayah_ar: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِمَا فِى ٱلْءَاخِرِينَ
ayah_en: and We left them thus to be succeeded by a group \[of followers\] among later generations:

ayah_ar: سَلَٰمٌ عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَٰرُونَ
ayah_en: "Peace be upon Moses and Aaron!"

ayah_ar: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
ayah_en: This is how We reward those who do good:

ayah_ar: إِنَّهُمَا مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayah_en: truly they were among Our faithful servants.

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ إِلْيَاسَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
ayah_en: Elijah too was one of the messengers.

ayah_ar: إِذْ قَالَ لِقَوْمِهِۦٓ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
ayah_en: He said to his people, "Have you no fear \[of God?\]

ayah_ar: أَتَدْعُونَ بَعْلًۭا وَتَذَرُونَ أَحْسَنَ ٱلْخَٰلِقِينَ
ayah_en: Do you call on Baal and abandon the Best of Creators,

ayah_ar: ٱللَّهَ رَبَّكُمْ وَرَبَّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
ayah_en: God your Lord and Lord of your forefathers?"

ayah_ar: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَإِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ
ayah_en: but they rejected him, and thus will certainly be called to account;

ayah_ar: إِلَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
ayah_en: except the chosen servants of God.

ayah_ar: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِى ٱلْءَاخِرِينَ
ayah_en: We left him thus to be succeeded by a group \[of followers\] among the following generations --

ayah_ar: سَلَٰمٌ عَلَىٰٓ إِلْ يَاسِينَ
ayah_en: "Peace be on Elijah and his people!"

ayah_ar: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
ayah_en: It is thus indeed that We reward those who do good:

ayah_ar: إِنَّهُۥ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayah_en: surely he was one of Our believing servants.

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ لُوطًۭا لَّمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
ayah_en: Lot was also one of the messengers.

ayah_ar: إِذْ نَجَّيْنَٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥٓ أَجْمَعِينَ
ayah_en: We saved him and all his people,

ayah_ar: إِلَّا عَجُوزًۭا فِى ٱلْغَٰبِرِينَ
ayah_en: except for an old woman who stayed behind,

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ دَمَّرْنَا ٱلْءَاخَرِينَ
ayah_en: and We destroyed the rest.

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّكُمْ لَتَمُرُّونَ عَلَيْهِم مُّصْبِحِينَ
ayah_en: You pass by their ruins morning

ayah_ar: وَبِٱلَّيْلِ ۗ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
ayah_en: and night: will you not take heed?

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ يُونُسَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
ayah_en: Jonah too was one of the messengers.

ayah_ar: إِذْ أَبَقَ إِلَى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ
ayah_en: He fled to the overloaded ship.

ayah_ar: فَسَاهَمَ فَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلْمُدْحَضِينَ
ayah_en: And then they cast lots and he was the one who lost,

ayah_ar: فَٱلْتَقَمَهُ ٱلْحُوتُ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌۭ
ayah_en: and the fish swallowed him while he was blaming himself.

ayah_ar: فَلَوْلَآ أَنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْمُسَبِّحِينَ
ayah_en: Had he not been one of those who acknowledge the glory of God,

ayah_ar: لَلَبِثَ فِى بَطْنِهِۦٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
ayah_en: he would certainly have remained inside the fish till the Day of Resurrection.

ayah_ar: ۞ فَنَبَذْنَٰهُ بِٱلْعَرَآءِ وَهُوَ سَقِيمٌۭ
ayah_en: But We caused him to be cast forth on to the beach, sick as he was,

ayah_ar: وَأَنۢبَتْنَا عَلَيْهِ شَجَرَةًۭ مِّن يَقْطِينٍۢ
ayah_en: and We caused a gourd tree to grow over him.

ayah_ar: وَأَرْسَلْنَٰهُ إِلَىٰ مِا۟ئَةِ أَلْفٍ أَوْ يَزِيدُونَ
ayah_en: We sent him as a messenger to a hundred thousand people or more,

ayah_ar: فَـَٔامَنُوا۟ فَمَتَّعْنَٰهُمْ إِلَىٰ حِينٍۢ
ayah_en: and they believed in him: so We let them live in ease for a while.

ayah_ar: فَٱسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَلِرَبِّكَ ٱلْبَنَاتُ وَلَهُمُ ٱلْبَنُونَ
ayah_en: Now ask them whether your Lord has daughters, whereas they have sons.

ayah_ar: أَمْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ إِنَٰثًۭا وَهُمْ شَٰهِدُونَ
ayah_en: Did We create the angels females, to which they were witnesses?

ayah_ar: أَلَآ إِنَّهُم مِّنْ إِفْكِهِمْ لَيَقُولُونَ
ayah_en: No indeed! It is one of their fabrications when they say:

ayah_ar: وَلَدَ ٱللَّهُ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَكَٰذِبُونَ
ayah_en: "God has begotten children." They are truly liars.

ayah_ar: أَصْطَفَى ٱلْبَنَاتِ عَلَى ٱلْبَنِينَ
ayah_en: Has He chosen daughters over sons?

ayah_ar: مَا لَكُمْ كَيْفَ تَحْكُمُونَ
ayah_en: What is the matter with you? How do you form your judgement?

ayah_ar: أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
ayah_en: Will you not then reflect?

ayah_ar: أَمْ لَكُمْ سُلْطَٰنٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
ayah_en: Or have you clear evidence?

ayah_ar: فَأْتُوا۟ بِكِتَٰبِكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَٰدِقِينَ
ayah_en: Then produce your scriptures, if you are telling the truth.

ayah_ar: وَجَعَلُوا۟ بَيْنَهُۥ وَبَيْنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ نَسَبًۭا ۚ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمَتِ ٱلْجِنَّةُ إِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ
ayah_en: They claim that He has kinship with the jinn, yet the jinn themselves know that they will be produced before Him \[for judgement\].

ayah_ar: سُبْحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
ayah_en: God is far above what they attribute to Him,

ayah_ar: إِلَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
ayah_en: but not so the true servants of God,

ayah_ar: فَإِنَّكُمْ وَمَا تَعْبُدُونَ
ayah_en: neither you nor what you worship

ayah_ar: مَآ أَنتُمْ عَلَيْهِ بِفَٰتِنِينَ
ayah_en: can lure away from God any

ayah_ar: إِلَّا مَنْ هُوَ صَالِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
ayah_en: except those who will burn in Hell.

ayah_ar: وَمَا مِنَّآ إِلَّا لَهُۥ مَقَامٌۭ مَّعْلُومٌۭ
ayah_en: \[The angels say\], "Every single one of us has his place assigned:

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ ٱلصَّآفُّونَ
ayah_en: we are those who stand ranged in ranks.

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ ٱلْمُسَبِّحُونَ
ayah_en: We glorify God."

ayah_ar: وَإِن كَانُوا۟ لَيَقُولُونَ
ayah_en: They say,

ayah_ar: لَوْ أَنَّ عِندَنَا ذِكْرًۭا مِّنَ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
ayah_en: "If we had had with us a Book like that of the people of old,

ayah_ar: لَكُنَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
ayah_en: we would surely have been God's chosen servants,"

ayah_ar: فَكَفَرُوا۟ بِهِۦ ۖ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ
ayah_en: but they have rejected it, \[the Quran\] and they shall soon learn!

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ سَبَقَتْ كَلِمَتُنَا لِعِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
ayah_en: And surely Our word has gone forth respecting Our servants, the messengers:

ayah_ar: إِنَّهُمْ لَهُمُ ٱلْمَنصُورُونَ
ayah_en: that it is certainly they who will be helped;

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ جُندَنَا لَهُمُ ٱلْغَٰلِبُونَ
ayah_en: and that it is Our host that would certainly triumph.

ayah_ar: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍۢ
ayah_en: So turn away from them for a while.

ayah_ar: وَأَبْصِرْهُمْ فَسَوْفَ يُبْصِرُونَ
ayah_en: Watch them: they will soon see.

ayah_ar: أَفَبِعَذَابِنَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
ayah_en: Do they really wish to hasten Our punishment?

ayah_ar: فَإِذَا نَزَلَ بِسَاحَتِهِمْ فَسَآءَ صَبَاحُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ
ayah_en: When it descends on their courtyards, how terrible that morning will be for those who were warned!

ayah_ar: وَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍۢ
ayah_en: So turn away from them for a while.

ayah_ar: وَأَبْصِرْ فَسَوْفَ يُبْصِرُونَ
ayah_en: And watch, for they will soon see.

ayah_ar: سُبْحَٰنَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ ٱلْعِزَّةِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
ayah_en: Glory be to your Lord: the Lord of Glory is far above what they attribute to Him.

ayah_ar: وَسَلَٰمٌ عَلَى ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
ayah_en: Peace be upon the Messengers

ayah_ar: وَٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_en: and praise be to God, the Lord of all the Worlds.

ayah_ar: صٓ ۚ وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ذِى ٱلذِّكْرِ
ayah_en: Sad. By the Quran, full of admonition!

ayah_ar: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى عِزَّةٍۢ وَشِقَاقٍۢ
ayah_en: Those who deny the truth are steeped in arrogance and hostility.

ayah_ar: كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن قَرْنٍۢ فَنَادَوا۟ وَّلَاتَ حِينَ مَنَاصٍۢ
ayah_en: How many generations We have destroyed before them! And they cried out when it was too late to escape.

ayah_ar: وَعَجِبُوٓا۟ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٌۭ مِّنْهُمْ ۖ وَقَالَ ٱلْكَٰفِرُونَ هَٰذَا سَٰحِرٌۭ كَذَّابٌ
ayah_en: They are surprised that a warner should come to them from among themselves. They say, "This is a magician, a great liar.

ayah_ar: أَجَعَلَ ٱلْءَالِهَةَ إِلَٰهًۭا وَٰحِدًا ۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَىْءٌ عُجَابٌۭ
ayah_en: Does he make all the deities out to be one God? This is indeed a strange thing."

ayah_ar: وَٱنطَلَقَ ٱلْمَلَأُ مِنْهُمْ أَنِ ٱمْشُوا۟ وَٱصْبِرُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِكُمْ ۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَىْءٌۭ يُرَادُ
ayah_en: Their leaders departed, saying, "Walk away! Hold fast to your deities. This is clearly a conspiracy.

ayah_ar: مَا سَمِعْنَا بِهَٰذَا فِى ٱلْمِلَّةِ ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ إِنْ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا ٱخْتِلَٰقٌ
ayah_en: We have not heard of any such thing in the old religion. This is nothing but a fabrication.

ayah_ar: أَءُنزِلَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلذِّكْرُ مِنۢ بَيْنِنَا ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى شَكٍّۢ مِّن ذِكْرِى ۖ بَل لَّمَّا يَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِ
ayah_en: Was the message sent only to him out of all of us?" In fact, they doubt My warning; in fact, they have not yet tasted My punishment.

ayah_ar: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَآئِنُ رَحْمَةِ رَبِّكَ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْوَهَّابِ
ayah_en: Do they possess the treasures of the mercy of your Lord, the Mighty, the Great Bestower?

ayah_ar: أَمْ لَهُم مُّلْكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ فَلْيَرْتَقُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَسْبَٰبِ
ayah_en: Have they control over heavens and earth and whatever \[lies\] between them? Then let them climb up to heaven by ropes:

ayah_ar: جُندٌۭ مَّا هُنَالِكَ مَهْزُومٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلْأَحْزَابِ
ayah_en: this host too, among other hosts, is bound to suffer defeat.

ayah_ar: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍۢ وَعَادٌۭ وَفِرْعَوْنُ ذُو ٱلْأَوْتَادِ
ayah_en: Before them the people of Noah denied the truth, as did the 'Ad and Pharaoh of the Stakes,

ayah_ar: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوْمُ لُوطٍۢ وَأَصْحَٰبُ لْـَٔيْكَةِ ۚ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ ٱلْأَحْزَابُ
ayah_en: and the tribe of Thamud, and the people of Lot, and the dwellers of the Wood -- these were the confederates.

ayah_ar: إِن كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ
ayah_en: There was not one of them but treated their messengers as liars, so My punishment rightly overtook them:

ayah_ar: وَمَا يَنظُرُ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِلَّا صَيْحَةًۭ وَٰحِدَةًۭ مَّا لَهَا مِن فَوَاقٍۢ
ayah_en: they have only to wait for one single blast \[of punishment\]: it shall not be delayed by one whit.

ayah_ar: وَقَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا عَجِّل لَّنَا قِطَّنَا قَبْلَ يَوْمِ ٱلْحِسَابِ
ayah_en: They say: "Our Lord! Hasten on for us our fate before the Day of Reckoning."

ayah_ar: ٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَا دَاوُۥدَ ذَا ٱلْأَيْدِ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
ayah_en: Bear with their words patiently. Remember Our servant David, a man of strength who always turned to Us:

ayah_ar: إِنَّا سَخَّرْنَا ٱلْجِبَالَ مَعَهُۥ يُسَبِّحْنَ بِٱلْعَشِىِّ وَٱلْإِشْرَاقِ
ayah_en: We made the mountains join him in glorifying Us at sunset and sunrise;

ayah_ar: وَٱلطَّيْرَ مَحْشُورَةًۭ ۖ كُلٌّۭ لَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌۭ
ayah_en: and the birds, too, in flocks, all turned to Him.

ayah_ar: وَشَدَدْنَا مُلْكَهُۥ وَءَاتَيْنَٰهُ ٱلْحِكْمَةَ وَفَصْلَ ٱلْخِطَابِ
ayah_en: We made his kingdom strong, and bestowed upon him wisdom and sagacity in judgement.

ayah_ar: ۞ وَهَلْ أَتَىٰكَ نَبَؤُا۟ ٱلْخَصْمِ إِذْ تَسَوَّرُوا۟ ٱلْمِحْرَابَ
ayah_en: Have you heard the story of the disputants who entered his chamber by climbing over the wall?

ayah_ar: إِذْ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ دَاوُۥدَ فَفَزِعَ مِنْهُمْ ۖ قَالُوا۟ لَا تَخَفْ ۖ خَصْمَانِ بَغَىٰ بَعْضُنَا عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍۢ فَٱحْكُم بَيْنَنَا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا تُشْطِطْ وَٱهْدِنَآ إِلَىٰ سَوَآءِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ
ayah_en: When they reached David, he took fright, but they said, "Do not be afraid. We are two disputants, one of whom has wronged the other: judge between us fairly, do not be unjust, and guide us to the right path.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ هَٰذَآ أَخِى لَهُۥ تِسْعٌۭ وَتِسْعُونَ نَعْجَةًۭ وَلِىَ نَعْجَةٌۭ وَٰحِدَةٌۭ فَقَالَ أَكْفِلْنِيهَا وَعَزَّنِى فِى ٱلْخِطَابِ
ayah_en: "This brother of mine has ninety-nine ewes and I have only one. He said, "Let me have charge of it," and got the better of me with his words."

ayah_ar: قَالَ لَقَدْ ظَلَمَكَ بِسُؤَالِ نَعْجَتِكَ إِلَىٰ نِعَاجِهِۦ ۖ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرًۭا مِّنَ ٱلْخُلَطَآءِ لَيَبْغِى بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَقَلِيلٌۭ مَّا هُمْ ۗ وَظَنَّ دَاوُۥدُ أَنَّمَا فَتَنَّٰهُ فَٱسْتَغْفَرَ رَبَّهُۥ وَخَرَّ رَاكِعًۭا وَأَنَابَ ۩
ayah_en: David said, "He has certainly wronged you by demanding that your ewe be added to his ewes! Thus many partners wrong one another -- \[all\] save those who believe \[in God\] and do righteous deeds: but how few are they!" And \[suddenly\] David understood that We were only putting him to the test, and so he asked his Lord to forgive him his sins; he fell to his knees, and turned to Him in repentance.

ayah_ar: فَغَفَرْنَا لَهُۥ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍۢ
ayah_en: We forgave him his sins. His reward will be nearness to Us, a good place to return to.

ayah_ar: يَٰدَاوُۥدُ إِنَّا جَعَلْنَٰكَ خَلِيفَةًۭ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱحْكُم بَيْنَ ٱلنَّاسِ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا تَتَّبِعِ ٱلْهَوَىٰ فَيُضِلَّكَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَضِلُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌۭ شَدِيدٌۢ بِمَا نَسُوا۟ يَوْمَ ٱلْحِسَابِ
ayah_en: We said, "David, We have given you mastery over the land. Judge fairly between people. Do not follow your desires, lest they divert you from God's path: those who wander from His path will have a severe punishment, because they ignore the Day of Reckoning."

ayah_ar: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا بَٰطِلًۭا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ظَنُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ۚ فَوَيْلٌۭ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ
ayah_en: We did not create heaven and earth and all that is between them in vain. That is the opinion of those who deny the truth. Woe betide those who deny the truth, when they are cast into the Fire --

ayah_ar: أَمْ نَجْعَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ كَٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ نَجْعَلُ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ كَٱلْفُجَّارِ
ayah_en: shall We treat those who believe and do good works the same as those who spread corruption in the land; shall We treat the pious the same as the wicked?

ayah_ar: كِتَٰبٌ أَنزَلْنَٰهُ إِلَيْكَ مُبَٰرَكٌۭ لِّيَدَّبَّرُوٓا۟ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ وَلِيَتَذَكَّرَ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَٰبِ
ayah_en: This is a blessed Book which We sent down to you \[Muhammad\], for people to ponder over its messages, and for those with understanding to take heed.

ayah_ar: وَوَهَبْنَا لِدَاوُۥدَ سُلَيْمَٰنَ ۚ نِعْمَ ٱلْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
ayah_en: We gave David Solomon. He was an excellent servant who always turned to God.

ayah_ar: إِذْ عُرِضَ عَلَيْهِ بِٱلْعَشِىِّ ٱلصَّٰفِنَٰتُ ٱلْجِيَادُ
ayah_en: When well-bred horses, which were fleet of foot were paraded before him near the close of day,

ayah_ar: فَقَالَ إِنِّىٓ أَحْبَبْتُ حُبَّ ٱلْخَيْرِ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّى حَتَّىٰ تَوَارَتْ بِٱلْحِجَابِ
ayah_en: he said, "I have put the love of good things above the remembrance of my Lord," until \[the sun\] disappeared behind its veil and the horses disappeared from sight,

ayah_ar: رُدُّوهَا عَلَىَّ ۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسْحًۢا بِٱلسُّوقِ وَٱلْأَعْنَاقِ
ayah_en: "Bring them back to me!" -- \[he said\] and began to stroke their legs and their necks.

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا سُلَيْمَٰنَ وَأَلْقَيْنَا عَلَىٰ كُرْسِيِّهِۦ جَسَدًۭا ثُمَّ أَنَابَ
ayah_en: We tried Solomon by placing upon his throne a \[lifeless\] body; and thereupon he turned towards Us\].

ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱغْفِرْ لِى وَهَبْ لِى مُلْكًۭا لَّا يَنۢبَغِى لِأَحَدٍۢ مِّنۢ بَعْدِىٓ ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْوَهَّابُ
ayah_en: He prayed, "Lord forgive me! Grant me such power as no one after me will have -- You are the Most Generous Provider."

ayah_ar: فَسَخَّرْنَا لَهُ ٱلرِّيحَ تَجْرِى بِأَمْرِهِۦ رُخَآءً حَيْثُ أَصَابَ
ayah_en: Then We subjected the wind to his power, so that it blew gently, at his behest, wherever he willed,

ayah_ar: وَٱلشَّيَٰطِينَ كُلَّ بَنَّآءٍۢ وَغَوَّاصٍۢ
ayah_en: and also the jinn, every kind of builder and diver

ayah_ar: وَءَاخَرِينَ مُقَرَّنِينَ فِى ٱلْأَصْفَادِ
ayah_en: and others chained in fetters.

ayah_ar: هَٰذَا عَطَآؤُنَا فَٱمْنُنْ أَوْ أَمْسِكْ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍۢ
ayah_en: We said: "This is Our gift, so give or withhold as you wish without reckoning."

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍۢ
ayah_en: His reward will be nearness to Us, a good place to return to.

ayah_ar: وَٱذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَآ أَيُّوبَ إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّى مَسَّنِىَ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنُ بِنُصْبٍۢ وَعَذَابٍ
ayah_en: Bring to mind Our servant Job who cried to his Lord, "Satan has afflicted me with distress and suffering."

ayah_ar: ٱرْكُضْ بِرِجْلِكَ ۖ هَٰذَا مُغْتَسَلٌۢ بَارِدٌۭ وَشَرَابٌۭ
ayah_en: We said, "Stamp your foot! Here is cool water for you to wash in and drink,"

ayah_ar: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُۥٓ أَهْلَهُۥ وَمِثْلَهُم مَّعَهُمْ رَحْمَةًۭ مِّنَّا وَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَلْبَٰبِ
ayah_en: We restored his family to him, doubling their number as an act of grace from Us, and as a reminder to all who are endowed with insight.

ayah_ar: وَخُذْ بِيَدِكَ ضِغْثًۭا فَٱضْرِب بِّهِۦ وَلَا تَحْنَثْ ۗ إِنَّا وَجَدْنَٰهُ صَابِرًۭا ۚ نِّعْمَ ٱلْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌۭ
ayah_en: We said to Him, "Take a handful of twigs in your hand and strike with that but do not break your oath." We found him steadfast. What an excellent servant! He turned constantly to his Lord.

ayah_ar: وَٱذْكُرْ عِبَٰدَنَآ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسْحَٰقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ أُو۟لِى ٱلْأَيْدِى وَٱلْأَبْصَٰرِ
ayah_en: Remember Our servants Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob -- possessors of strength and vision.

ayah_ar: إِنَّآ أَخْلَصْنَٰهُم بِخَالِصَةٍۢ ذِكْرَى ٱلدَّارِ
ayah_en: We chose them for a special \[purpose\] -- proclaiming the message of the Hereafter:

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّهُمْ عِندَنَا لَمِنَ ٱلْمُصْطَفَيْنَ ٱلْأَخْيَارِ
ayah_en: and, in Our sight they were indeed among the select, the truly good!

ayah_ar: وَٱذْكُرْ إِسْمَٰعِيلَ وَٱلْيَسَعَ وَذَا ٱلْكِفْلِ ۖ وَكُلٌّۭ مِّنَ ٱلْأَخْيَارِ
ayah_en: Remember \[Our servants\] Ishmael, Elisha, and Dhu'l-Kifl. Each of them was among the just.

ayah_ar: هَٰذَا ذِكْرٌۭ ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍۢ
ayah_en: This is a Reminder. The righteous shall have a good place to return to:

ayah_ar: جَنَّٰتِ عَدْنٍۢ مُّفَتَّحَةًۭ لَّهُمُ ٱلْأَبْوَٰبُ
ayah_en: the Gardens of eternity with gates thrown wide open to them.

ayah_ar: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِفَٰكِهَةٍۢ كَثِيرَةٍۢ وَشَرَابٍۢ
ayah_en: They will be comfortably seated; reclining, they will call for abundant fruit and drink;

ayah_ar: ۞ وَعِندَهُمْ قَٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرْفِ أَتْرَابٌ
ayah_en: with them, they will have pure, modest women of an equal age.

ayah_ar: هَٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِيَوْمِ ٱلْحِسَابِ
ayah_en: This is what you were promised on the Day of Reckoning:

ayah_ar: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَرِزْقُنَا مَا لَهُۥ مِن نَّفَادٍ
ayah_en: Our provision for you will never be exhausted.

ayah_ar: هَٰذَا ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلطَّٰغِينَ لَشَرَّ مَـَٔابٍۢ
ayah_en: But the arrogant will have the worst return:

ayah_ar: جَهَنَّمَ يَصْلَوْنَهَا فَبِئْسَ ٱلْمِهَادُ
ayah_en: they will burn, in Hell, an evil resting place --

ayah_ar: هَٰذَا فَلْيَذُوقُوهُ حَمِيمٌۭ وَغَسَّاقٌۭ
ayah_en: all this will be theirs; let them taste it -- a scalding, dark, foul fluid,

ayah_ar: وَءَاخَرُ مِن شَكْلِهِۦٓ أَزْوَٰجٌ
ayah_en: and other such torments.

ayah_ar: هَٰذَا فَوْجٌۭ مُّقْتَحِمٌۭ مَّعَكُمْ ۖ لَا مَرْحَبًۢا بِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ صَالُوا۟ ٱلنَّارِ
ayah_en: \[And they will say to one another: "Do you see\] this crowd of people rushing headlong to join you?" "No welcome to them! Indeed, they are headed for the fire!"

ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ أَنتُمْ لَا مَرْحَبًۢا بِكُمْ ۖ أَنتُمْ قَدَّمْتُمُوهُ لَنَا ۖ فَبِئْسَ ٱلْقَرَارُ
ayah_en: They will say to them, "You are not welcome! It was you who brought this on us, an evil place to stay,"

ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا مَن قَدَّمَ لَنَا هَٰذَا فَزِدْهُ عَذَابًۭا ضِعْفًۭا فِى ٱلنَّارِ
ayah_en: adding, "Our Lord, give double punishment to those who brought this upon us."

ayah_ar: وَقَالُوا۟ مَا لَنَا لَا نَرَىٰ رِجَالًۭا كُنَّا نَعُدُّهُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَشْرَارِ
ayah_en: And they will say, "How is it that we do not see \[here any of the\] men whom we used to count among the wicked,

ayah_ar: أَتَّخَذْنَٰهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا أَمْ زَاغَتْ عَنْهُمُ ٱلْأَبْصَٰرُ
ayah_en: \[and\] whom we made the target of our derision? Or are they here, and our eyes have missed them?"

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقٌّۭ تَخَاصُمُ أَهْلِ ٱلنَّارِ
ayah_en: All this is certainly true -- the inhabitants of the Fire will blame one another in this way.

ayah_ar: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ مُنذِرٌۭ ۖ وَمَا مِنْ إِلَٰهٍ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ ٱلْوَٰحِدُ ٱلْقَهَّارُ
ayah_en: Say, \[Prophet\], "I am only a warner. There is no god but God, the One, the All-Powerful,

ayah_ar: رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْغَفَّٰرُ
ayah_en: Lord of the heavens and earth and everything between them, the Almighty, the Most Forgiving."

ayah_ar: قُلْ هُوَ نَبَؤٌا۟ عَظِيمٌ
ayah_en: Say, "This is momentous news,

ayah_ar: أَنتُمْ عَنْهُ مُعْرِضُونَ
ayah_en: yet you ignore it.

ayah_ar: مَا كَانَ لِىَ مِنْ عِلْمٍۭ بِٱلْمَلَإِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰٓ إِذْ يَخْتَصِمُونَ
ayah_en: I had no knowledge of the Exalted Assembly when they argued \[against the creation of man\]:

ayah_ar: إِن يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَىَّ إِلَّآ أَنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٌۭ مُّبِينٌ
ayah_en: it has only been revealed to me that I am a plain warner."

ayah_ar: إِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّى خَٰلِقٌۢ بَشَرًۭا مِّن طِينٍۢ
ayah_en: Your Lord said to the angels, "I am about to create a human being out of clay;

ayah_ar: فَإِذَا سَوَّيْتُهُۥ وَنَفَخْتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِى فَقَعُوا۟ لَهُۥ سَٰجِدِينَ
ayah_en: and when I have formed him fully and breathed My spirit into him, prostrate yourselves before him."

ayah_ar: فَسَجَدَ ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ كُلُّهُمْ أَجْمَعُونَ
ayah_en: Thereupon the angels prostrated themselves, all of them together,

ayah_ar: إِلَّآ إِبْلِيسَ ٱسْتَكْبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ
ayah_en: but not Satan, who was too proud. He became one of those who deny the truth.

ayah_ar: قَالَ يَٰٓإِبْلِيسُ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَن تَسْجُدَ لِمَا خَلَقْتُ بِيَدَىَّ ۖ أَسْتَكْبَرْتَ أَمْ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْعَالِينَ
ayah_en: God said, "Satan, what prevented you from prostrating yourself to what I created with My own Hands? Were you overcome by arrogance, or are you of those who think \[only\] of themselves as exalted?"

ayah_ar: قَالَ أَنَا۠ خَيْرٌۭ مِّنْهُ ۖ خَلَقْتَنِى مِن نَّارٍۢ وَخَلَقْتَهُۥ مِن طِينٍۢ
ayah_en: Satan replied, "I am better than him. You created me from fire, but You created him from clay."

ayah_ar: قَالَ فَٱخْرُجْ مِنْهَا فَإِنَّكَ رَجِيمٌۭ
ayah_en: "Begone! You are accursed:

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكَ لَعْنَتِىٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
ayah_en: My curse will remain upon you till the Day of Judgement!"

ayah_ar: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرْنِىٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
ayah_en: But Satan said, "My Lord, grant me respite until the Day of Resurrection,"

ayah_ar: قَالَ فَإِنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُنظَرِينَ
ayah_en: so He said, "You are granted respite

ayah_ar: إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْوَقْتِ ٱلْمَعْلُومِ
ayah_en: till the Appointed Day."

ayah_ar: قَالَ فَبِعِزَّتِكَ لَأُغْوِيَنَّهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
ayah_en: He said, "By Your Honour, I will lead all of them astray,

ayah_ar: إِلَّا عِبَادَكَ مِنْهُمُ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
ayah_en: except for those among them who are Your chosen servants."

ayah_ar: قَالَ فَٱلْحَقُّ وَٱلْحَقَّ أَقُولُ
ayah_en: God said, "This is the truth, I speak only the truth,

ayah_ar: لَأَمْلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنكَ وَمِمَّن تَبِعَكَ مِنْهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
ayah_en: I will fill up Hell with you and every one of them who follows you."

ayah_ar: قُلْ مَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍۢ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلْمُتَكَلِّفِينَ
ayah_en: Say, "I do not ask you for any recompense for this, nor am I a man of false pretentions:

ayah_ar: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌۭ لِّلْعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_en: this is simply an admonition to mankind,

ayah_ar: وَلَتَعْلَمُنَّ نَبَأَهُۥ بَعْدَ حِينٍۭ
ayah_en: you shall before long know its truth."

ayah_ar: تَنزِيلُ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ
ayah_en: This Book is sent down by God the Mighty, the Wise.

ayah_ar: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَآ إِلَيْكَ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ بِٱلْحَقِّ فَٱعْبُدِ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصًۭا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ
ayah_en: It is We who sent down the Book to you \[Prophet\] with the Truth, so worship God with your total devotion:

ayah_ar: أَلَا لِلَّهِ ٱلدِّينُ ٱلْخَالِصُ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوْلِيَآءَ مَا نَعْبُدُهُمْ إِلَّا لِيُقَرِّبُونَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ زُلْفَىٰٓ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَحْكُمُ بَيْنَهُمْ فِى مَا هُمْ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهْدِى مَنْ هُوَ كَٰذِبٌۭ كَفَّارٌۭ
ayah_en: it is to God alone that sincere obedience is due. And those who take other guardians besides Him say, "We serve them only that they may bring us nearer to God." Surely, God will judge between them concerning that wherein they differ. God does not guide anyone who is bent on lying and is a disbelieving liar.

ayah_ar: لَّوْ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًۭا لَّٱصْطَفَىٰ مِمَّا يَخْلُقُ مَا يَشَآءُ ۚ سُبْحَٰنَهُۥ ۖ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْوَٰحِدُ ٱلْقَهَّارُ
ayah_en: If God had willed to take a son He could have chosen anyone He pleased out of His creation: but Glory be to Him! \[He is above such things.\] He is God, the One, the Omnipotent.

ayah_ar: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ يُكَوِّرُ ٱلَّيْلَ عَلَى ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُكَوِّرُ ٱلنَّهَارَ عَلَى ٱلَّيْلِ ۖ وَسَخَّرَ ٱلشَّمْسَ وَٱلْقَمَرَ ۖ كُلٌّۭ يَجْرِى لِأَجَلٍۢ مُّسَمًّى ۗ أَلَا هُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْغَفَّٰرُ
ayah_en: He created the heavens and the earth for a true purpose; He causes the night to succeed the day and the day to succeed the night; He has subjected the sun and moon, so that they run their courses for an appointed time; He is truly the Mighty, the Forgiving.

ayah_ar: خَلَقَكُم مِّن نَّفْسٍۢ وَٰحِدَةٍۢ ثُمَّ جَعَلَ مِنْهَا زَوْجَهَا وَأَنزَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَنْعَٰمِ ثَمَٰنِيَةَ أَزْوَٰجٍۢ ۚ يَخْلُقُكُمْ فِى بُطُونِ أُمَّهَٰتِكُمْ خَلْقًۭا مِّنۢ بَعْدِ خَلْقٍۢ فِى ظُلُمَٰتٍۢ ثَلَٰثٍۢ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمْ لَهُ ٱلْمُلْكُ ۖ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُصْرَفُونَ
ayah_en: He created you from a single soul, then produced its spouse from it, and He has provided for you eight heads of cattle in pairs. He creates you stage by stage in your mothers' wombs in a threefold darkness. Such is God, your Lord. Sovereignty is His. There is no god but Him. So what has made you turn away?

ayah_ar: إِن تَكْفُرُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَنِىٌّ عَنكُمْ ۖ وَلَا يَرْضَىٰ لِعِبَادِهِ ٱلْكُفْرَ ۖ وَإِن تَشْكُرُوا۟ يَرْضَهُ لَكُمْ ۗ وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌۭ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ ۗ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُم مَّرْجِعُكُمْ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
ayah_en: If you are ungrateful, remember that God has no need of you. He is not pleased by ingratitude in His servants; if you are grateful, He is pleased \[to see\] it in you. No soul shall bear another's burden. You will return to your Lord in the end and He will declare to you what you have done: He knows well what is in the hearts of men.

ayah_ar: ۞ وَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ ضُرٌّۭ دَعَا رَبَّهُۥ مُنِيبًا إِلَيْهِ ثُمَّ إِذَا خَوَّلَهُۥ نِعْمَةًۭ مِّنْهُ نَسِىَ مَا كَانَ يَدْعُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ مِن قَبْلُ وَجَعَلَ لِلَّهِ أَندَادًۭا لِّيُضِلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ ۚ قُلْ تَمَتَّعْ بِكُفْرِكَ قَلِيلًا ۖ إِنَّكَ مِنْ أَصْحَٰبِ ٱلنَّارِ
ayah_en: When man suffers some affliction, he prays to his Lord and turns to Him in penitence, but once he has been granted a favour from God, he forgets the One he had been praying to and sets up rivals to God, to make others stray from His path. Say, "Enjoy your unbelief for a little while: you will be one of the inmates of the Fire."

ayah_ar: أَمَّنْ هُوَ قَٰنِتٌ ءَانَآءَ ٱلَّيْلِ سَاجِدًۭا وَقَآئِمًۭا يَحْذَرُ ٱلْءَاخِرَةَ وَيَرْجُوا۟ رَحْمَةَ رَبِّهِۦ ۗ قُلْ هَلْ يَسْتَوِى ٱلَّذِينَ يَعْلَمُونَ وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ ۗ إِنَّمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَٰبِ
ayah_en: Is he who prays devoutly to God in the hours of the night, prostrating himself and standing in prayer, who is ever mindful of the life to come and hopes for the mercy of his Lord \[like one who does not\]? Say, "Are those who know equal to those who do not know?" Truly, only those endowed with understanding will take heed.

ayah_ar: قُلْ يَٰعِبَادِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّقُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ ۚ لِلَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا۟ فِى هَٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةٌۭ ۗ وَأَرْضُ ٱللَّهِ وَٰسِعَةٌ ۗ إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى ٱلصَّٰبِرُونَ أَجْرَهُم بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍۢ
ayah_en: Say, "\[God says\] O My servants who have believed, fear your Lord. For those who do good in this world will have a good reward -- and God's earth is spacious. Truly, those who persevere patiently will be requited without measure."

ayah_ar: قُلْ إِنِّىٓ أُمِرْتُ أَنْ أَعْبُدَ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصًۭا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ
ayah_en: Say, "I have been commanded to serve God, dedicating my worship entirely to Him.

ayah_ar: وَأُمِرْتُ لِأَنْ أَكُونَ أَوَّلَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ
ayah_en: I have been commanded to be the first to submit."

ayah_ar: قُلْ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ إِنْ عَصَيْتُ رَبِّى عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍۢ
ayah_en: Say, "I fear, if I disobey my Lord, the punishment of a Terrible Day."

ayah_ar: قُلِ ٱللَّهَ أَعْبُدُ مُخْلِصًۭا لَّهُۥ دِينِى
ayah_en: Say, "It is God I serve, sincere in my faith in Him alone --

ayah_ar: فَٱعْبُدُوا۟ مَا شِئْتُم مِّن دُونِهِۦ ۗ قُلْ إِنَّ ٱلْخَٰسِرِينَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَأَهْلِيهِمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ ۗ أَلَا ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْخُسْرَانُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
ayah_en: as for yourselves, worship anything you please besides Him!" Say, "The real losers will be those who lose themselves and all their kith and kin on the Day of Resurrection. That is the \[most\] obvious loss.

ayah_ar: لَهُم مِّن فَوْقِهِمْ ظُلَلٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَمِن تَحْتِهِمْ ظُلَلٌۭ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يُخَوِّفُ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦ عِبَادَهُۥ ۚ يَٰعِبَادِ فَٱتَّقُونِ
ayah_en: They will have sheets of fire above them and sheets of fire beneath them." That is how God puts fear into the hearts of His servants. Fear me, then, My servants.

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱجْتَنَبُوا۟ ٱلطَّٰغُوتَ أَن يَعْبُدُوهَا وَأَنَابُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ لَهُمُ ٱلْبُشْرَىٰ ۚ فَبَشِّرْ عِبَادِ
ayah_en: There is good news for those who shun the worship of false deities and turn to God, so give good news to My servants,

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ يَسْتَمِعُونَ ٱلْقَوْلَ فَيَتَّبِعُونَ أَحْسَنَهُۥٓ ۚ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ هَدَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۖ وَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمْ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَٰبِ
ayah_en: who listen to what is said and follow what is best in it. These are the ones God has guided; these are the people endowed with understanding.

ayah_ar: أَفَمَنْ حَقَّ عَلَيْهِ كَلِمَةُ ٱلْعَذَابِ أَفَأَنتَ تُنقِذُ مَن فِى ٱلنَّارِ
ayah_en: But what of him against whom the sentence of punishment is justified? Can you rescue one who is already in the Fire?

ayah_ar: لَٰكِنِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ رَبَّهُمْ لَهُمْ غُرَفٌۭ مِّن فَوْقِهَا غُرَفٌۭ مَّبْنِيَّةٌۭ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَٰرُ ۖ وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ لَا يُخْلِفُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمِيعَادَ
ayah_en: But for those who truly feared their Lord, there will be tall mansions, built up storey upon storey, beneath which there will be rivers flowing. This is God's promise: God never fails in His promise.

ayah_ar: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۭ فَسَلَكَهُۥ يَنَٰبِيعَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ثُمَّ يُخْرِجُ بِهِۦ زَرْعًۭا مُّخْتَلِفًا أَلْوَٰنُهُۥ ثُمَّ يَهِيجُ فَتَرَىٰهُ مُصْفَرًّۭا ثُمَّ يَجْعَلُهُۥ حُطَٰمًا ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَلْبَٰبِ
ayah_en: Have you not seen that God sends down water from the sky, guides it to form springs in the earth, and then, with it, brings forth vegetation of various colours, which later withers, turns yellow before your eyes, and then He makes it crumble away? There is truly a reminder in this for those who possess understanding.

ayah_ar: أَفَمَن شَرَحَ ٱللَّهُ صَدْرَهُۥ لِلْإِسْلَٰمِ فَهُوَ عَلَىٰ نُورٍۢ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ ۚ فَوَيْلٌۭ لِّلْقَٰسِيَةِ قُلُوبُهُم مِّن ذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ فِى ضَلَٰلٍۢ مُّبِينٍ
ayah_en: Anyone whose heart God has opened up to Islam possesses a light from his Lord. But woe betide those whose hearts have been hardened against the rememberance of God! Such people are in obvious error.

ayah_ar: ٱللَّهُ نَزَّلَ أَحْسَنَ ٱلْحَدِيثِ كِتَٰبًۭا مُّتَشَٰبِهًۭا مَّثَانِىَ تَقْشَعِرُّ مِنْهُ جُلُودُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُمْ ثُمَّ تَلِينُ جُلُودُهُمْ وَقُلُوبُهُمْ إِلَىٰ ذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُدَى ٱللَّهِ يَهْدِى بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَمَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنْ هَادٍ
ayah_en: God has sent down the best Message: a Scripture that is consimilar and oft-repeated: that causes the skins of those in awe of their Lord to creep. Then their skins and their hearts soften at the mention of God: such is God's guidance. He bestows it upon whoever He will; but no one can guide those whom God leaves to stray.

ayah_ar: أَفَمَن يَتَّقِى بِوَجْهِهِۦ سُوٓءَ ٱلْعَذَابِ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ ۚ وَقِيلَ لِلظَّٰلِمِينَ ذُوقُوا۟ مَا كُنتُمْ تَكْسِبُونَ
ayah_en: What about the one who will have only his bare face to protect him from his terrible punishment on the Day of Resurrection? The evil-doers will be told, "Taste what you have earned."

ayah_ar: كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَأَتَىٰهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
ayah_en: Those before them also denied the truth, and the punishment fell on them from where they did not expect.

ayah_ar: فَأَذَاقَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْخِزْىَ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ أَكْبَرُ ۚ لَوْ كَانُوا۟ يَعْلَمُونَ
ayah_en: God gave them a taste of humiliation in the life of this world, but the punishment of the Hereafter is greater, if they only knew it.

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ ضَرَبْنَا لِلنَّاسِ فِى هَٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٍۢ لَّعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
ayah_en: We have set forth to men all kinds of parables in this Quran so that they may take heed:

ayah_ar: قُرْءَانًا عَرَبِيًّا غَيْرَ ذِى عِوَجٍۢ لَّعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ
ayah_en: a Quran in Arabic, free from any ambiguity -- so that people may be mindful.

ayah_ar: ضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلًۭا رَّجُلًۭا فِيهِ شُرَكَآءُ مُتَشَٰكِسُونَ وَرَجُلًۭا سَلَمًۭا لِّرَجُلٍ هَلْ يَسْتَوِيَانِ مَثَلًا ۚ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ۚ بَلْ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
ayah_en: God sets forth a parable: there are two men -- one belonging to many masters, all disagreeing with one another, and the other belonging entirely to one master: are those two equal in comparison? Praise be to God! But most of them have no knowledge.

ayah_ar: إِنَّكَ مَيِّتٌۭ وَإِنَّهُم مَّيِّتُونَ
ayah_en: You will die and they too will die,

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ عِندَ رَبِّكُمْ تَخْتَصِمُونَ
ayah_en: and, then on the Day of Resurrection you shall place your dispute before your Sustainer.

ayah_ar: ۞ فَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّن كَذَبَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلصِّدْقِ إِذْ جَآءَهُۥٓ ۚ أَلَيْسَ فِى جَهَنَّمَ مَثْوًۭى لِّلْكَٰفِرِينَ
ayah_en: Who, then, is more unjust than he who lies about God and rejects the truth when it comes to him? Is not Hell an abode for those who deny the truth?

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِى جَآءَ بِٱلصِّدْقِ وَصَدَّقَ بِهِۦٓ ۙ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُتَّقُونَ
ayah_en: He who brings the truth, and he who testifies to it as such -- those are surely the people who are God-fearing:

ayah_ar: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
ayah_en: they will have everything they wish for from their Lord. Such is the reward of those who do good:

ayah_ar: لِيُكَفِّرَ ٱللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ أَسْوَأَ ٱلَّذِى عَمِلُوا۟ وَيَجْزِيَهُمْ أَجْرَهُم بِأَحْسَنِ ٱلَّذِى كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
ayah_en: God will efface their worst deeds from their record and give them their reward in accordance with the best of their actions.

ayah_ar: أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّهُ بِكَافٍ عَبْدَهُۥ ۖ وَيُخَوِّفُونَكَ بِٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦ ۚ وَمَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنْ هَادٍۢ
ayah_en: Is God not enough for His servant? Yet they try to frighten you with other \[deities\] besides Him! For such as God lets go astray, there will be no guide;

ayah_ar: وَمَن يَهْدِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن مُّضِلٍّ ۗ أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّهُ بِعَزِيزٍۢ ذِى ٱنتِقَامٍۢ
ayah_en: but he whom God guides cannot be led astray by anyone. Is God not mighty and capable of retribution?

ayah_ar: وَلَئِن سَأَلْتَهُم مَّنْ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُ ۚ قُلْ أَفَرَءَيْتُم مَّا تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ إِنْ أَرَادَنِىَ ٱللَّهُ بِضُرٍّ هَلْ هُنَّ كَٰشِفَٰتُ ضُرِّهِۦٓ أَوْ أَرَادَنِى بِرَحْمَةٍ هَلْ هُنَّ مُمْسِكَٰتُ رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ قُلْ حَسْبِىَ ٱللَّهُ ۖ عَلَيْهِ يَتَوَكَّلُ ٱلْمُتَوَكِّلُونَ
ayah_en: If you ask them who created the heavens and the earth, they will surely reply, "God." Say, "Consider those you invoke besides Him: if God wished to harm me, could they undo that harm? Or if God wished to show me mercy, could they withhold that mercy?" Say, "God is sufficient for me. In Him let the faithful put their trust."

ayah_ar: قُلْ يَٰقَوْمِ ٱعْمَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمْ إِنِّى عَٰمِلٌۭ ۖ فَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
ayah_en: Say, "My people, do whatever is in your power -- and so will I. Soon you shall come to know

ayah_ar: مَن يَأْتِيهِ عَذَابٌۭ يُخْزِيهِ وَيَحِلُّ عَلَيْهِ عَذَابٌۭ مُّقِيمٌ
ayah_en: who will suffer a humiliating torment and on whom will descend an everlasting punishment."

ayah_ar: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ لِلنَّاسِ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ فَمَنِ ٱهْتَدَىٰ فَلِنَفْسِهِۦ ۖ وَمَن ضَلَّ فَإِنَّمَا يَضِلُّ عَلَيْهَا ۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِوَكِيلٍ
ayah_en: \[O Prophet!\] We have sent down to you the Book for mankind with the truth. Then whoever adopts the right way, will do so for his own soul, and whoever goes astray, injures his own soul. You are not their custodian.

ayah_ar: ٱللَّهُ يَتَوَفَّى ٱلْأَنفُسَ حِينَ مَوْتِهَا وَٱلَّتِى لَمْ تَمُتْ فِى مَنَامِهَا ۖ فَيُمْسِكُ ٱلَّتِى قَضَىٰ عَلَيْهَا ٱلْمَوْتَ وَيُرْسِلُ ٱلْأُخْرَىٰٓ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍۢ مُّسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَٰتٍۢ لِّقَوْمٍۢ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
ayah_en: It is God who takes away men's souls upon their death and the souls of the living during their sleep. Then He withholds those for whom He has ordained death and restores the souls of others for an appointed term. There are certainly signs in this for those who reflect.

ayah_ar: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ شُفَعَآءَ ۚ قُلْ أَوَلَوْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ شَيْـًۭٔا وَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ
ayah_en: Have they taken others for intercessors besides God? Say, "Even though they have no power nor understanding?"

ayah_ar: قُل لِّلَّهِ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةُ جَمِيعًۭا ۖ لَّهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
ayah_en: Say, "Intercession is entirely in the hands of God. He controls the heavens and the earth; you will all return to Him."

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ ٱشْمَأَزَّتْ قُلُوبُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْءَاخِرَةِ ۖ وَإِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ إِذَا هُمْ يَسْتَبْشِرُونَ
ayah_en: When God alone is named, the hearts of those who do not believe in the Hereafter shrink with aversion, but when others are named instead of Him, they are filled with joy.

ayah_ar: قُلِ ٱللَّهُمَّ فَاطِرَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ عَٰلِمَ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِ أَنتَ تَحْكُمُ بَيْنَ عِبَادِكَ فِى مَا كَانُوا۟ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ
ayah_en: Say, "O God! Originator of the heavens and earth! Knower of all that is hidden and all that is manifest, You will judge between Your servants regarding their differences."

ayah_ar: وَلَوْ أَنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ مَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًۭا وَمِثْلَهُۥ مَعَهُۥ لَٱفْتَدَوْا۟ بِهِۦ مِن سُوٓءِ ٱلْعَذَابِ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ ۚ وَبَدَا لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَمْ يَكُونُوا۟ يَحْتَسِبُونَ
ayah_en: If the wrongdoers possessed all that is on earth, and twice as much, they would offer it to redeem themselves from the awful suffering on the Day of Resurrection. For God will show them what they had never anticipated,

ayah_ar: وَبَدَا لَهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُوا۟ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
ayah_en: the evil of their deeds will become apparent to them, and they will be overwhelmed by that which they used to mock.

ayah_ar: فَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ ضُرٌّۭ دَعَانَا ثُمَّ إِذَا خَوَّلْنَٰهُ نِعْمَةًۭ مِّنَّا قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أُوتِيتُهُۥ عَلَىٰ عِلْمٍۭ ۚ بَلْ هِىَ فِتْنَةٌۭ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
ayah_en: When affliction befalls man, he appeals to Us; but when We bestow a favour upon him he says, "All this has been given to me because of my own knowledge." By no means! It is a trial: yet most of them do not realize it.

ayah_ar: قَدْ قَالَهَا ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَمَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
ayah_en: Those who preceded them said the same thing but they gained nothing from what they did;

ayah_ar: فَأَصَابَهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُوا۟ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ مِنْ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ سَيُصِيبُهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُوا۟ وَمَا هُم بِمُعْجِزِينَ
ayah_en: the very evil of their deeds recoiled upon them; today's wrongdoers shall also have the evil of their deeds recoil upon them: they will never be able to frustrate \[Our plan\].

ayah_ar: أَوَلَمْ يَعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَبْسُطُ ٱلرِّزْقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقْدِرُ ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَٰتٍۢ لِّقَوْمٍۢ يُؤْمِنُونَ
ayah_en: Do they not know that God grants abundant sustenance to anyone He wishes and gives sparingly to anyone He pleases? Surely there are signs in this for those who believe.

ayah_ar: ۞ قُلْ يَٰعِبَادِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسْرَفُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ لَا تَقْنَطُوا۟ مِن رَّحْمَةِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَغْفِرُ ٱلذُّنُوبَ جَمِيعًا ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayah_en: Say, \[God says\] "O My servants, who have committed excesses against their own souls, do not despair of God's mercy, for God surely forgives all sins. He is truly the Most Forgiving, the Most Merciful.

ayah_ar: وَأَنِيبُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمْ وَأَسْلِمُوا۟ لَهُۥ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَكُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ ثُمَّ لَا تُنصَرُونَ
ayah_en: Turn to your Lord and submit to Him before His scourge overtakes you, for then you shall not be helped.

ayah_ar: وَٱتَّبِعُوٓا۟ أَحْسَنَ مَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكُم مِّن رَّبِّكُم مِّن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَكُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ بَغْتَةًۭ وَأَنتُمْ لَا تَشْعُرُونَ
ayah_en: Follow the best aspect of what is sent down to you from your Lord, before the scourge comes upon you unawares,

ayah_ar: أَن تَقُولَ نَفْسٌۭ يَٰحَسْرَتَىٰ عَلَىٰ مَا فَرَّطتُ فِى جَنۢبِ ٱللَّهِ وَإِن كُنتُ لَمِنَ ٱلسَّٰخِرِينَ
ayah_en: lest anyone should say, "Alas for me, for having neglected what is due to God, and having been one of those who scoffed!"

ayah_ar: أَوْ تَقُولَ لَوْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هَدَىٰنِى لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
ayah_en: Or, "If only God had guided me, I would surely have joined the God-fearing."

ayah_ar: أَوْ تَقُولَ حِينَ تَرَى ٱلْعَذَابَ لَوْ أَنَّ لِى كَرَّةًۭ فَأَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
ayah_en: Or, he may say as he sees the punishment, "Would that I had a second chance, so that I could be among the doers of good."

ayah_ar: بَلَىٰ قَدْ جَآءَتْكَ ءَايَٰتِى فَكَذَّبْتَ بِهَا وَٱسْتَكْبَرْتَ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ
ayah_en: No indeed! My revelations did come to you, but you rejected them: you showed arrogance, and were among those who deny the truth."

ayah_ar: وَيَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ تَرَى ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَبُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وُجُوهُهُم مُّسْوَدَّةٌ ۚ أَلَيْسَ فِى جَهَنَّمَ مَثْوًۭى لِّلْمُتَكَبِّرِينَ
ayah_en: On the Day of Resurrection you will see those who uttered falsehoods about God with their faces blackened. Is there not enough room in Hell for the arrogant?

ayah_ar: وَيُنَجِّى ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ بِمَفَازَتِهِمْ لَا يَمَسُّهُمُ ٱلسُّوٓءُ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
ayah_en: But God will deliver them who feared Him to their place of salvation. No evil shall touch them, nor shall they grieve.

ayah_ar: ٱللَّهُ خَٰلِقُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ وَكِيلٌۭ
ayah_en: God is the Creator of all things, He has charge of everything;

ayah_ar: لَّهُۥ مَقَالِيدُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْخَٰسِرُونَ
ayah_en: the keys of the heavens and the earth belong to Him. Those who deny God's revelations will surely be the losers.

ayah_ar: قُلْ أَفَغَيْرَ ٱللَّهِ تَأْمُرُوٓنِّىٓ أَعْبُدُ أَيُّهَا ٱلْجَٰهِلُونَ
ayah_en: Say, "Ignorant men! Would you bid me worship someone other than God?"

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ أُوحِىَ إِلَيْكَ وَإِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِكَ لَئِنْ أَشْرَكْتَ لَيَحْبَطَنَّ عَمَلُكَ وَلَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْخَٰسِرِينَ
ayah_en: It has already been revealed to you and to those who have gone before you that if you ascribe any partner to God, all your works will come to nothing, and you will surely be among the losers.

ayah_ar: بَلِ ٱللَّهَ فَٱعْبُدْ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّٰكِرِينَ
ayah_en: Therefore, you should worship God alone and be among the thankful.

ayah_ar: وَمَا قَدَرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ قَدْرِهِۦ وَٱلْأَرْضُ جَمِيعًۭا قَبْضَتُهُۥ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ وَٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ مَطْوِيَّٰتٌۢ بِيَمِينِهِۦ ۚ سُبْحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
ayah_en: No just estimate have they made of God, such as is due to Him. But on the Day of Resurrection, the whole earth will lie within His grasp, while heaven will be folded up in His right hand -- Glory be to Him! Exalted is He above all that they associate with Him --

ayah_ar: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَصَعِقَ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۖ ثُمَّ نُفِخَ فِيهِ أُخْرَىٰ فَإِذَا هُمْ قِيَامٌۭ يَنظُرُونَ
ayah_en: the Trumpet shall be blown and whoever is in heaven and whoever is on earth will fall down in a swoon, except those who shall be spared by God. Then the trumpet will be blown again and they shall rise and gaze around them.

ayah_ar: وَأَشْرَقَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ بِنُورِ رَبِّهَا وَوُضِعَ ٱلْكِتَٰبُ وَجِا۟ىٓءَ بِٱلنَّبِيِّۦنَ وَٱلشُّهَدَآءِ وَقُضِىَ بَيْنَهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ
ayah_en: The earth will shine with the light of its Lord, and the Book will be laid open; the prophets and witnesses will be brought in; and judgement will be passed on them with fairness. And none shall be wronged.

ayah_ar: وَوُفِّيَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍۢ مَّا عَمِلَتْ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَفْعَلُونَ
ayah_en: Every soul will be repaid in full for what it has done. He is fully aware of all that they did.

ayah_ar: وَسِيقَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ زُمَرًا ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُوهَا فُتِحَتْ أَبْوَٰبُهَا وَقَالَ لَهُمْ خَزَنَتُهَآ أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ رُسُلٌۭ مِّنكُمْ يَتْلُونَ عَلَيْكُمْ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّكُمْ وَيُنذِرُونَكُمْ لِقَآءَ يَوْمِكُمْ هَٰذَا ۚ قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ وَلَٰكِنْ حَقَّتْ كَلِمَةُ ٱلْعَذَابِ عَلَى ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ
ayah_en: Those who rejected the truth will be led to Hell in throngs. When they reach it, its gates will be opened and its keepers will say to them, "Have messengers not come to you from among yourselves, who conveyed to you the revelations of your Lord and warned you about meeting \[Him\] on this Day?" They will answer, "Yes, they did come." But the decree of punishment has proved true against the deniers of the truth.

ayah_ar: قِيلَ ٱدْخُلُوٓا۟ أَبْوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۖ فَبِئْسَ مَثْوَى ٱلْمُتَكَبِّرِينَ
ayah_en: They will be told, "Enter the gates of Hell, to stay therein forever." What an evil dwelling place for the haughty.

ayah_ar: وَسِيقَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ رَبَّهُمْ إِلَى ٱلْجَنَّةِ زُمَرًا ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُوهَا وَفُتِحَتْ أَبْوَٰبُهَا وَقَالَ لَهُمْ خَزَنَتُهَا سَلَٰمٌ عَلَيْكُمْ طِبْتُمْ فَٱدْخُلُوهَا خَٰلِدِينَ
ayah_en: But those who fear their Lord will be led in groups towards Paradise. When they reach it, its gate will be opened, and its keepers will say to them, "Peace be upon you. You have done well, enter Paradise and dwell in it forever,"

ayah_ar: وَقَالُوا۟ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى صَدَقَنَا وَعْدَهُۥ وَأَوْرَثَنَا ٱلْأَرْضَ نَتَبَوَّأُ مِنَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ حَيْثُ نَشَآءُ ۖ فَنِعْمَ أَجْرُ ٱلْعَٰمِلِينَ
ayah_en: and they will say, "Praise be to God who has fulfilled His promise to us and made us the inheritors of this land, letting us settle in the Garden wherever we want." How excellent is the reward of those who labour!

ayah_ar: وَتَرَى ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ حَآفِّينَ مِنْ حَوْلِ ٱلْعَرْشِ يُسَبِّحُونَ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّهِمْ ۖ وَقُضِىَ بَيْنَهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَقِيلَ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_en: You shall see the angels circling about the throne, glorifying their Lord with praise. And judgement will have been passed in justice on all and it will be said, "Praise be to God, Lord of the Universe!"

ayah_ar: حمٓ
ayah_en: Ha Mim.

ayah_ar: تَنزِيلُ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْعَلِيمِ
ayah_en: This Book is revealed by God, the Almighty, the All Knowing.

ayah_ar: غَافِرِ ٱلذَّنۢبِ وَقَابِلِ ٱلتَّوْبِ شَدِيدِ ٱلْعِقَابِ ذِى ٱلطَّوْلِ ۖ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ إِلَيْهِ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
ayah_en: The Forgiver of sin and the Accepter of repentance, who is severe in punishment and Infinite in His Bounty. There is no God but Him. All shall return to Him.

ayah_ar: مَا يُجَٰدِلُ فِىٓ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فَلَا يَغْرُرْكَ تَقَلُّبُهُمْ فِى ٱلْبِلَٰدِ
ayah_en: Only those who deny the truth dispute God's signs. Do not let their activity in the land deceive you.

ayah_ar: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍۢ وَٱلْأَحْزَابُ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ ۖ وَهَمَّتْ كُلُّ أُمَّةٍۭ بِرَسُولِهِمْ لِيَأْخُذُوهُ ۖ وَجَٰدَلُوا۟ بِٱلْبَٰطِلِ لِيُدْحِضُوا۟ بِهِ ٱلْحَقَّ فَأَخَذْتُهُمْ ۖ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عِقَابِ
ayah_en: The people of Noah and later factions also rejected the truth and every community plotted against the messenger sent to them, aiming to lay hands on him, and they contended \[against his message\] with fallacious arguments, so that they might defeat the truth, therefore I seized them. How terrible was My punishment.

ayah_ar: وَكَذَٰلِكَ حَقَّتْ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَنَّهُمْ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ
ayah_en: Thus has the word of your Lord come true against the deniers; they shall be the inmates of the Fire.

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ يَحْمِلُونَ ٱلْعَرْشَ وَمَنْ حَوْلَهُۥ يُسَبِّحُونَ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّهِمْ وَيُؤْمِنُونَ بِهِۦ وَيَسْتَغْفِرُونَ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ رَبَّنَا وَسِعْتَ كُلَّ شَىْءٍۢ رَّحْمَةًۭ وَعِلْمًۭا فَٱغْفِرْ لِلَّذِينَ تَابُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ سَبِيلَكَ وَقِهِمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
ayah_en: Those who bear the Throne, and those who are around it, glorify their Lord with His praise, and believe in Him. They ask forgiveness for those who believe, saying, "Our Lord, You embrace all things in mercy and knowledge. Forgive those who turn to You and follow Your path. Save them from the punishment of Hell

ayah_ar: رَبَّنَا وَأَدْخِلْهُمْ جَنَّٰتِ عَدْنٍ ٱلَّتِى وَعَدتَّهُمْ وَمَن صَلَحَ مِنْ ءَابَآئِهِمْ وَأَزْوَٰجِهِمْ وَذُرِّيَّٰتِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
ayah_en: and admit them, Lord, to the Eternal Garden You have promised to them, together with their righteous ancestors, spouses, and offspring: You alone are the Almighty; the All Wise.

ayah_ar: وَقِهِمُ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ ۚ وَمَن تَقِ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ فَقَدْ رَحِمْتَهُۥ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
ayah_en: Protect them from all evil deeds: those You protect from \[the punishment for\] evil deeds will receive Your mercy -- that is the supreme success."

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يُنَادَوْنَ لَمَقْتُ ٱللَّهِ أَكْبَرُ مِن مَّقْتِكُمْ أَنفُسَكُمْ إِذْ تُدْعَوْنَ إِلَى ٱلْإِيمَٰنِ فَتَكْفُرُونَ
ayah_en: Those who deny the truth will be told, "God's abhorrence of you is greater than your hatred of yourselves. You were called to the faith but you denied it."

ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَآ أَمَتَّنَا ٱثْنَتَيْنِ وَأَحْيَيْتَنَا ٱثْنَتَيْنِ فَٱعْتَرَفْنَا بِذُنُوبِنَا فَهَلْ إِلَىٰ خُرُوجٍۢ مِّن سَبِيلٍۢ
ayah_en: They will say, "Our Lord! Twice You have made us die, and twice You have given us life! Now we have confessed our sins: is there any way out \[of this\]?"

ayah_ar: ذَٰلِكُم بِأَنَّهُۥٓ إِذَا دُعِىَ ٱللَّهُ وَحْدَهُۥ كَفَرْتُمْ ۖ وَإِن يُشْرَكْ بِهِۦ تُؤْمِنُوا۟ ۚ فَٱلْحُكْمُ لِلَّهِ ٱلْعَلِىِّ ٱلْكَبِيرِ
ayah_en: \[They will be told\], "This is because when God alone was invoked you denied the truth, yet when others were associated with Him you believed in them." Judgement rests with God, the Most High, the Most Great.

ayah_ar: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُرِيكُمْ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ وَيُنَزِّلُ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ رِزْقًۭا ۚ وَمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ إِلَّا مَن يُنِيبُ
ayah_en: It is He who shows you His signs, and sends down provision for you from heaven; but none pays heed except the repentant.

ayah_ar: فَٱدْعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ وَلَوْ كَرِهَ ٱلْكَٰفِرُونَ
ayah_en: Therefore call upon God, making faith pure for Him, averse as the deniers of the truth may be to it:

ayah_ar: رَفِيعُ ٱلدَّرَجَٰتِ ذُو ٱلْعَرْشِ يُلْقِى ٱلرُّوحَ مِنْ أَمْرِهِۦ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهِۦ لِيُنذِرَ يَوْمَ ٱلتَّلَاقِ
ayah_en: Exalted and throned on high, He lets the Spirit descend at His behest upon whichever of His servants He will, so that he may warn of the Day of Meeting,

ayah_ar: يَوْمَ هُم بَٰرِزُونَ ۖ لَا يَخْفَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مِنْهُمْ شَىْءٌۭ ۚ لِّمَنِ ٱلْمُلْكُ ٱلْيَوْمَ ۖ لِلَّهِ ٱلْوَٰحِدِ ٱلْقَهَّارِ
ayah_en: the Day when they shall rise up \[from their graves\] and nothing about them will be hidden from God. "To whom shall the kingdom belong that Day?" It shall belong to God, the One, the All Powerful.

ayah_ar: ٱلْيَوْمَ تُجْزَىٰ كُلُّ نَفْسٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ ۚ لَا ظُلْمَ ٱلْيَوْمَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَرِيعُ ٱلْحِسَابِ
ayah_en: That Day every soul shall be requited for what it has earned. On that Day none shall be wronged. And God is swift in reckoning.

ayah_ar: وَأَنذِرْهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْءَازِفَةِ إِذِ ٱلْقُلُوبُ لَدَى ٱلْحَنَاجِرِ كَٰظِمِينَ ۚ مَا لِلظَّٰلِمِينَ مِنْ حَمِيمٍۢ وَلَا شَفِيعٍۢ يُطَاعُ
ayah_en: \[O Prophet\] forewarn them of the approaching Day, when hearts will leap up to the throats and choke them; when the wrongdoers will have no friend, nor any intercessor who will be listened to,

ayah_ar: يَعْلَمُ خَآئِنَةَ ٱلْأَعْيُنِ وَمَا تُخْفِى ٱلصُّدُورُ
ayah_en: \[for\] He is aware of the \[most\] stealthy glance, and of all that the hearts conceal.

ayah_ar: وَٱللَّهُ يَقْضِى بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ يَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ لَا يَقْضُونَ بِشَىْءٍ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْبَصِيرُ
ayah_en: God will judge with \[justice and\] truth: but those whom they invoke besides Him, have no power to judge at all. Surely, God is all hearing, all seeing.

ayah_ar: ۞ أَوَلَمْ يَسِيرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَيَنظُرُوا۟ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَانُوا۟ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ كَانُوا۟ هُمْ أَشَدَّ مِنْهُمْ قُوَّةًۭ وَءَاثَارًۭا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِذُنُوبِهِمْ وَمَا كَانَ لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَاقٍۢ
ayah_en: Have they not travelled through the land and seen what was the end of those who have gone before them? They were stronger than them and made a more impressive mark upon the land, yet God destroyed them for their sins, they had no one to defend them against Him,

ayah_ar: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ كَانَت تَّأْتِيهِمْ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلْبَيِّنَٰتِ فَكَفَرُوا۟ فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ قَوِىٌّۭ شَدِيدُ ٱلْعِقَابِ
ayah_en: that was because their messengers came to them with clear signs but they rejected them. So God seized them: He is powerful, severe in punishment.

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَسُلْطَٰنٍۢ مُّبِينٍ
ayah_en: We sent Moses with Our signs and clear authority

ayah_ar: إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَهَٰمَٰنَ وَقَٰرُونَ فَقَالُوا۟ سَٰحِرٌۭ كَذَّابٌۭ
ayah_en: to Pharaoh, Haman and Korah. But they said, "A magician, a liar."

ayah_ar: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ مِنْ عِندِنَا قَالُوا۟ ٱقْتُلُوٓا۟ أَبْنَآءَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مَعَهُۥ وَٱسْتَحْيُوا۟ نِسَآءَهُمْ ۚ وَمَا كَيْدُ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَٰلٍۢ
ayah_en: When he came to them with the truth from Us, they said, "Slay the sons of those who believe with him and spare only their daughters" -- the schemes of those who denied the truth were futile.

ayah_ar: وَقَالَ فِرْعَوْنُ ذَرُونِىٓ أَقْتُلْ مُوسَىٰ وَلْيَدْعُ رَبَّهُۥٓ ۖ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ أَن يُبَدِّلَ دِينَكُمْ أَوْ أَن يُظْهِرَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ٱلْفَسَادَ
ayah_en: Pharaoh said, "Let me kill Moses, let him call upon his Lord, I fear that he may cause you to change your religion, or that he may cause disorder in the land."

ayah_ar: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنِّى عُذْتُ بِرَبِّى وَرَبِّكُم مِّن كُلِّ مُتَكَبِّرٍۢ لَّا يُؤْمِنُ بِيَوْمِ ٱلْحِسَابِ
ayah_en: Moses replied, "I seek refuge with my Lord and your Lord from every arrogant person who does not believe in the Day of Reckoning."

ayah_ar: وَقَالَ رَجُلٌۭ مُّؤْمِنٌۭ مِّنْ ءَالِ فِرْعَوْنَ يَكْتُمُ إِيمَٰنَهُۥٓ أَتَقْتُلُونَ رَجُلًا أَن يَقُولَ رَبِّىَ ٱللَّهُ وَقَدْ جَآءَكُم بِٱلْبَيِّنَٰتِ مِن رَّبِّكُمْ ۖ وَإِن يَكُ كَٰذِبًۭا فَعَلَيْهِ كَذِبُهُۥ ۖ وَإِن يَكُ صَادِقًۭا يُصِبْكُم بَعْضُ ٱلَّذِى يَعِدُكُمْ ۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهْدِى مَنْ هُوَ مُسْرِفٌۭ كَذَّابٌۭ
ayah_en: A believer, a man from among the people of Pharaoh, who had concealed his faith, said, "Would you slay a man merely because he says, "My Lord is God." He has brought you clear signs from your Lord, and if he is lying, the sin of his will be on his own head; but if he is truthful, a part of that of which he warns you will surely befall you. Certainly, God does not guide one who is a transgressor and a liar.

ayah_ar: يَٰقَوْمِ لَكُمُ ٱلْمُلْكُ ٱلْيَوْمَ ظَٰهِرِينَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَمَن يَنصُرُنَا مِنۢ بَأْسِ ٱللَّهِ إِن جَآءَنَا ۚ قَالَ فِرْعَوْنُ مَآ أُرِيكُمْ إِلَّا مَآ أَرَىٰ وَمَآ أَهْدِيكُمْ إِلَّا سَبِيلَ ٱلرَّشَادِ
ayah_en: My people! Yours is the kingdom today, you have dominion in the land; but who will help us against the scourge of God if it befalls us?" But Pharaoh said, "I point out to you only that which I consider right; and I guide you to the right path."

ayah_ar: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِىٓ ءَامَنَ يَٰقَوْمِ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُم مِّثْلَ يَوْمِ ٱلْأَحْزَابِ
ayah_en: The believer said, "My people! I fear for you a fate like that of the people of old:

ayah_ar: مِثْلَ دَأْبِ قَوْمِ نُوحٍۢ وَعَادٍۢ وَثَمُودَ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ ۚ وَمَا ٱللَّهُ يُرِيدُ ظُلْمًۭا لِّلْعِبَادِ
ayah_en: like the fate of the people of Noah, 'Ad, Thamud, and those who came after them -- God never wills injustice on His creatures.

ayah_ar: وَيَٰقَوْمِ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلتَّنَادِ
ayah_en: My people, I fear for you the Day you will cry out to one another,

ayah_ar: يَوْمَ تُوَلُّونَ مُدْبِرِينَ مَا لَكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مِنْ عَاصِمٍۢ ۗ وَمَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنْ هَادٍۢ
ayah_en: the Day when you will \[wish to\] turn your backs and flee, having none to defend you against God: for he whom God lets go astray can never find any guide.

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ جَآءَكُمْ يُوسُفُ مِن قَبْلُ بِٱلْبَيِّنَٰتِ فَمَا زِلْتُمْ فِى شَكٍّۢ مِّمَّا جَآءَكُم بِهِۦ ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا هَلَكَ قُلْتُمْ لَن يَبْعَثَ ٱللَّهُ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِۦ رَسُولًۭا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ ٱللَّهُ مَنْ هُوَ مُسْرِفٌۭ مُّرْتَابٌ
ayah_en: Joseph came to you before with clear signs, but you never ceased to doubt the message he brought you. When he died, you said, 'God will not send another messenger.'"" In this way God leaves the transgressors and doubters to go astray --

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ يُجَٰدِلُونَ فِىٓ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ بِغَيْرِ سُلْطَٰنٍ أَتَىٰهُمْ ۖ كَبُرَ مَقْتًا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَعِندَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يَطْبَعُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ قَلْبِ مُتَكَبِّرٍۢ جَبَّارٍۢ
