ayah_en: and when the messengers are brought together at the appointed time --

ayah_ar: لِأَىِّ يَوْمٍ أُجِّلَتْ
ayah_en: for what Day has this been appointed?

ayah_ar: لِيَوْمِ ٱلْفَصْلِ
ayah_en: For the Day of Decision.

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ
ayah_en: What will explain to you what the Day of Judgement is?

ayah_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
ayah_en: Woe on that Day to those who reject the truth.

ayah_ar: أَلَمْ نُهْلِكِ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
ayah_en: Did We not destroy the earlier peoples?

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ نُتْبِعُهُمُ ٱلْءَاخِرِينَ
ayah_en: We will now cause the later ones to follow them:

ayah_ar: كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
ayah_en: thus do We deal with the culprits.

ayah_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
ayah_en: Woe on that Day to those who reject the truth!

ayah_ar: أَلَمْ نَخْلُقكُّم مِّن مَّآءٍۢ مَّهِينٍۢ
ayah_en: Did We not create you from a humble fluid,

ayah_ar: فَجَعَلْنَٰهُ فِى قَرَارٍۢ مَّكِينٍ
ayah_en: then placed it in a secure repository \[the womb\],

ayah_ar: إِلَىٰ قَدَرٍۢ مَّعْلُومٍۢ
ayah_en: for an appointed term?

ayah_ar: فَقَدَرْنَا فَنِعْمَ ٱلْقَٰدِرُونَ
ayah_en: Thus We have determined the stages of development and Our power to determine is excellent indeed.

ayah_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
ayah_en: Woe on that Day to those who reject the truth!

ayah_ar: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ ٱلْأَرْضَ كِفَاتًا
ayah_en: Have We not made the earth a receptacle,

ayah_ar: أَحْيَآءًۭ وَأَمْوَٰتًۭا
ayah_en: for the living and the dead?

ayah_ar: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ شَٰمِخَٰتٍۢ وَأَسْقَيْنَٰكُم مَّآءًۭ فُرَاتًۭا
ayah_en: Have We not placed high mountains upon it and given you fresh water to drink?

ayah_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
ayah_en: Woe on that Day to those who reject the truth!

ayah_ar: ٱنطَلِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
ayah_en: Proceed to that which you denied.

ayah_ar: ٱنطَلِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ ظِلٍّۢ ذِى ثَلَٰثِ شُعَبٍۢ
ayah_en: Proceed to a shadow rising in three columns:

ayah_ar: لَّا ظَلِيلٍۢ وَلَا يُغْنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهَبِ
ayah_en: affording neither shade, nor protection from the flames,

ayah_ar: إِنَّهَا تَرْمِى بِشَرَرٍۢ كَٱلْقَصْرِ
ayah_en: and throwing up sparks as huge as towers

ayah_ar: كَأَنَّهُۥ جِمَٰلَتٌۭ صُفْرٌۭ
ayah_en: and as bright as a herd of yellow camels.

ayah_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
ayah_en: Woe on that Day to those who reject the truth!

ayah_ar: هَٰذَا يَوْمُ لَا يَنطِقُونَ
ayah_en: On that Day they will be speechless,

ayah_ar: وَلَا يُؤْذَنُ لَهُمْ فَيَعْتَذِرُونَ
ayah_en: nor shall they be permitted to offer excuses.

ayah_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
ayah_en: Woe on that Day to those who reject the truth!

ayah_ar: هَٰذَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ ۖ جَمَعْنَٰكُمْ وَٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
ayah_en: This is the Day of Judgement. We have assembled you all together with past generations.

ayah_ar: فَإِن كَانَ لَكُمْ كَيْدٌۭ فَكِيدُونِ
ayah_en: If now you have any strategy, use it against Me.

ayah_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
ayah_en: Woe on that Day to those who reject the truth!

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى ظِلَٰلٍۢ وَعُيُونٍۢ
ayah_en: The righteous shall dwell amidst cool shades and fountains,

ayah_ar: وَفَوَٰكِهَ مِمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
ayah_en: and shall have fruits such as they desire;

ayah_ar: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
ayah_en: \[They will be told\], "Eat and drink with relish in return for what you did \[in life\]:

ayah_ar: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
ayah_en: this is how We reward those who do good."

ayah_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
ayah_en: \[But\] woe on that Day to those who reject the truth!

ayah_ar: كُلُوا۟ وَتَمَتَّعُوا۟ قَلِيلًا إِنَّكُم مُّجْرِمُونَ
ayah_en: Eat \[your fill\] and enjoy your life for a little while, O you who are lost in sin.

ayah_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
ayah_en: Woe on that Day to those who reject the truth!

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرْكَعُوا۟ لَا يَرْكَعُونَ
ayah_en: When they are bidden to bow down, they do not bow down.

ayah_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
ayah_en: Woe on that Day to those who reject the truth!

ayah_ar: فَبِأَىِّ حَدِيثٍۭ بَعْدَهُۥ يُؤْمِنُونَ
ayah_en: In which word then, after this, will they believe?

ayah_ar: عَمَّ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
ayah_en: What are they asking each other about?

ayah_ar: عَنِ ٱلنَّبَإِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
ayah_en: About the awesome tidings \[of resurrection\]

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِى هُمْ فِيهِ مُخْتَلِفُونَ
ayah_en: concerning which they are in disagreement!

ayah_ar: كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
ayah_en: But they will soon come to know.

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
ayah_en: Surely, they will soon find out the truth!

ayah_ar: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ ٱلْأَرْضَ مِهَٰدًۭا
ayah_en: Have We not spread the earth like a bed,

ayah_ar: وَٱلْجِبَالَ أَوْتَادًۭا
ayah_en: and raised the mountains like supporting poles?

ayah_ar: وَخَلَقْنَٰكُمْ أَزْوَٰجًۭا
ayah_en: We created you in pairs,

ayah_ar: وَجَعَلْنَا نَوْمَكُمْ سُبَاتًۭا
ayah_en: and gave you repose in sleep,

ayah_ar: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱلَّيْلَ لِبَاسًۭا
ayah_en: and the night as a cover,

ayah_ar: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱلنَّهَارَ مَعَاشًۭا
ayah_en: and made the day for earning a livelihood.

ayah_ar: وَبَنَيْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعًۭا شِدَادًۭا
ayah_en: We have built above you seven mighty heavens,

ayah_ar: وَجَعَلْنَا سِرَاجًۭا وَهَّاجًۭا
ayah_en: and We have set therein a glowing lamp.

ayah_ar: وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلْمُعْصِرَٰتِ مَآءًۭ ثَجَّاجًۭا
ayah_en: >From the rain clouds We send waters pouring down in abundance,

ayah_ar: لِّنُخْرِجَ بِهِۦ حَبًّۭا وَنَبَاتًۭا
ayah_en: so that We may bring forth thereby grain and a variety of plants,

ayah_ar: وَجَنَّٰتٍ أَلْفَافًا
ayah_en: and gardens dense with foliage.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ يَوْمَ ٱلْفَصْلِ كَانَ مِيقَٰتًۭا
ayah_en: Surely, the Day of Judgement has an appointed time.

ayah_ar: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًۭا
ayah_en: On that Day when the trumpet shall be sounded, you shall come in droves,

ayah_ar: وَفُتِحَتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتْ أَبْوَٰبًۭا
ayah_en: and the heaven shall be opened, and become gates,

ayah_ar: وَسُيِّرَتِ ٱلْجِبَالُ فَكَانَتْ سَرَابًا
ayah_en: and the mountains shall be made to vanish, as if they had been a mirage.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ كَانَتْ مِرْصَادًۭا
ayah_en: Surely, Hell lies in wait,

ayah_ar: لِّلطَّٰغِينَ مَـَٔابًۭا
ayah_en: a home for the transgressors,

ayah_ar: لَّٰبِثِينَ فِيهَآ أَحْقَابًۭا
ayah_en: where they shall remain for ages,

ayah_ar: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْدًۭا وَلَا شَرَابًا
ayah_en: and where they will taste neither coolness nor any drink

ayah_ar: إِلَّا حَمِيمًۭا وَغَسَّاقًۭا
ayah_en: save boiling water and a stinking fluid --

ayah_ar: جَزَآءًۭ وِفَاقًا
ayah_en: a fitting requital,

ayah_ar: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يَرْجُونَ حِسَابًۭا
ayah_en: for they never expected to be called to account,

ayah_ar: وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا كِذَّابًۭا
ayah_en: and they rejected outright Our signs;

ayah_ar: وَكُلَّ شَىْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَٰهُ كِتَٰبًۭا
ayah_en: but We have recorded everything in a Book.

ayah_ar: فَذُوقُوا۟ فَلَن نَّزِيدَكُمْ إِلَّا عَذَابًا
ayah_en: \[So We shall say\], "Taste, then, \[the fruit of your evil doings,\] for now We shall bestow on you nothing but more and more suffering!"

ayah_ar: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ مَفَازًا
ayah_en: As for those who are mindful of God, they shall surely triumph:

ayah_ar: حَدَآئِقَ وَأَعْنَٰبًۭا
ayah_en: theirs shall be gardens and vineyards,

ayah_ar: وَكَوَاعِبَ أَتْرَابًۭا
ayah_en: and young maidens of equal age,

ayah_ar: وَكَأْسًۭا دِهَاقًۭا
ayah_en: and overflowing cups.

ayah_ar: لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًۭا وَلَا كِذَّٰبًۭا
ayah_en: There they shall not hear any idle talk, or any untruth:

ayah_ar: جَزَآءًۭ مِّن رَّبِّكَ عَطَآءً حِسَابًۭا
ayah_en: all this will be a recompense, a gift, that will suffice them, from your Lord,

ayah_ar: رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ۖ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْهُ خِطَابًۭا
ayah_en: the Sustainer of the heavens and the earth and all that lies between them, the most Gracious \[and\] none shall have it in their power to raise their voices to Him.

ayah_ar: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ ٱلرُّوحُ وَٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ صَفًّۭا ۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًۭا
ayah_en: On the Day when the Spirit and the angels stand in ranks, no one will speak, except for those to whom the Lord of Mercy gives permission, and who will say only what is right.

ayah_ar: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا
ayah_en: That Day is sure to come, so whoever wishes to, let him take the path that leads towards his Lord.

ayah_ar: إِنَّآ أَنذَرْنَٰكُمْ عَذَابًۭا قَرِيبًۭا يَوْمَ يَنظُرُ ٱلْمَرْءُ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ ٱلْكَافِرُ يَٰلَيْتَنِى كُنتُ تُرَٰبًۢا
ayah_en: We have warned you of a chastisement which is near at hand, on the Day when man shall \[clearly\] see what his hands have sent ahead, and when he who has denied the truth shall say, "Oh, would that I were dust!"

ayah_ar: وَٱلنَّٰزِعَٰتِ غَرْقًۭا
ayah_en: By \[the winds\] that pluck out vehemently

ayah_ar: وَٱلنَّٰشِطَٰتِ نَشْطًۭا
ayah_en: and those that blow gently,

ayah_ar: وَٱلسَّٰبِحَٰتِ سَبْحًۭا
ayah_en: and by \[the clouds\] that swim serenely and

ayah_ar: فَٱلسَّٰبِقَٰتِ سَبْقًۭا
ayah_en: by those that outstrip them suddenly,

ayah_ar: فَٱلْمُدَبِّرَٰتِ أَمْرًۭا
ayah_en: and by those who regulate events.

ayah_ar: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ ٱلرَّاجِفَةُ
ayah_en: On the Day when a violent convulsion will convulse \[the world\],

ayah_ar: تَتْبَعُهَا ٱلرَّادِفَةُ
ayah_en: to be followed by further \[convulsions\],

ayah_ar: قُلُوبٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ وَاجِفَةٌ
ayah_en: hearts will be throbbing,

ayah_ar: أَبْصَٰرُهَا خَٰشِعَةٌۭ
ayah_en: while eyes will be downcast.

ayah_ar: يَقُولُونَ أَءِنَّا لَمَرْدُودُونَ فِى ٱلْحَافِرَةِ
ayah_en: They say, "What? shall we be brought back to life,

ayah_ar: أَءِذَا كُنَّا عِظَٰمًۭا نَّخِرَةًۭ
ayah_en: even after we have turned into decayed bones?"

ayah_ar: قَالُوا۟ تِلْكَ إِذًۭا كَرَّةٌ خَاسِرَةٌۭ
ayah_en: and they say, "That indeed would be a losing return."

ayah_ar: فَإِنَّمَا هِىَ زَجْرَةٌۭ وَٰحِدَةٌۭ
ayah_en: But all it will take is a single blast,

ayah_ar: فَإِذَا هُم بِٱلسَّاهِرَةِ
ayah_en: and behold! They will all come out in the open.

ayah_ar: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰٓ
ayah_en: Have you heard the story of Moses?

ayah_ar: إِذْ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلْوَادِ ٱلْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
ayah_en: His Lord called out to him by the sacred valley of Tuwa:

ayah_ar: ٱذْهَبْ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُۥ طَغَىٰ
ayah_en: \[saying\], "Go to Pharaoh, he has exceeded all bounds,

ayah_ar: فَقُلْ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰٓ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ
ayah_en: and say, 'Will you reform yourself?

ayah_ar: وَأَهْدِيَكَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَتَخْشَىٰ
ayah_en: Do you want me to guide you to your Lord, so that you should fear Him?'"

ayah_ar: فَأَرَىٰهُ ٱلْءَايَةَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ
ayah_en: Moses showed him the great sign,

ayah_ar: فَكَذَّبَ وَعَصَىٰ
ayah_en: but he denied it and refused \[the faith\].

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ يَسْعَىٰ
ayah_en: Then he quickly turned his back.

ayah_ar: فَحَشَرَ فَنَادَىٰ
ayah_en: And he summoned all his people,

ayah_ar: فَقَالَ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمُ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ
ayah_en: and proclaimed, "I am your supreme Lord,"

ayah_ar: فَأَخَذَهُ ٱللَّهُ نَكَالَ ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ وَٱلْأُولَىٰٓ
ayah_en: but God seized him and meted out to him the chastisement of both the next world and the present:

ayah_ar: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبْرَةًۭ لِّمَن يَخْشَىٰٓ
ayah_en: surely there is in this a lesson for the God-fearing.

ayah_ar: ءَأَنتُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَمِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ ۚ بَنَىٰهَا
ayah_en: \[O Men!\] Are you more difficult to create than the heaven which He has built,

ayah_ar: رَفَعَ سَمْكَهَا فَسَوَّىٰهَا
ayah_en: by raising its vault high and fashioning it flawlessly,

ayah_ar: وَأَغْطَشَ لَيْلَهَا وَأَخْرَجَ ضُحَىٰهَا
ayah_en: and making its night dark and bringing forth its morning light,

ayah_ar: وَٱلْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ دَحَىٰهَآ
ayah_en: and the earth which He spread out,

ayah_ar: أَخْرَجَ مِنْهَا مَآءَهَا وَمَرْعَىٰهَا
ayah_en: after that bringing forth from it its water and its pasture land,

ayah_ar: وَٱلْجِبَالَ أَرْسَىٰهَا
ayah_en: and making the mountains firm:

ayah_ar: مَتَٰعًۭا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَٰمِكُمْ
ayah_en: \[all this\] as a means of sustenance for you and your animals?

ayah_ar: فَإِذَا جَآءَتِ ٱلطَّآمَّةُ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ
ayah_en: When the great over-whelming event arrives,

ayah_ar: يَوْمَ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مَا سَعَىٰ
ayah_en: on the Day that man remembers what he strove for

ayah_ar: وَبُرِّزَتِ ٱلْجَحِيمُ لِمَن يَرَىٰ
ayah_en: and Hell is there for all to see,

ayah_ar: فَأَمَّا مَن طَغَىٰ
ayah_en: anyone who has acted arrogantly

ayah_ar: وَءَاثَرَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا
ayah_en: and prefers the life of this world,

ayah_ar: فَإِنَّ ٱلْجَحِيمَ هِىَ ٱلْمَأْوَىٰ
ayah_en: will find himself in Hell;

ayah_ar: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ وَنَهَى ٱلنَّفْسَ عَنِ ٱلْهَوَىٰ
ayah_en: but one who fears to stand before his Lord and restrained himself from base desires,

ayah_ar: فَإِنَّ ٱلْجَنَّةَ هِىَ ٱلْمَأْوَىٰ
ayah_en: shall dwell in Paradise.

ayah_ar: يَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلسَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرْسَىٰهَا
ayah_en: They will ask you \[Prophet\] about the Hour, saying, "When it will come to pass?",

ayah_ar: فِيمَ أَنتَ مِن ذِكْرَىٰهَآ
ayah_en: what have you to do with the mentioning of it?

ayah_ar: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنتَهَىٰهَآ
ayah_en: Your Lord alone knows when it will come;

ayah_ar: إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُنذِرُ مَن يَخْشَىٰهَا
ayah_en: you are but a warner for those who fear it.

ayah_ar: كَأَنَّهُمْ يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَهَا لَمْ يَلْبَثُوٓا۟ إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوْ ضُحَىٰهَا
ayah_en: On the Day when they see it, they will feel as if they had tarried in this world for only one evening or one morning.

ayah_ar: عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ
ayah_en: He frowned and turned away

ayah_ar: أَن جَآءَهُ ٱلْأَعْمَىٰ
ayah_en: when the blind man approached him,

ayah_ar: وَمَا يُدْرِيكَ لَعَلَّهُۥ يَزَّكَّىٰٓ
ayah_en: for how can you know that he might seek to purify himself,

ayah_ar: أَوْ يَذَّكَّرُ فَتَنفَعَهُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰٓ
ayah_en: or take heed and derive benefit from \[Our\] warning?

ayah_ar: أَمَّا مَنِ ٱسْتَغْنَىٰ
ayah_en: As for him who was indifferent,

ayah_ar: فَأَنتَ لَهُۥ تَصَدَّىٰ
ayah_en: you eagerly attended to him --

ayah_ar: وَمَا عَلَيْكَ أَلَّا يَزَّكَّىٰ
ayah_en: though you are not to be blamed if he would not purify himself --

ayah_ar: وَأَمَّا مَن جَآءَكَ يَسْعَىٰ
ayah_en: but as for one who comes to you, eagerly

ayah_ar: وَهُوَ يَخْشَىٰ
ayah_en: and in awe of God

ayah_ar: فَأَنتَ عَنْهُ تَلَهَّىٰ
ayah_en: you pay him no heed.

ayah_ar: كَلَّآ إِنَّهَا تَذْكِرَةٌۭ
ayah_en: Indeed, this \[Quran\] is an admonition.

ayah_ar: فَمَن شَآءَ ذَكَرَهُۥ
ayah_en: Let him who will, pay heed to it.

ayah_ar: فِى صُحُفٍۢ مُّكَرَّمَةٍۢ
ayah_en: It is set down on honoured pages,

ayah_ar: مَّرْفُوعَةٍۢ مُّطَهَّرَةٍۭ
ayah_en: exalted and purified,

ayah_ar: بِأَيْدِى سَفَرَةٍۢ
ayah_en: by the hands of

ayah_ar: كِرَامٍۭ بَرَرَةٍۢ
ayah_en: noble and virtuous scribes.

ayah_ar: قُتِلَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مَآ أَكْفَرَهُۥ
ayah_en: Woe to man! How ungrateful he is!

ayah_ar: مِنْ أَىِّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقَهُۥ
ayah_en: Of what \[stuff\] has He created him?

ayah_ar: مِن نُّطْفَةٍ خَلَقَهُۥ فَقَدَّرَهُۥ
ayah_en: Out of a drop of sperm! He creates and proportions him,

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ ٱلسَّبِيلَ يَسَّرَهُۥ
ayah_en: He makes his path easy for him.

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ أَمَاتَهُۥ فَأَقْبَرَهُۥ
ayah_en: Then He causes him to die and be buried.

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ إِذَا شَآءَ أَنشَرَهُۥ
ayah_en: Then when He pleases, He will bring him back to life.

ayah_ar: كَلَّا لَمَّا يَقْضِ مَآ أَمَرَهُۥ
ayah_en: Yet man declines to do His bidding.

ayah_ar: فَلْيَنظُرِ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِۦٓ
ayah_en: Let man reflect on the food he eats.

ayah_ar: أَنَّا صَبَبْنَا ٱلْمَآءَ صَبًّۭا
ayah_en: We let the rain pour down in torrents

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ شَقَقْنَا ٱلْأَرْضَ شَقًّۭا
ayah_en: and then We cleaved the earth asunder.

ayah_ar: فَأَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا حَبًّۭا
ayah_en: We make the grain grow out of it,

ayah_ar: وَعِنَبًۭا وَقَضْبًۭا
ayah_en: and grape vines and vegetables,

ayah_ar: وَزَيْتُونًۭا وَنَخْلًۭا
ayah_en: and olive trees and date palms

ayah_ar: وَحَدَآئِقَ غُلْبًۭا
ayah_en: and burgeoning enclosed gardens

ayah_ar: وَفَٰكِهَةًۭ وَأَبًّۭا
ayah_en: and fruits and fodder

ayah_ar: مَّتَٰعًۭا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَٰمِكُمْ
ayah_en: as provision for you and for your cattle to enjoy.

ayah_ar: فَإِذَا جَآءَتِ ٱلصَّآخَّةُ
ayah_en: But when the deafening blast is sounded,

ayah_ar: يَوْمَ يَفِرُّ ٱلْمَرْءُ مِنْ أَخِيهِ
ayah_en: on that Day a man shall flee from his own brother,

ayah_ar: وَأُمِّهِۦ وَأَبِيهِ
ayah_en: his mother, his father,

ayah_ar: وَصَٰحِبَتِهِۦ وَبَنِيهِ
ayah_en: his wife and his sons:

ayah_ar: لِكُلِّ ٱمْرِئٍۢ مِّنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ شَأْنٌۭ يُغْنِيهِ
ayah_en: on that Day every man among them will have enough concern of his own --

ayah_ar: وُجُوهٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ مُّسْفِرَةٌۭ
ayah_en: on that Day some faces will be beaming,

ayah_ar: ضَاحِكَةٌۭ مُّسْتَبْشِرَةٌۭ
ayah_en: laughing, and rejoicing,

ayah_ar: وَوُجُوهٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَلَيْهَا غَبَرَةٌۭ
ayah_en: but some faces will be covered with dust

ayah_ar: تَرْهَقُهَا قَتَرَةٌ
ayah_en: and overcast with gloom:

ayah_ar: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْكَفَرَةُ ٱلْفَجَرَةُ
ayah_en: those will be ones who denied the truth and were immersed in iniquity.

ayah_ar: إِذَا ٱلشَّمْسُ كُوِّرَتْ
ayah_en: When the sun is folded up,

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ ٱنكَدَرَتْ
ayah_en: and when the stars lose their light,

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْجِبَالُ سُيِّرَتْ
ayah_en: and when the mountains are moved,

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْعِشَارُ عُطِّلَتْ
ayah_en: when ten-month pregnant camels are left untended,

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتْ
ayah_en: and when all beasts are gathered together,

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْبِحَارُ سُجِّرَتْ
ayah_en: and when the seas are set on fire,

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّفُوسُ زُوِّجَتْ
ayah_en: when the souls are divided into different classes,

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْمَوْءُۥدَةُ سُئِلَتْ
ayah_en: and when the female infant buried alive is asked

ayah_ar: بِأَىِّ ذَنۢبٍۢ قُتِلَتْ
ayah_en: for what sin she was killed,

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلصُّحُفُ نُشِرَتْ
ayah_en: when the records of men's deeds are laid open,

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ كُشِطَتْ
ayah_en: when the sky is unveiled,

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْجَحِيمُ سُعِّرَتْ
ayah_en: and when Hell is set ablaze,

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْجَنَّةُ أُزْلِفَتْ
ayah_en: when Paradise is brought close:

ayah_ar: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌۭ مَّآ أَحْضَرَتْ
ayah_en: \[then\] each soul shall know what it has put forward.

ayah_ar: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِٱلْخُنَّسِ
ayah_en: I swear by the receding stars,

ayah_ar: ٱلْجَوَارِ ٱلْكُنَّسِ
ayah_en: the planets that run their course and set,

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا عَسْعَسَ
ayah_en: and the night that falls,

ayah_ar: وَٱلصُّبْحِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ
ayah_en: and the first breath of morning.

ayah_ar: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍۢ كَرِيمٍۢ
ayah_en: Truly, this is the word brought by a noble messenger,

ayah_ar: ذِى قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِى ٱلْعَرْشِ مَكِينٍۢ
ayah_en: endowed with power and held in honour by the Lord of the Throne --

ayah_ar: مُّطَاعٍۢ ثَمَّ أَمِينٍۢ
ayah_en: who is obeyed there and is worthy of trust.

ayah_ar: وَمَا صَاحِبُكُم بِمَجْنُونٍۢ
ayah_en: Your companion is not one possessed:

ayah_ar: وَلَقَدْ رَءَاهُ بِٱلْأُفُقِ ٱلْمُبِينِ
ayah_en: he truly beheld him \[the angel\] on the clear horizon.

ayah_ar: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى ٱلْغَيْبِ بِضَنِينٍۢ
ayah_en: He is not avid of the Unseen.

ayah_ar: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَيْطَٰنٍۢ رَّجِيمٍۢ
ayah_en: Nor is this the word of an outcast devil.

ayah_ar: فَأَيْنَ تَذْهَبُونَ
ayah_en: So where are you going?

ayah_ar: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌۭ لِّلْعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_en: This is merely a reminder to all mankind;

ayah_ar: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَسْتَقِيمَ
ayah_en: to every one of you who wishes to tread the straight path.

ayah_ar: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_en: But you cannot will it unless God, the Lord of the Universe, so wills it \[to show you that way\].

ayah_ar: إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنفَطَرَتْ
ayah_en: When the sky is cleft asunder;

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْكَوَاكِبُ ٱنتَثَرَتْ
ayah_en: and when the stars are scattered;

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْبِحَارُ فُجِّرَتْ
ayah_en: when the seas overflow;

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْقُبُورُ بُعْثِرَتْ
ayah_en: and when the graves are laid open:

ayah_ar: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌۭ مَّا قَدَّمَتْ وَأَخَّرَتْ
ayah_en: then everyone will know what he has sent ahead, and what he has left behind.

ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلْكَرِيمِ
ayah_en: O man! What is it that lures you away from your bountiful Sustainer,

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكَ فَسَوَّىٰكَ فَعَدَلَكَ
ayah_en: who created you, fashioned you and proportioned you,

ayah_ar: فِىٓ أَىِّ صُورَةٍۢ مَّا شَآءَ رَكَّبَكَ
ayah_en: in whatever form He pleased?

ayah_ar: كَلَّا بَلْ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِٱلدِّينِ
ayah_en: Yet you deny the Last Judgement.

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكُمْ لَحَٰفِظِينَ
ayah_en: Surely, there are guardians watching over you,

ayah_ar: كِرَامًۭا كَٰتِبِينَ
ayah_en: noble recorders,

ayah_ar: يَعْلَمُونَ مَا تَفْعَلُونَ
ayah_en: who know all that you do:

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ لَفِى نَعِيمٍۢ
ayah_en: the virtuous will dwell in bliss,

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ ٱلْفُجَّارَ لَفِى جَحِيمٍۢ
ayah_en: whereas the wicked will be in Hell;

ayah_ar: يَصْلَوْنَهَا يَوْمَ ٱلدِّينِ
ayah_en: which they shall enter on the Day of Judgement,

ayah_ar: وَمَا هُمْ عَنْهَا بِغَآئِبِينَ
ayah_en: and from which they will find no escape.

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
ayah_en: What will make you realize what the Day of Judgement will be?

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
ayah_en: Again: what will make you realize what the Day of Judgement will be?

ayah_ar: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌۭ لِّنَفْسٍۢ شَيْـًۭٔا ۖ وَٱلْأَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلَّهِ
ayah_en: It will be a Day when no human being shall be of the least avail to any other human being, God \[alone\] will hold command on that Day.

ayah_ar: وَيْلٌۭ لِّلْمُطَفِّفِينَ
ayah_en: Woe to those who give short measure,

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكْتَالُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ
ayah_en: who demand of other people full measure for themselves,

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمْ أَو وَّزَنُوهُمْ يُخْسِرُونَ
ayah_en: but when they give by measurement or weight to others, they give them less.

ayah_ar: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ أَنَّهُم مَّبْعُوثُونَ
ayah_en: Do such people not realize that they will be raised up,

ayah_ar: لِيَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍۢ
ayah_en: on a fateful Day.

ayah_ar: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ ٱلنَّاسُ لِرَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_en: The Day when mankind will stand before the Lord of the Universe?

ayah_ar: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلْفُجَّارِ لَفِى سِجِّينٍۢ
ayah_en: Indeed! The record of the wicked is in the Sijjin --

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا سِجِّينٌۭ
ayah_en: and what could make you understand what the Sijjin is? --

ayah_ar: كِتَٰبٌۭ مَّرْقُومٌۭ
ayah_en: it is a written record.

ayah_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
ayah_en: Woe, on that Day, to those who reject,

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
ayah_en: those who deny the Day of Judgement.

ayah_ar: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
ayah_en: No one denies it except for the evil aggressor.

ayah_ar: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
ayah_en: When Our revelations are conveyed to him, he says, "Fables of the ancients!"

ayah_ar: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ ۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
ayah_en: No! Their own deeds have cast a veil over their hearts.

ayah_ar: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمْ عَن رَّبِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لَّمَحْجُوبُونَ
ayah_en: Indeed! On that Day a barrier will be set between them and their Lord,

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمْ لَصَالُوا۟ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
ayah_en: then they shall enter the Fire of Hell,

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
ayah_en: and they will be told, "This is what you were wont to belie."

ayah_ar: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلْأَبْرَارِ لَفِى عِلِّيِّينَ
ayah_en: But, the record of the righteous is \[preserved\] in the 'Illiyyin --

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا عِلِّيُّونَ
ayah_en: and what will make you understand what the 'Illiyyin is? --

ayah_ar: كِتَٰبٌۭ مَّرْقُومٌۭ
ayah_en: a written record,

ayah_ar: يَشْهَدُهُ ٱلْمُقَرَّبُونَ
ayah_en: which those angels closest to God will bear witness to.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ لَفِى نَعِيمٍ
ayah_en: The virtuous will surely be in bliss,

ayah_ar: عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
ayah_en: seated on couches and gazing around in wonder.

ayah_ar: تَعْرِفُ فِى وُجُوهِهِمْ نَضْرَةَ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
ayah_en: You will find in their faces the brightness of bliss.

ayah_ar: يُسْقَوْنَ مِن رَّحِيقٍۢ مَّخْتُومٍ
ayah_en: They will be given a drink of pure wine, sealed,

ayah_ar: خِتَٰمُهُۥ مِسْكٌۭ ۚ وَفِى ذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ ٱلْمُتَنَٰفِسُونَ
ayah_en: its seal will be of musk -- for this let the aspirants aspire --

ayah_ar: وَمِزَاجُهُۥ مِن تَسْنِيمٍ
ayah_en: a wine tempered with the waters of Tasnim,

ayah_ar: عَيْنًۭا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا ٱلْمُقَرَّبُونَ
ayah_en: a spring at which those drawn close to God will drink.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا۟ كَانُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ يَضْحَكُونَ
ayah_en: The wicked used to laugh at the believers --

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا مَرُّوا۟ بِهِمْ يَتَغَامَزُونَ
ayah_en: when they passed by them, they would wink at one another;

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُوا۟ فَكِهِينَ
ayah_en: and when they returned to their own people, they would speak of them jestingly;

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ
ayah_en: and when they saw them, they said \[scornfully\], "These men have surely gone astray,"

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أُرْسِلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِمْ حَٰفِظِينَ
ayah_en: though they were not sent to be their keepers --

ayah_ar: فَٱلْيَوْمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُونَ
ayah_en: so today those who believe shall \[be able to\] laugh at those who denied the truth

ayah_ar: عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
ayah_en: as they sit on couches, gazing around.

ayah_ar: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ ٱلْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْعَلُونَ
ayah_en: Have those who deny the truth \[not\] been paid back for their deeds?

ayah_ar: إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنشَقَّتْ
ayah_en: When the sky bursts open,

ayah_ar: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
ayah_en: and obeys its Lord as it must,

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْأَرْضُ مُدَّتْ
ayah_en: when the earth flattens out,

ayah_ar: وَأَلْقَتْ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتْ
ayah_en: and casts out all that is within it and becomes empty;

ayah_ar: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
ayah_en: and obeys its Lord as it must,

ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًۭا فَمُلَٰقِيهِ
ayah_en: O man, having striven hard towards your Lord, you shall meet Him:

ayah_ar: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ
ayah_en: he who is given his record in his right hand

ayah_ar: فَسَوْفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابًۭا يَسِيرًۭا
ayah_en: shall have an easy reckoning

ayah_ar: وَيَنقَلِبُ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ مَسْرُورًۭا
ayah_en: and he shall return to his people, joyfully,

ayah_ar: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهْرِهِۦ
ayah_en: but as for him whose record shall be given to him from behind his back,

ayah_ar: فَسَوْفَ يَدْعُوا۟ ثُبُورًۭا
ayah_en: he will pray for utter destruction

ayah_ar: وَيَصْلَىٰ سَعِيرًا
ayah_en: and he will enter the blazing flame.

ayah_ar: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فِىٓ أَهْلِهِۦ مَسْرُورًا
ayah_en: He used to be happy with his own people;

ayah_ar: إِنَّهُۥ ظَنَّ أَن لَّن يَحُورَ
ayah_en: for he never thought that he would have to return \[to God\].

ayah_ar: بَلَىٰٓ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرًۭا
ayah_en: But he will indeed! His Lord was ever watching him.

ayah_ar: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِٱلشَّفَقِ
ayah_en: I swear by the glow of sunset,

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّيْلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ
ayah_en: by the night and what it covers,

ayah_ar: وَٱلْقَمَرِ إِذَا ٱتَّسَقَ
ayah_en: and the moon when it grows full,

ayah_ar: لَتَرْكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقٍۢ
ayah_en: you will progress from stage to stage.

ayah_ar: فَمَا لَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
ayah_en: What is wrong with them that they do not believe?

ayah_ar: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْقُرْءَانُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ ۩
ayah_en: When the Quran is read to them, why do they not fall to their knees?

ayah_ar: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يُكَذِّبُونَ
ayah_en: Indeed, those who are bent on denying the truth reject it --

ayah_ar: وَٱللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ
ayah_en: God is quite aware of what they are storing in their hearts.

ayah_ar: فَبَشِّرْهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
ayah_en: Therefore, give them the news of a painful punishment.

ayah_ar: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍۭ
ayah_en: But for those who believe and do good works; for them there shall be a never-ending reward.

ayah_ar: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلْبُرُوجِ
ayah_en: By the sky with its constellations,

ayah_ar: وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْمَوْعُودِ
ayah_en: and by the promised Day,

ayah_ar: وَشَاهِدٍۢ وَمَشْهُودٍۢ
ayah_en: by the Witness and the witnessed,

ayah_ar: قُتِلَ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْأُخْدُودِ
ayah_en: destroyed were the people of the trench,

ayah_ar: ٱلنَّارِ ذَاتِ ٱلْوَقُودِ
ayah_en: the makers of the fuel-stoked fire!

ayah_ar: إِذْ هُمْ عَلَيْهَا قُعُودٌۭ
ayah_en: They sat by it

ayah_ar: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌۭ
ayah_en: to watch what they were doing to the believers,

ayah_ar: وَمَا نَقَمُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَمِيدِ
ayah_en: whom they hated for no other reason than that they believed in God, the Almighty, the Praiseworthy,

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ شَهِيدٌ
ayah_en: to whom belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth. God is witness over all things.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا۟ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا۟ فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ ٱلْحَرِيقِ
ayah_en: Those who persecute the believing men and believing women, and then do not repent, will surely suffer the punishment of Hell, and the torment of burning.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّٰتٌۭ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَٰرُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْكَبِيرُ
ayah_en: But those who believe and do good deeds shall be rewarded with gardens watered by flowing rivers. That is the supreme triumph.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ بَطْشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ
ayah_en: The grip of your Lord is indeed severe,

ayah_ar: إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ يُبْدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ
ayah_en: it is He who begins and repeats \[His creation\],

ayah_ar: وَهُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلْوَدُودُ
ayah_en: and He is the Forgiving and Loving One.

ayah_ar: ذُو ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْمَجِيدُ
ayah_en: The Lord of the Glorious Throne,

ayah_ar: فَعَّالٌۭ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ
ayah_en: Executor of His own will.

ayah_ar: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلْجُنُودِ
ayah_en: Have you not heard the story of the hosts

ayah_ar: فِرْعَوْنَ وَثَمُودَ
ayah_en: of Pharaoh and Thamud?

ayah_ar: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى تَكْذِيبٍۢ
ayah_en: Yet those who deny the truth persist in denial.

ayah_ar: وَٱللَّهُ مِن وَرَآئِهِم مُّحِيطٌۢ
ayah_en: God encompasses them from all sides.

ayah_ar: بَلْ هُوَ قُرْءَانٌۭ مَّجِيدٌۭ
ayah_en: It is indeed a glorious Quran,

ayah_ar: فِى لَوْحٍۢ مَّحْفُوظٍۭ
ayah_en: written on a preserved Tablet.

ayah_ar: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلطَّارِقِ
ayah_en: By the heavens and that which comes in the night --

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلطَّارِقُ
ayah_en: and what could make you know what it is that comes in the night?

ayah_ar: ٱلنَّجْمُ ٱلثَّاقِبُ
ayah_en: It is the shining star --

ayah_ar: إِن كُلُّ نَفْسٍۢ لَّمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌۭ
ayah_en: \[for\] no human being has been left unguarded.

ayah_ar: فَلْيَنظُرِ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ
ayah_en: Let man reflect on what he was created from.

ayah_ar: خُلِقَ مِن مَّآءٍۢ دَافِقٍۢ
ayah_en: He was created from spurting fluid,

ayah_ar: يَخْرُجُ مِنۢ بَيْنِ ٱلصُّلْبِ وَٱلتَّرَآئِبِ
ayah_en: issuing from between the backbone and the breastbone:

ayah_ar: إِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَجْعِهِۦ لَقَادِرٌۭ
ayah_en: He certainly has the power to bring him back to life.

ayah_ar: يَوْمَ تُبْلَى ٱلسَّرَآئِرُ
ayah_en: On the Day when secrets are disclosed,

ayah_ar: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةٍۢ وَلَا نَاصِرٍۢ
ayah_en: \[man\] will have no power, and no helper.

ayah_ar: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلرَّجْعِ
ayah_en: By the heavens, ever-revolving,

ayah_ar: وَٱلْأَرْضِ ذَاتِ ٱلصَّدْعِ
ayah_en: by the earth cracking open with new growth.

ayah_ar: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوْلٌۭ فَصْلٌۭ
ayah_en: It is surely a decisive utterance;

ayah_ar: وَمَا هُوَ بِٱلْهَزْلِ
ayah_en: and is not to be taken lightly.

ayah_ar: إِنَّهُمْ يَكِيدُونَ كَيْدًۭا
ayah_en: They are planning a scheme,

ayah_ar: وَأَكِيدُ كَيْدًۭا
ayah_en: and so am I:

ayah_ar: فَمَهِّلِ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ أَمْهِلْهُمْ رُوَيْدًۢا
ayah_en: so bear with those who deny the truth, and let them be for a little while.

ayah_ar: سَبِّحِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ ٱلْأَعْلَى
ayah_en: Glorify the name of your Lord, the Most High,

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
ayah_en: who created all things and gave them due proportions,

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِى قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ
ayah_en: who determines the nature \[of all that exists\], and guided it accordingly;

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِىٓ أَخْرَجَ ٱلْمَرْعَىٰ
ayah_en: who brings forth green pasture,

ayah_ar: فَجَعَلَهُۥ غُثَآءً أَحْوَىٰ
ayah_en: then turns it into black stubble.

ayah_ar: سَنُقْرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنسَىٰٓ
ayah_en: \[O Prophet!\] We shall make you recite the Quran so that you will not forget any of it --

ayah_ar: إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَعْلَمُ ٱلْجَهْرَ وَمَا يَخْفَىٰ
ayah_en: except whatever God wills; He knows both what is manifest and what is hidden --

ayah_ar: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
ayah_en: We shall facilitate for you the Easy Way.

ayah_ar: فَذَكِّرْ إِن نَّفَعَتِ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ
ayah_en: Remind, if the reminder can be of benefit.

ayah_ar: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَن يَخْشَىٰ
ayah_en: He who fears \[God\] will heed the reminder,

ayah_ar: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا ٱلْأَشْقَى
ayah_en: but it will be ignored by the most unfortunate,

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِى يَصْلَى ٱلنَّارَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ
ayah_en: who will enter the Great Fire,

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ
ayah_en: where he will neither die nor live.

ayah_ar: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
ayah_en: He who purifies himself,

ayah_ar: وَذَكَرَ ٱسْمَ رَبِّهِۦ فَصَلَّىٰ
ayah_en: who remembers the name of his Lord and prays, shall indeed be successful.

ayah_ar: بَلْ تُؤْثِرُونَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا
ayah_en: But you prefer the life of this world,

ayah_ar: وَٱلْءَاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌۭ وَأَبْقَىٰٓ
ayah_en: although the Hereafter is better and more lasting.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَفِى ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلْأُولَىٰ
ayah_en: This indeed is what is taught in the former scriptures --

ayah_ar: صُحُفِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ
ayah_en: the scriptures of Abraham and Moses.

ayah_ar: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلْغَٰشِيَةِ
ayah_en: Have you heard about the Overwhelming Event?

ayah_ar: وُجُوهٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍ خَٰشِعَةٌ
ayah_en: On that Day, there shall be downcast faces,

ayah_ar: عَامِلَةٌۭ نَّاصِبَةٌۭ
ayah_en: labouring, weary,

ayah_ar: تَصْلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِيَةًۭ
ayah_en: they shall enter a burning Fire

ayah_ar: تُسْقَىٰ مِنْ عَيْنٍ ءَانِيَةٍۢ
ayah_en: and will be made to drink from a boiling spring,

ayah_ar: لَّيْسَ لَهُمْ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٍۢ
ayah_en: they shall have no food but thorns,

ayah_ar: لَّا يُسْمِنُ وَلَا يُغْنِى مِن جُوعٍۢ
ayah_en: which will neither nourish nor satisfy hunger.

ayah_ar: وُجُوهٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ نَّاعِمَةٌۭ
ayah_en: Some faces on that Day will be radiant,

ayah_ar: لِّسَعْيِهَا رَاضِيَةٌۭ
ayah_en: well pleased with the result of their striving,

ayah_ar: فِى جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍۢ
ayah_en: in a sublime garden,

ayah_ar: لَّا تَسْمَعُ فِيهَا لَٰغِيَةًۭ
ayah_en: where they will hear no idle talk,

ayah_ar: فِيهَا عَيْنٌۭ جَارِيَةٌۭ
ayah_en: with a flowing spring,

ayah_ar: فِيهَا سُرُرٌۭ مَّرْفُوعَةٌۭ
ayah_en: raised couches,

ayah_ar: وَأَكْوَابٌۭ مَّوْضُوعَةٌۭ
ayah_en: and goblets set at hand,

ayah_ar: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصْفُوفَةٌۭ
ayah_en: cushions ranged,

ayah_ar: وَزَرَابِىُّ مَبْثُوثَةٌ
ayah_en: and carpets spread out.

ayah_ar: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلْإِبِلِ كَيْفَ خُلِقَتْ
ayah_en: Do they never reflect on the camels and how they were created,

ayah_ar: وَإِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ كَيْفَ رُفِعَتْ
ayah_en: and on the sky, how it is raised aloft,

ayah_ar: وَإِلَى ٱلْجِبَالِ كَيْفَ نُصِبَتْ
ayah_en: and on the mountains, how they are firmly set up,

ayah_ar: وَإِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ كَيْفَ سُطِحَتْ
ayah_en: and on the earth, how it is spread out?

ayah_ar: فَذَكِّرْ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُذَكِّرٌۭ
ayah_en: So, \[O Prophet\] exhort them: your task is only to exhort,

ayah_ar: لَّسْتَ عَلَيْهِم بِمُصَيْطِرٍ
ayah_en: you are not their keeper.

ayah_ar: إِلَّا مَن تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ
ayah_en: But whoever turns back and denies the truth,

ayah_ar: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَكْبَرَ
ayah_en: will be punished by God with the greatest punishment.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ إِلَيْنَآ إِيَابَهُمْ
ayah_en: Certainly, it is to Us that they will return.

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا حِسَابَهُم
ayah_en: Then, surely, it is for Us to call them to account.

ayah_ar: وَٱلْفَجْرِ
ayah_en: By the Dawn,

ayah_ar: وَلَيَالٍ عَشْرٍۢ
ayah_en: by the Ten Nights,

ayah_ar: وَٱلشَّفْعِ وَٱلْوَتْرِ
ayah_en: by the even and the odd,

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَسْرِ
ayah_en: and by the passing night,

ayah_ar: هَلْ فِى ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٌۭ لِّذِى حِجْرٍ
ayah_en: is there not in this strong evidence for a man of sense?

ayah_ar: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ
ayah_en: Have you not heard of how your Lord dealt with the tribe of 'Ad,

ayah_ar: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ ٱلْعِمَادِ
ayah_en: the people of Iram, the city of many pillars,

ayah_ar: ٱلَّتِى لَمْ يُخْلَقْ مِثْلُهَا فِى ٱلْبِلَٰدِ
ayah_en: the like of which has never been created in the land,

ayah_ar: وَثَمُودَ ٱلَّذِينَ جَابُوا۟ ٱلصَّخْرَ بِٱلْوَادِ
ayah_en: and with the Thamud, who cut out \[huge\] rocks in the valley,

ayah_ar: وَفِرْعَوْنَ ذِى ٱلْأَوْتَادِ
ayah_en: and with Pharaoh of the stakes?

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ طَغَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْبِلَٰدِ
ayah_en: All of them committed excesses in their lands,

ayah_ar: فَأَكْثَرُوا۟ فِيهَا ٱلْفَسَادَ
ayah_en: and caused much corruption in them:

ayah_ar: فَصَبَّ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّكَ سَوْطَ عَذَابٍ
ayah_en: so your Lord unleashed on them the scourge of punishment:

ayah_ar: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِٱلْمِرْصَادِ
ayah_en: for, indeed, your Sustainer is ever on the watch!

ayah_ar: فَأَمَّا ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَأَكْرَمَهُۥ وَنَعَّمَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَكْرَمَنِ
ayah_en: As for man, when his Lord tests him, through honour and blessings, he says, "My Lord has honoured me,"

ayah_ar: وَأَمَّآ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَهَٰنَنِ
ayah_en: but when He tests him by straitening his means of livelihood, he says, "My Lord has disgraced me."

ayah_ar: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا تُكْرِمُونَ ٱلْيَتِيمَ
ayah_en: No indeed, but you show no kindness to the orphan,

ayah_ar: وَلَا تَحَٰٓضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلْمِسْكِينِ
ayah_en: nor do you urge one another to feed the poor,

ayah_ar: وَتَأْكُلُونَ ٱلتُّرَاثَ أَكْلًۭا لَّمًّۭا
ayah_en: and you greedily devour the inheritance of the weak,

ayah_ar: وَتُحِبُّونَ ٱلْمَالَ حُبًّۭا جَمًّۭا
ayah_en: and you have a love of wealth which can never be satisfied.

ayah_ar: كَلَّآ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ دَكًّۭا دَكًّۭا
ayah_en: No indeed! When the earth is crushed and ground to dust,

ayah_ar: وَجَآءَ رَبُّكَ وَٱلْمَلَكُ صَفًّۭا صَفًّۭا
ayah_en: when your Lord comes down with the angels, rank upon rank,

ayah_ar: وَجِا۟ىٓءَ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بِجَهَنَّمَ ۚ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ
ayah_en: and Hell is made to appear on that Day, then man will be mindful, but what will being mindful then avail him?

ayah_ar: يَقُولُ يَٰلَيْتَنِى قَدَّمْتُ لِحَيَاتِى
ayah_en: He will say, "Oh, would that I had provided beforehand for my life!"

ayah_ar: فَيَوْمَئِذٍۢ لَّا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌۭ
ayah_en: On that Day no one will punish as He punishes,

ayah_ar: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌۭ
ayah_en: and none can bind with bonds like His!

ayah_ar: يَٰٓأَيَّتُهَا ٱلنَّفْسُ ٱلْمُطْمَئِنَّةُ
ayah_en: \[But to the righteous, God will say\], "O soul at peace,

ayah_ar: ٱرْجِعِىٓ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةًۭ مَّرْضِيَّةًۭ
ayah_en: return to your Lord, well-pleased, well-pleasing.

ayah_ar: فَٱدْخُلِى فِى عِبَٰدِى
ayah_en: Join My servants.

ayah_ar: وَٱدْخُلِى جَنَّتِى
ayah_en: Enter My Paradise."

ayah_ar: لَآ أُقْسِمُ بِهَٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ
ayah_en: I swear by this city --

ayah_ar: وَأَنتَ حِلٌّۢ بِهَٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ
ayah_en: and you are dwelling in this city --

ayah_ar: وَوَالِدٍۢ وَمَا وَلَدَ
ayah_en: and by parent and offspring,

ayah_ar: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ فِى كَبَدٍ
ayah_en: that We have created man into a life of toil and trial.

ayah_ar: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَدٌۭ
ayah_en: Does he think then that no one has power over him?

ayah_ar: يَقُولُ أَهْلَكْتُ مَالًۭا لُّبَدًا
ayah_en: He says, "I have spent enormous wealth."

ayah_ar: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّمْ يَرَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌ
ayah_en: Does he then think that no one sees him?

ayah_ar: أَلَمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُۥ عَيْنَيْنِ
ayah_en: Have We not given him two eyes,

ayah_ar: وَلِسَانًۭا وَشَفَتَيْنِ
ayah_en: and a tongue, and a pair of lips,

ayah_ar: وَهَدَيْنَٰهُ ٱلنَّجْدَيْنِ
ayah_en: and shown him the two paths?

ayah_ar: فَلَا ٱقْتَحَمَ ٱلْعَقَبَةَ
ayah_en: But he has not attempted the ascent.

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْعَقَبَةُ
ayah_en: What will explain to you what the ascent is?

ayah_ar: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ
ayah_en: It is the freeing of a slave;

ayah_ar: أَوْ إِطْعَٰمٌۭ فِى يَوْمٍۢ ذِى مَسْغَبَةٍۢ
ayah_en: or the feeding in times of famine

ayah_ar: يَتِيمًۭا ذَا مَقْرَبَةٍ
ayah_en: of an orphaned relative

ayah_ar: أَوْ مِسْكِينًۭا ذَا مَتْرَبَةٍۢ
ayah_en: or some needy person in distress,

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْمَرْحَمَةِ
ayah_en: and to be one of those who believe and urge one another to steadfastness and compassion.

ayah_ar: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْمَيْمَنَةِ
ayah_en: Those who do so are the people of the right hand,

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْمَشْـَٔمَةِ
ayah_en: and \[as for\] those who are bent on denying the truth of Our revelations, they are the people of the left hand,

ayah_ar: عَلَيْهِمْ نَارٌۭ مُّؤْصَدَةٌۢ
ayah_en: and the Fire will close in on them.

ayah_ar: وَٱلشَّمْسِ وَضُحَىٰهَا
ayah_en: By the sun and its rising brightness

ayah_ar: وَٱلْقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَىٰهَا
ayah_en: and by the moon as it follows it,

ayah_ar: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّىٰهَا
ayah_en: and by the day as it reveals its glory

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰهَا
ayah_en: and by the night when it draws a veil over it,

ayah_ar: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا بَنَىٰهَا
ayah_en: by the sky and how He built it

ayah_ar: وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا طَحَىٰهَا
ayah_en: and by the earth and how He spread it,

ayah_ar: وَنَفْسٍۢ وَمَا سَوَّىٰهَا
ayah_en: by the soul and how He formed it,

ayah_ar: فَأَلْهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقْوَىٰهَا
ayah_en: then inspired it to understand what was right and wrong for it.

ayah_ar: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن زَكَّىٰهَا
ayah_en: He who purifies it will indeed be successful,

ayah_ar: وَقَدْ خَابَ مَن دَسَّىٰهَا
ayah_en: and he who corrupts it is sure to fail.

ayah_ar: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِطَغْوَىٰهَآ
ayah_en: The Thamud tribe rejected the truth because of their arrogance,

ayah_ar: إِذِ ٱنۢبَعَثَ أَشْقَىٰهَا
ayah_en: when the most wicked man among them rose up.

ayah_ar: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقْيَٰهَا
ayah_en: Then the messenger of God said to them, "This is God's she-camel. Let her drink."

ayah_ar: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمْ فَسَوَّىٰهَا
ayah_en: But they gave him the lie, and hamstrung the she-camel. So their Lord destroyed them for their crime and razed their city to the ground.

ayah_ar: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقْبَٰهَا
ayah_en: He did not fear the consequences.

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰ
ayah_en: By the night as it veils \[the earth\] in darkness,

ayah_ar: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ
ayah_en: and by the day as it appears radiantly,

ayah_ar: وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلْأُنثَىٰٓ
ayah_en: and by the creation of the male and the female.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ سَعْيَكُمْ لَشَتَّىٰ
ayah_en: O men, you truly strive towards the most diverse ends!

ayah_ar: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أَعْطَىٰ وَٱتَّقَىٰ
ayah_en: As for one who gives \[to others\] and fears \[God\],

ayah_ar: وَصَدَّقَ بِٱلْحُسْنَىٰ
ayah_en: and believes in the truth of what is right,

ayah_ar: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
ayah_en: We will pave his way to ease.

ayah_ar: وَأَمَّا مَنۢ بَخِلَ وَٱسْتَغْنَىٰ
ayah_en: But as for one who is miserly and unheeding,

ayah_ar: وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلْحُسْنَىٰ
ayah_en: and rejects what is right,

ayah_ar: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلْعُسْرَىٰ
ayah_en: We shall pave his way to hardship,

ayah_ar: وَمَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ
ayah_en: nor will his wealth profit him when he falls \[into the pit\].

ayah_ar: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا لَلْهُدَىٰ
ayah_en: Surely, it is for Us to provide guidance --

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلْءَاخِرَةَ وَٱلْأُولَىٰ
ayah_en: and to Us belongs the Hereafter as well as the present world --

ayah_ar: فَأَنذَرْتُكُمْ نَارًۭا تَلَظَّىٰ
ayah_en: I have warned you then about a raging Fire:

ayah_ar: لَا يَصْلَىٰهَآ إِلَّا ٱلْأَشْقَى
ayah_en: none shall enter it but the most wicked,

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِى كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
ayah_en: who denied \[the truth\], and turned away.

ayah_ar: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا ٱلْأَتْقَى
ayah_en: One who fears God shall be kept away from it --

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِى يُؤْتِى مَالَهُۥ يَتَزَكَّىٰ
ayah_en: one who gives his wealth to become purified,

ayah_ar: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعْمَةٍۢ تُجْزَىٰٓ
ayah_en: and owes no favour to anyone, which is to be repaid,

ayah_ar: إِلَّا ٱبْتِغَآءَ وَجْهِ رَبِّهِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ
ayah_en: acting only for the sake of his Lord the Most High --

ayah_ar: وَلَسَوْفَ يَرْضَىٰ
ayah_en: and before long he will be well satisfied.

ayah_ar: وَٱلضُّحَىٰ
ayah_en: By the glorious morning light;

ayah_ar: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ
ayah_en: and by the night when it darkens,

ayah_ar: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ
ayah_en: your Lord has not forsaken you, nor is He displeased with you,

ayah_ar: وَلَلْءَاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌۭ لَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْأُولَىٰ
ayah_en: and the Hereafter will indeed be better for you than the present life;

ayah_ar: وَلَسَوْفَ يُعْطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرْضَىٰٓ
ayah_en: soon you will be gratified with what your Lord will give you.

ayah_ar: أَلَمْ يَجِدْكَ يَتِيمًۭا فَـَٔاوَىٰ
ayah_en: Did He not find you orphaned and shelter you?

ayah_ar: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَآلًّۭا فَهَدَىٰ
ayah_en: Did He not find you wandering, and give you guidance?

ayah_ar: وَوَجَدَكَ عَآئِلًۭا فَأَغْنَىٰ
ayah_en: Did He not find you in want, and make you free from want?

ayah_ar: فَأَمَّا ٱلْيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقْهَرْ
ayah_en: Therefore do not treat the orphan with harshness,

ayah_ar: وَأَمَّا ٱلسَّآئِلَ فَلَا تَنْهَرْ
ayah_en: and do not chide the one who asks for help;

ayah_ar: وَأَمَّا بِنِعْمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثْ
ayah_en: but proclaim the blessings of your Lord.

ayah_ar: أَلَمْ نَشْرَحْ لَكَ صَدْرَكَ
ayah_en: Have We not lifted up your heart,

ayah_ar: وَوَضَعْنَا عَنكَ وِزْرَكَ
ayah_en: and removed your burden

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنقَضَ ظَهْرَكَ
ayah_en: that weighed so heavily on your back, and

ayah_ar: وَرَفَعْنَا لَكَ ذِكْرَكَ
ayah_en: have We not given you high renown?

ayah_ar: فَإِنَّ مَعَ ٱلْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
ayah_en: So, surely with every hardship there is ease;

ayah_ar: إِنَّ مَعَ ٱلْعُسْرِ يُسْرًۭا
ayah_en: surely, with every hardship there is ease.

ayah_ar: فَإِذَا فَرَغْتَ فَٱنصَبْ
ayah_en: So, when you are free, strive hard,

ayah_ar: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَٱرْغَب
ayah_en: and to your Lord turn \[all\] your attention.

ayah_ar: بِّسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلتِّينِ وَٱلزَّيْتُونِ
ayah_en: By the Fig and the Olive,

ayah_ar: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ
ayah_en: and by Mount Sinai,

ayah_ar: وَهَٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ ٱلْأَمِينِ
ayah_en: and by this secure land,

ayah_ar: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ فِىٓ أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍۢ
ayah_en: We have indeed created man in the best of mould,

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ رَدَدْنَٰهُ أَسْفَلَ سَٰفِلِينَ
ayah_en: then We cast him down as the lowest of the low,

ayah_ar: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍۢ
ayah_en: except for those who believe and do good deeds -- theirs shall be an unending reward!

ayah_ar: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعْدُ بِٱلدِّينِ
ayah_en: What then after this, can make you deny the Last Judgement?

ayah_ar: أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَحْكَمِ ٱلْحَٰكِمِينَ
ayah_en: Is not God the greatest of the judges?

ayah_ar: ٱقْرَأْ بِٱسْمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ
ayah_en: Read! In the name of your Lord, who created:

ayah_ar: خَلَقَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ مِنْ عَلَقٍ
ayah_en: created man from a clot \[of blood\].

ayah_ar: ٱقْرَأْ وَرَبُّكَ ٱلْأَكْرَمُ
ayah_en: Read! Your Lord is the Most Bountiful One

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِى عَلَّمَ بِٱلْقَلَمِ
ayah_en: who taught by the pen,

ayah_ar: عَلَّمَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ مَا لَمْ يَعْلَمْ
ayah_en: taught man what he did not know.

ayah_ar: كَلَّآ إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ لَيَطْغَىٰٓ
ayah_en: Yet man behaves arrogantly,

ayah_ar: أَن رَّءَاهُ ٱسْتَغْنَىٰٓ
ayah_en: because he thinks himself self-sufficient:

ayah_ar: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ ٱلرُّجْعَىٰٓ
ayah_en: truly, all will return to your Lord.

ayah_ar: أَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى يَنْهَىٰ
ayah_en: Have you seen one who prevents

ayah_ar: عَبْدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰٓ
ayah_en: a worshipper from praying?

ayah_ar: أَرَءَيْتَ إِن كَانَ عَلَى ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ
ayah_en: Do you think he is rightly guided,

ayah_ar: أَوْ أَمَرَ بِٱلتَّقْوَىٰٓ
ayah_en: or enjoins true piety?

ayah_ar: أَرَءَيْتَ إِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ
ayah_en: Do you see how he has denied the truth and turned away from it?

ayah_ar: أَلَمْ يَعْلَم بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَرَىٰ
ayah_en: Does he not know that God observes all things?

ayah_ar: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمْ يَنتَهِ لَنَسْفَعًۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ
ayah_en: Let him beware! If he does not desist, We will drag him by the forelock --

ayah_ar: نَاصِيَةٍۢ كَٰذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٍۢ
ayah_en: his lying, sinful forelock.

ayah_ar: فَلْيَدْعُ نَادِيَهُۥ
ayah_en: Then let him call his associates;

ayah_ar: سَنَدْعُ ٱلزَّبَانِيَةَ
ayah_en: We shall summon the guards of Hell.

ayah_ar: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعْهُ وَٱسْجُدْ وَٱقْتَرِب ۩
ayah_en: No indeed! Do not obey him, but prostrate yourself and come closer to God.

ayah_ar: بِّسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَٰهُ فِى لَيْلَةِ ٱلْقَدْرِ
ayah_en: We sent it \[Quran\] down on the Night of Destiny.

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ
ayah_en: And what will make you comprehend what the Night of Destiny is?

ayah_ar: لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌۭ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍۢ
ayah_en: The Night of Destiny is better than a thousand months;

ayah_ar: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍۢ
ayah_en: on that night, the angels and the Spirit come down by the permission of their Lord with His decrees for all matters;

ayah_ar: سَلَٰمٌ هِىَ حَتَّىٰ مَطْلَعِ ٱلْفَجْرِ
ayah_en: it is all peace till the break of dawn.

ayah_ar: لَمْ يَكُنِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأْتِيَهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَةُ
ayah_en: The deniers of truth from among the People of the Book and the polytheists would not desist from disbelief until they received clear evidence --

ayah_ar: رَسُولٌۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتْلُوا۟ صُحُفًۭا مُّطَهَّرَةًۭ
ayah_en: a messenger from God, reciting to them pure scriptures,

ayah_ar: فِيهَا كُتُبٌۭ قَيِّمَةٌۭ
ayah_en: containing upright precepts.

ayah_ar: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا جَآءَتْهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَةُ
ayah_en: Those who were given the Book did not become divided except after clear evidence was given to them.

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أُمِرُوٓا۟ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ حُنَفَآءَ وَيُقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤْتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ ٱلْقَيِّمَةِ
ayah_en: They were commanded only to worship God, offering Him sincere devotion, to be sincere in their faith, to pray regularly; and to give alms, for that is the right religion.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ فِى نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ ۚ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمْ شَرُّ ٱلْبَرِيَّةِ
ayah_en: Those of the deniers of truth among the People of the Book and the polytheists will dwell forever in Hell-fire. They are the worst of creatures.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمْ خَيْرُ ٱلْبَرِيَّةِ
ayah_en: Truly, those who believe and do good works are the best of creatures.

ayah_ar: جَزَآؤُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّٰتُ عَدْنٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًۭا ۖ رَّضِىَ ٱللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا۟ عَنْهُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِىَ رَبَّهُۥ
ayah_en: God has a reward in store for them: Gardens of eternity, through which rivers flow; they will dwell therein forever. God is well pleased with them and they are well pleased with Him. Thus shall the God-fearing be rewarded.

ayah_ar: إِذَا زُلْزِلَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ زِلْزَالَهَا
ayah_en: When the earth is shaken with its violent shaking,

ayah_ar: وَأَخْرَجَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ أَثْقَالَهَا
ayah_en: when the earth shakes off her burdens,

ayah_ar: وَقَالَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مَا لَهَا
ayah_en: when man asks, "What is happening to her?";

ayah_ar: يَوْمَئِذٍۢ تُحَدِّثُ أَخْبَارَهَا
ayah_en: on that Day it will narrate its account,

ayah_ar: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوْحَىٰ لَهَا
ayah_en: for your Lord has so directed it.

ayah_ar: يَوْمَئِذٍۢ يَصْدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًۭا لِّيُرَوْا۟ أَعْمَٰلَهُمْ
ayah_en: On that Day people will come forward in separate groups to be shown their deeds:

ayah_ar: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًۭا يَرَهُۥ
ayah_en: whoever has done the smallest particle of good will see it;

ayah_ar: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍۢ شَرًّۭا يَرَهُۥ
ayah_en: while whoever has done the smallest particle of evil will see it.

ayah_ar: وَٱلْعَٰدِيَٰتِ ضَبْحًۭا
ayah_en: By the snorting, panting horses,

ayah_ar: فَٱلْمُورِيَٰتِ قَدْحًۭا
ayah_en: striking sparks of fire with their hooves,

ayah_ar: فَٱلْمُغِيرَٰتِ صُبْحًۭا
ayah_en: as they gallop to make raids at dawn,

ayah_ar: فَأَثَرْنَ بِهِۦ نَقْعًۭا
ayah_en: and raising clouds of dust,

ayah_ar: فَوَسَطْنَ بِهِۦ جَمْعًا
ayah_en: forcing their way into the midst of the enemy,

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ لِرَبِّهِۦ لَكَنُودٌۭ
ayah_en: surely, man is ungrateful to his Lord.

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ لَشَهِيدٌۭ
ayah_en: He himself bears witness to that.

ayah_ar: وَإِنَّهُۥ لِحُبِّ ٱلْخَيْرِ لَشَدِيدٌ
ayah_en: Surely, he is ardent in his love of wealth.

ayah_ar: ۞ أَفَلَا يَعْلَمُ إِذَا بُعْثِرَ مَا فِى ٱلْقُبُورِ
ayah_en: Is he not aware of the time when the contents of the graves will be brought out?

ayah_ar: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِى ٱلصُّدُورِ
ayah_en: And the hearts' contents shall be brought into the open?

ayah_ar: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لَّخَبِيرٌۢ
ayah_en: Surely, on that Day, they will know that their Lord had full knowledge of them all.

ayah_ar: ٱلْقَارِعَةُ
ayah_en: The Clatterer!

ayah_ar: مَا ٱلْقَارِعَةُ
ayah_en: What is the Clatterer?

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْقَارِعَةُ
ayah_en: Would that you knew what the Clatterer is!

ayah_ar: يَوْمَ يَكُونُ ٱلنَّاسُ كَٱلْفَرَاشِ ٱلْمَبْثُوثِ
ayah_en: \[It is\] a Day when mankind shall be like scattered moths

ayah_ar: وَتَكُونُ ٱلْجِبَالُ كَٱلْعِهْنِ ٱلْمَنفُوشِ
ayah_en: and the mount-ains like tufts of carded wool.

ayah_ar: فَأَمَّا مَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ
ayah_en: Then, the one whose good deeds weigh heavy on the scales,

ayah_ar: فَهُوَ فِى عِيشَةٍۢ رَّاضِيَةٍۢ
ayah_en: will have a most pleasing life.

ayah_ar: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ
ayah_en: But as for him whose deeds are light on the scales,

ayah_ar: فَأُمُّهُۥ هَاوِيَةٌۭ
ayah_en: the Abyss shall be his home.

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا هِيَهْ
ayah_en: What will convey to you what this is like?

ayah_ar: نَارٌ حَامِيَةٌۢ
ayah_en: It is a blazing fire.

ayah_ar: أَلْهَىٰكُمُ ٱلتَّكَاثُرُ
ayah_en: Greed for more and more distracted you \[from God\]

ayah_ar: حَتَّىٰ زُرْتُمُ ٱلْمَقَابِرَ
ayah_en: till you reached the grave.

ayah_ar: كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
ayah_en: But you will soon come to know.

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
ayah_en: But you will soon come to know.

ayah_ar: كَلَّا لَوْ تَعْلَمُونَ عِلْمَ ٱلْيَقِينِ
ayah_en: Indeed, were you to know the truth with certainty,

ayah_ar: لَتَرَوُنَّ ٱلْجَحِيمَ
ayah_en: you would see the fire of Hell.

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَيْنَ ٱلْيَقِينِ
ayah_en: You would see it with the eye of certainty.

ayah_ar: ثُمَّ لَتُسْـَٔلُنَّ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَنِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
ayah_en: Then on that Day you shall be questioned about your worldly favours.

ayah_ar: وَٱلْعَصْرِ
ayah_en: I swear by the passage of time,

ayah_ar: إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ لَفِى خُسْرٍ
ayah_en: that man is surely in a state of loss,

ayah_ar: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ
ayah_en: except for those who believe and do good deeds and exhort one another to hold fast to the Truth, and who exhort one another to stead-fastness.

ayah_ar: وَيْلٌۭ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةٍۢ لُّمَزَةٍ
ayah_en: Woe to every fault-finding back-biter,

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِى جَمَعَ مَالًۭا وَعَدَّدَهُۥ
ayah_en: who amasses wealth, counting it over,

ayah_ar: يَحْسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُۥٓ أَخْلَدَهُۥ
ayah_en: thinking that his wealth will make him live forever.

ayah_ar: كَلَّا ۖ لَيُنۢبَذَنَّ فِى ٱلْحُطَمَةِ
ayah_en: By no means! He shall surely be cast into the crushing torment.

ayah_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْحُطَمَةُ
ayah_en: Would that you understood what that crushing torment is like.

ayah_ar: نَارُ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُوقَدَةُ
ayah_en: It is a Fire kindled by God.

ayah_ar: ٱلَّتِى تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى ٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةِ
ayah_en: Reaching right into the hearts of men,

ayah_ar: إِنَّهَا عَلَيْهِم مُّؤْصَدَةٌۭ
ayah_en: it closes in on them from every side

ayah_ar: فِى عَمَدٍۢ مُّمَدَّدَةٍۭ
ayah_en: in towering columns.

ayah_ar: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَٰبِ ٱلْفِيلِ
ayah_en: Have you not seen how your Lord dealt with the people of the elephant?

ayah_ar: أَلَمْ يَجْعَلْ كَيْدَهُمْ فِى تَضْلِيلٍۢ
ayah_en: Did He not foil their strategy

ayah_ar: وَأَرْسَلَ عَلَيْهِمْ طَيْرًا أَبَابِيلَ
ayah_en: and send against them flocks of birds,

ayah_ar: تَرْمِيهِم بِحِجَارَةٍۢ مِّن سِجِّيلٍۢ
ayah_en: which pelted them with clay stones?

ayah_ar: فَجَعَلَهُمْ كَعَصْفٍۢ مَّأْكُولٍۭ
ayah_en: Thus He made them like stubble cropped by cattle?

ayah_ar: لِإِيلَٰفِ قُرَيْشٍ
ayah_en: For the security of the Quraysh:

ayah_ar: إِۦلَٰفِهِمْ رِحْلَةَ ٱلشِّتَآءِ وَٱلصَّيْفِ
ayah_en: their security in their winter and summer journeys.

ayah_ar: فَلْيَعْبُدُوا۟ رَبَّ هَٰذَا ٱلْبَيْتِ
ayah_en: So let them worship the Lord of this House,

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍۢ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍۭ
ayah_en: who provided them with food lest they go hungry and saved them from fear.

ayah_ar: أَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى يُكَذِّبُ بِٱلدِّينِ
ayah_en: Have you seen one who denies the Day of Judgement?

ayah_ar: فَذَٰلِكَ ٱلَّذِى يَدُعُّ ٱلْيَتِيمَ
ayah_en: Who turns away the orphan,

ayah_ar: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلْمِسْكِينِ
ayah_en: and who does not urge the feeding of the poor?

ayah_ar: فَوَيْلٌۭ لِّلْمُصَلِّينَ
ayah_en: So woe to those who pray

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَن صَلَاتِهِمْ سَاهُونَ
ayah_en: but whose hearts are not in their prayer.

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ يُرَآءُونَ
ayah_en: Those who do things only to be seen by others.

ayah_ar: وَيَمْنَعُونَ ٱلْمَاعُونَ
ayah_en: Who are uncharitable even over very small things.

ayah_ar: إِنَّآ أَعْطَيْنَٰكَ ٱلْكَوْثَرَ
ayah_en: We have given you abundance.

ayah_ar: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَٱنْحَرْ
ayah_en: Pray to your Lord and sacrifice to Him alone.

ayah_ar: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ ٱلْأَبْتَرُ
ayah_en: It is the one who hates you who has been cut off.

ayah_ar: قُلْ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْكَٰفِرُونَ
ayah_en: Say, "You who deny the Truth,

ayah_ar: لَآ أَعْبُدُ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ
ayah_en: I do not worship what you worship.

ayah_ar: وَلَآ أَنتُمْ عَٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعْبُدُ
ayah_en: You do not worship what I worship.

ayah_ar: وَلَآ أَنَا۠ عَابِدٌۭ مَّا عَبَدتُّمْ
ayah_en: I will never worship what you worship.

ayah_ar: وَلَآ أَنتُمْ عَٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعْبُدُ
ayah_en: You will never worship what I worship.

ayah_ar: لَكُمْ دِينُكُمْ وَلِىَ دِينِ
ayah_en: You have your religion and I have mine."

ayah_ar: إِذَا جَآءَ نَصْرُ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلْفَتْحُ
ayah_en: When God's help and victory come,

ayah_ar: وَرَأَيْتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِى دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًۭا
ayah_en: and you see people entering God's religion in multitudes,

ayah_ar: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابًۢا
ayah_en: then glorify your Lord with His praise and seek His forgiveness. He is always ready to accept repentance.

ayah_ar: تَبَّتْ يَدَآ أَبِى لَهَبٍۢ وَتَبَّ
ayah_en: May the hands of Abu Lahab perish, may he be ruined.

ayah_ar: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ
ayah_en: Neither his wealth nor his gains will avail him.

ayah_ar: سَيَصْلَىٰ نَارًۭا ذَاتَ لَهَبٍۢ
ayah_en: He shall soon enter a Blazing Fire,

ayah_ar: وَٱمْرَأَتُهُۥ حَمَّالَةَ ٱلْحَطَبِ
ayah_en: and also his wife who carries the fuel,

ayah_ar: فِى جِيدِهَا حَبْلٌۭ مِّن مَّسَدٍۭ
ayah_en: with a rope of twisted fibre round her neck.

ayah_ar: قُلْ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٌ
ayah_en: Say, "He is God, the One,

ayah_ar: ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّمَدُ
ayah_en: God, the Self-sufficient One.

ayah_ar: لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ
ayah_en: He does not give birth, nor was He born,

ayah_ar: وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُۥ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌۢ
ayah_en: and there is nothing like Him."

ayah_ar: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلْفَلَقِ
ayah_en: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of the daybreak

ayah_ar: مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
ayah_en: from the evil of what He has created,

ayah_ar: وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ
ayah_en: from the evil of darkness as it descends,

ayah_ar: وَمِن شَرِّ ٱلنَّفَّٰثَٰتِ فِى ٱلْعُقَدِ
ayah_en: from the evil of those who blow on knots

ayah_ar: وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ
ayah_en: and from the evil of the envier when he envies."

ayah_ar: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلنَّاسِ
ayah_en: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of people,

ayah_ar: مَلِكِ ٱلنَّاسِ
ayah_en: the King of people,

ayah_ar: إِلَٰهِ ٱلنَّاسِ
ayah_en: the God of people,

ayah_ar: مِن شَرِّ ٱلْوَسْوَاسِ ٱلْخَنَّاسِ
ayah_en: from the mischief of every sneaking whis-perer,

ayah_ar: ٱلَّذِى يُوَسْوِسُ فِى صُدُورِ ٱلنَّاسِ
ayah_en: who whispers into the hearts of people,

ayah_ar: مِنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ
ayah_en: from jinn and men."
